campaign.story:
From TactiCouture®, The World's First Utilitarian Fashion Line, we present...
 The Ballistic Scarf™ 
- Warm | Lightweight | Super Tough -
The most durable covert scarf ever. Specially woven, the Ballistic Scarf™ feels like soft jersey knit yet with an insanely high tensile breaking point.
This incredibly beautiful scarf is for the always on-the-go, active person. This isn't for your average, couch-sitter.  Secret Service Agent? Weekend warrior? Skier? The Ballistic Scarf™ will blend right in while increasing your level of protection and readiness.
 Breathable: Shields from the sun, dust storms, or filter out pollution/smog.
 Wrap-up tight; instant warm and protection from drafty airports, chilly airplanes, or cold restaurants.
 Fashionable: Slimming, tactical black color goes with any outfit.
 Innovative: The tactical multitool of scarves.
 Perfect gift: For EDC, motorcyclists, hunters, hikers, soldiers, travelers, and tactical gear junkies.
 Light-weight: Only 4-5oz.
 Super High Quality: No odor, no molting.
This is the ultimate EDC tactical scarf. 
Beautifully stitched & hemmed.
 The Ballistic Scarf™ from TactiCouture®
 Urban design: Designed with urban-chic fashion in mind, male or female, the Ballistic Scarf™ is designed for the minimalist, on-the-go warrior. 
 All styles, high-class or casual: Whether you're an urban operator battling the city office or exploring the arid jungles of Nicaragua (literally field-tested in Nicaragua), survivalists say "You need a piece of quality, dependable cloth in your survival kit." 
 Hidden protection: Blend in with style without compromising your readiness.
 Slimming: Tactical black shade absorbs low-light for that night out on the town. 
 Toughest Scarf on the Planet: The Ballistic Scarf™ is incredibly strong--far tougher than traditional cotton or wool scarves. While a knife will eventually get through any material (depending on aggressiveness of course), we designed something that will buy you some time and protection... even if it means another 2 seconds to escape. 
Testing the breaking point
 Comfortable: surprisingly soft material is woven to maintain elasticity to adapt to movements. 
 Ultra-strong material: We've put this stuff through tons of stress tests.
 Minimalist: no dangling tassels to get caught. Fully hemmed with reinforced stitching. Oder resistant. Does not shrink.
 Dimensions: 63x15 inches (160 x 38 cm)
 Weight: 4-5oz. 
 Weave: Medium. 
 Stitching: Reinforced, zig-zag (so it stretches). The hemming uses the same fiber thread.
We have something: We have committed over 2 straight years of research and testing to find the perfect fabric that combines both tough qualities without anyone ever knowing it. 
Tougher than your conventional scarf
Compared side-by-side, The Ballistic Scarf™ always outlasts the competition.  
Cut-testing a Top Selling (Amazon.com) Marino Wool Scarf
Cut-testing The Ballistic Scarf™️ - *Exact same pair of scissors
 From the makers of the Tacticlip, Multi-tool hair clip. You brought our Kickstarter designs to success in the past (Our first Kickstarter: over 10,000% supported), and nothing's stopping us with more creative, incredibly useful designs. We thank you!
We are here to serve and deliver epic, one-of-a-kind designs on-time with superior Kickstarter backer service. 
Summiting Mt Rainier with the Ballistic Scarf™ Version 1.8 - This version proved to be too heavy and thick for daily use, but holy smokes was it warm.
Warm, lightweight, minimalist.
After over 2 years of development, we are pleased to give our dear fans first access to our Ballistic Scarf™. This Kickstarter is our final push to production, and we'd love nothing more than for you to join us again. It is always an honor and thank you!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
MANUFACTURING UNKNOWNS: As with our previous campaign, we factor as much manufacturer error in as possible. We have tested (and re-tested) the Tactical production process to ensure delivery on time at the high quality standards you expect. That said there is always a risk in the manufacturing world; in times past we have rolled with the punches as we experience a sudden change in raw material pricing, customs delays, and lost shipments. And we still delivered on-time.

OUR ANSWER: We have baked in failsafes and anticipate error--as long as the outcome is increased quality. Our goal is to deliver early and above what we promised. That said, we thank you for being gracious when the inevitable curveball happens. After all this is an adventure and you are on the front-line of innovation by partnering with us.

Safety & Legal Terms and Legal disclaimer: This product is not body armor. This product is not expressly intended for protection. The user holds harmless TactiCouture®, Beau LLC, and its subsidiaries for the use and/or misuse of said product. This is a tool. This is not a toy. This product should never be relied upon in self defense situations without extensive training. This tool should never be supplied to or within reach or possession of any children or minors. This tool is not intended to take the of personal protection. None of our products are body armor nor should be used with intent to protect or harm. None of our products stop or protect from projectiles (e.g. bullets, blades, swords, explosions, or wild animals). Discoloration will occur if exposed to significant heat. Unraveling of hemming may occur if exposed to significant trauma. Do not rely off of this product to prevent injuries. Use of this product may be dangerous and by backing this campaign you promise not to hold Beau, LLC, or its associates (including Ballistic Scarf and Tacticlip) liable for harm, damage, illegal activity, injury, etc. You are responsible for checking your local, state, and federal laws for legality. You are responsible for using the tool in a manner that is safe. If damage occurs to the tool, you are responsible for immediately ceasing the use of said tool. You must be at least 18 years old to order. Choking hazard. It is the sole responsibility of the buyer to obey all applicable Federal, State, and Local Laws regarding possession and use of item(s) sold herein. Consult your Federal, State, and Local Laws before ordering. By placing an order or backing this Kickstarter project, the buyer certifies that: he or she is of legal age; and that the item(s) will be used only in a lawful manner. You, the buyer, are liable and responsible for any loss, damage or expense of any kind, arising from the use or misuse of any item sold herein and/or related to Beau, LLC and its associates.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

comments.content: Ian.
Thanks for making this project a success and delivering it to the backers. And of course for your support in sending my scarf!
I got this and was easily able to cut through it with a box cutter
DL
Haven’t received my pledge
I agree. I’ve tested the test material and scarf. This is false advertisement. A full knife cut through and also a dull scissor was able to cut, slash and pierce through.
Slash proof is a joke. My on purpose needing to be sharpened knife whizzed through this like butter. This was mainly the reason I bought this to have neck protection in crowds.
I'm envisioning that as useful for poking around in a fire for instance. At least you won't burn the hairs off of your arm quite so fast ;-)

Received mine today (in Turkey), packaging is really nice, arrived without any problem, also Mr. Chevassus has been really kind, informative, professional and helpful throughout the whole campaign, no problems left unsolved no questions went unanswered. The scarf is already made a solid place in my everyday carry, here are my two cents about the test fabric: I tested the sample fabric with and without any support behind it with quite shape knive(s), yes knives because the "test" dulled them fast quite fairly, on the supported tests against a solid surface , as some backers said, the knives did quite short work of the test fabric when it is only one layer and not bundled or anything. Unsupported tests however are a different story, if you bundle the test fabric ( let's say two or three layers) as it would sit on your neck, it became quite difficult to cut with force let alone with jabs and slashes, also dulled an aus8 shaving sharp knife to a mediocre edge with visible minimal rolls, last but definitely not least, fire resistance is REALLY good, stood very well against a butane jet lighter, from point blank, for a solid 15 seconds before even giving a sign of reaction after that the singed area was very small and the burn really slow. Thank you again for a great product, professionalism and flawless delivery
Nice to see someone who has understood that this isn't a knife vest, just a fabric that is more cut resistant than others of the same, very thin, quality.

I actually really like the scarf (so am not going to attempt to slash that) - was just puzzled by the claims the fabric was supposed to be slash proof. No probs though - I’m sure I’ll enjoy using it, thanks.
how can i order more scarfs?

Received the scarf in Switzerland way ahead of schedule, thanks! It's strong material indeed, too strong for the machines I guess as one part of the hem isn't well cut and there is a triangle shaped piece attached ;) but that isn't really an issue for me. Great work!

For the next KS project, I'd like to recommend a glove made out of this material! I feel it could have that tactical look and feel but still be versatile to use in housework in lieu of safety gloves or fishing (both dealing with sharp objects!) Keep up the great work!
Got my scarf on the 1st and forgot to post. Wife loves it and so do I.

Awesome i’m the backer #328 and I just received my Scarf today! I also try the sample with almost all of my Dalstrong Knife. Impressive and for sure I’ll buy more soon. Long life to you guys and I will be ready for your next KS campain in the future
Received mine in Malaysia, Thanks!
A quality product delivered way ahead of schedule, many congratulations.
Got my scarf yesterday and love it. Are there plans to make gaiters & masks in the future?

campaign.story:
Traditional UV sanitizers are bulky and only clean one side of your device. Deep Purple is a folding UV sanitizer which cleans a full 360°, giving your devices an all-over clean anywhere, anytime.
Disclaimer: This product does NOT claim to diagnose, cure, treat, or prevent any illness or condition. 
Chemical-free cleaning
Traditional methods of keeping your personal belongings clean can be inconvenient, wasteful, and harmful to the environment. Deep Purple™  provides an effective, safe, and chemical-free method of cleaning anywhere, anytime.
Clean your things
Often the most touched belongings are also the dirtiest. Deep Purple™  is designed to clean daily essentials and is portable enough to go anywhere.
If it's not Deep Purple™ clean, it's not clean.
Other UV sanitizers only clean the topside of your device, which means you still need to touch it when flipping it over to clean the other side. Moshi’s Deep Purple™ UV Sanitizer offers 360-degree cleaning. The transparent LumiClear™  platform elevates your device and features an ultra-reflective Teflon base to ensure every surface is sanitized. 
PLAY

Folds flat. Goes anywhere
Deep Purple™ UV Sanitizer features an ultra-thin form factor that folds up neatly and slides into a bag, backpack, or suitcase so you can take it with you anywhere. 
The power of portability
Using the included USB cable, Deep Purple can be powered by a wall adapter, car charger, or portable battery to give you ultimate cleaning freedom in coffee shops, parks, hotels, and everywhere in between.
If it fits, clean it
We touch a lot of gadgets, accessories, and personal items throughout the day. Deep Purple™  fits a range of different-sized items and give them a thorough, all-over clean in minutes. 
Where can I use it?
Thanks to its portable design, you can take Deep Purple™ with you to use almost anywhere including the office, restaurants, parks, airports, airplanes, train stations, workshops, and road trips. 
Deep Purple uses ultra-violet type-C light, which targets the DNA of microbes on the cellular level and negates their ability to reproduce.

With traditional UV sanitizers, there's no way to really know if sanitization was truly effective, giving you no choice but to believe their claim. Deep Purple's UV indicator contains UV-reactive paint which changes color with exposure to UV-C rays, providing visible proof that the interior has been exposed to a sufficient quantity of UV light.
Deep Purple uses LEDs which emit UV type-C (UV-C) rays with short wavelengths. 
UV-C rays clean from every angle
The UV rays are emitted from LED lights inside Deep Purple, which are reflected around the interior for all-over coverage.
UV-C rays deactivate DNA
UV light works by disrupting the structure of microbial cells, making them unable to reproduce or multiply.
Many other UV sanitizing solutions (such as non-enclosed UV wands) may expose the user to UV-C rays. Deep Purple™  employs dual safety mechanisms to ensure no UV leakage. 
Many UV sanitizers use UV-C lamps because they are cheaper. Deep Purple utilizes UV-C LED technology which is superior in both quality and performance.
Disclaimer: This product does NOT claim to diagnose, cure, treat, or prevent an illness or condition.   
Deep Purple™ connects to any portable battery for hassle-free sanitization absolutely anywhere, anytime. We recommend using Deep Purple with Moshi's IonSlim 5K, which at only 8.5 mm thick, is one of the slimmest portable batteries available on the market. 

From phones to watches, keys and jewelry, Deep Purple can clean all kinds of personal items. Anything which is shared between multiple people, such as remote controls, gaming controllers, pens, cutlery, earphones....clean them all with Deep Purple™. Take it with you to the coffee shop to clean utensils before you eat, or to work to clean your mouse, glasses, ID card, or laser pointer.

Moshi's 10-year Global Warranty underscores our commitment to quality and encourages consumers to purchase products that are built to last. 
Over the span of several months, the engineers and designers at Moshi took the idea of Deep Purple™ UV Sanitizer from conception to reality. With each iteration, we have improved the safety, effectiveness, quality, and user experience. We've made sure it cleans consistently and thoroughly, folds and travels conveniently, and meets the highest quality standards—just what you would expect from a product made by Moshi. 
Founded in California in 2005, Moshi is a purveyor of electronics and accessories for modern life. Our ethos of creating fewer, better products guides our in-house design teams in selecting the best materials and components to ensure our goods exceed both quality and performance expectations. Renowned for a clean and minimalist design aesthetic, along with our commitment to innovation and premium quality, all Moshi products are backed by a 10-year worldwide warranty - an industry-first promoting a quality-over-quantity mindset across the globe.
The Team 
Get Your Project Funded Today!
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Although Moshi is a well established company founded in 2005, we are aware there will always be risks and challenges along the way when developing any new product. We have made every effort to minimize these by having reliable suppliers who we have worked with before. Despite our careful planning, we may encounter circumstances out of our control, such as the COVID-19 pandemic. We endeavor to communicate with full transparency to you, our backers, should we encounter any obstacles that will result in production or delivery delays and work to resolve all issues in a timely manner.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
10-Year Global Warranty - We've got you covered

Moshi’s industry-leading 10-Year Global Warranty covers all product categories including our newest category—Wellness—and its flagship Deep Purple™ UV Sanitizer. This underscores our commitment to product quality and reinforces our stance against excessive consumerism. Our aim is to help customers mitigate their impact on the environment by selecting products that are built to last. Our design and engineering experts select only the finest materials to follow our mantra of making fewer, better products. Deep Purple's UV-C lights are guaranteed to withstand more than 10 years of daily usage.
Reusability and recyclability
FSC packaging and soy ink

In 2012, Moshi was the first accessory brand to use paper certified by the Forestry Stewardship Council. This is also when we started using soy ink, which is easier to remove during recycling and comes from a renewable source.

Extending usable life

By sanitizing your face masks, goggles, and other medical equipment, you are extending their useful lifespan and keeping them out of the landfill, significantly reducing environmental impact.
Sustainable materials
Animal-friendly vegan leather

Since day one, Moshi has taken a stance against leather products. Our designers prefer vegan leather as it is not only a more lightweight material but has the added benefit of being cruelty-free, which is appreciated by customers around the world.

campaign.story:
After more than 200.000 distributions worldwide of the original Silver Mask launched on Kickstarter in 2017, we decided to take it to the next level and create an ultimate premium mask by empowering protection, comfort and user experience.
Silver Mask 2 offers an advanced solution to the invisible, everyday encounters. The new and improved edition introduces exclusive and innovative features: Polygiene™ Treatment, an empowered replaceable filter with Anti-fog design, and an NFC Chip-connected app to monitor the Silver Mask 2 lifespan.

Silver Mask 2 provides four different levels of protection: Polygiene™ Treatment, a Silver embedded Layer, empowered replaceable Filter, and a hydro-repellent treatment. Check out all four levels of protection in-depth!


The outer cover has been treated with Polygiene™ Treatment, the latest in textile treatment technology.
The Polygiene™ Treatment resists up to 100 wash cycles.

The iconic Silver Layer (Ag) is now embedded in the inside of the outer cover. Silver works around the clock to keep the breathing environment healthy and neutralize bad odors.
It also allows moisture to easily evaporate and you can wash your cover whenever you want without compromising the silver function.
The built-in replaceable filter is composed of four different layers, each with a specific protective action.
Our empowered filters are the only ones on the market produced in Europe with premium materials that provide an extended lifespan (6-8 week average duration).
For any details about filtering and protective action, please comment or send a message to support@banale.com. 

With Silver Mask 2 you protect others too, thanks to a hydro-repellent treatment applied to the outer cover. This special treatment impedes any outgoing droplets coming out from the ventilation valve.
The valve is a very important feature in a face mask because it increases internal ventilation, reduces moisture and augments comfort. 
Protection matters but it’s nothing without comfort. Designing face masks since 2015, we know how important it is to supply our customers with something they can wear naturally and easily.
Thanks to the maximum comfort, the more you wear it, the safer you’ll be.
A removable foam buffer provides advanced comfort, adhering to any face shape. The unique design ensures an airtight seal that supports maximum filtering efficiency and enables a unique anti-fog defense system. 
To ensure optimal operation of the anti-fog design, the filter must be properly adjusted to adhere to the face.
In addition, we design a reflective band* that maximizes safety, especially for bikers. 
 *reflective band provided separately and mounted manually.
With its patented lace system, Silver Mask 2 offers versatility, maximizing personalized wear while rendering a stylish and convenient wear for active and inactive use. 
The lacing system allows for four different types of wear, ensuring maximum comfort suited for every type of wear, including with glasses and helmets.
With Silver Mask 2 one size fits all: pull the laces until the mask automatically adapts to any face. It will also fit with all different kinds of sunglasses and helmets.
Silver Mask 2 is the ultimate evolution of a design intended to get you comfortably covered in every aspect of your daily routine.
Its high standard of protection and comfort enables you to wear it while commuting, shopping, working and moving around in public spaces.
Silver Mask 2 is equipped with an advanced built-in NFC chip that enables tracking of the filter lifespan. Tap your mask to your smartphone by bringing the phone closer to the chip and beep: now the mask is connected!
The waterproof chip is seamlessly integrated into the mask, protecting it from unwarranted damages and frequent washings, maximizing hygiene and safety.
With the Banale web app you'll always be connected with your mask and can constantry monitor your filter lifespan. And refill filters are just one click away. 
The refill filters of Silver Mask 2 will always be available on BANALE.COM and the Banale web app, and are eligible for global shipment.
For 5 years we are committed to delivering refills and the spare parts to customers anywhere they need.
And with the new BANALE web app, ordering refill filters is easier, faster and more convenient.
Along with the Banale web app and Silver Mask 2, we are launching the Recycling Program, a new exclusive service by Banale.
Banale will collect the exhausted filters of your Silver Mask 2. Use the Banale web app to buy new filters and upon the delivery we’ll collect exhausted filters and recycle them correctly through our industrial partner BLS.
This new program is aimed to ensure the sustainability of your Silver Mask 2 and reduce the impact of replaceable filters on the environment.   

The washable cover can be hand or machine washed up to 60°, leaving you with a fresh and clean feeling.
It is recommended to let it dry in the open air and to avoid using an automatic dryer.
Silver Mask 2 comes equipped with a case, allowing safe storage of your mask and prolonging the filter lifespan during inactive use. 
Silver Mask 2 is state of the art in terms of protection. Get the most premium face mask on the market. Silver Mask 2 is the best in terms of comfort protection for you and those around you.


At this moment yo can preorder your favorite reward at a special price. Hurry up! If you’re interested in getting Earlybird offers, click on the button/pledge to choose the reward that best fits you!
To add more filters:
Click on “Manage your pledge”
Add the corresponding amount of the filter cost onto the total of “Your current pledge”
 Confirm your new total and keep the same reward option
Filters costs 5€, and filter lifespans average about 6/8 weeks depending on usage. 

Example: if your current pledge is 49€ for 1 Silver Mask 2 and you want 2 additional filters, add 10€ (5€x2) to your current 49€ pledge, for a total of 59€.
Silver Mask 2 is available in four different colors that fit perfectly with your style. 
We want to reward the loyalty of our backers, help us get 5k backers to activate the Silver Mask 2 premium color.

Silver Mask 2 enables many customizations whether you’re a team or an individual looking to wear something truly unique. At Banale we gladly provide this customization service on request. 
Choose the "Team pledge" to have Silver Mask 2 customized.
The five-year journey until the arrival of Silver Mask 2 enabled us to challenge the design world, creating innovative solutions to maximize safety, hygiene and style.
A special thanks to all our passionate customers around the world that continue to support our research and development by sharing their feedback and amazing ideas, empowering us to continue our mission of providing everyday products that solve everyday problems. 

Silver Mask 2 is the result of years of designing lasting products made from quality material. With more than five years of mask design experience, we know how much the little details matter on an everyday basis. With evolutionary design and innovation behind Silver Mask 2, it offers an everyday solution to your everyday routine.

Given the materials we have chosen, with Silver Mask 2 you'll never worry about your voice. We optimized sound engineering to allow for effortless breathability and clear sound while speaking, unlike traditional face masks.
Silver Mask 2 is entirely designed and manufactured in Italy.
Thanks to our 5-year partnership with BLS Group, a 40-year-old top global player in the respiratory system market, we've been able to constantly improve the technological assets and develop the design features of Silver Mask 2. 
Environmental and reusable product design is part of our DNA. That’s why we create quality products that not only last, but that offer a design you won’t get tired of. 
With Silver Mask 2 you can look and feel good, simultaneously doing your part to minimize excess waste created by disposable masks. The environmentally friendly and replaceable filter combo offers a design that lasts for all your daily needs.


Silver Mask 2 and its multi-layer filter technology is tested at the BLS GROUP laboratory, one of the world’s most advanced filter laboratories. 
To access the lab test report, please comment or send a message to support@banale.com. 

people around the world





 BANALE is an Italian word that means common, ordinary, not original.
We chose this word as a brand name in 2015 because it represented the opposite of the products that we wanted to design.
Unique and useful accessories that help you make it through daily commuting and long traveling more easily and safely.
At BANALE, we design creative accessories for urban nomads and frequent travelers, with a unique focus on the design and engineering of our Masks. 
Our team is made of different people with a common view: make the ordinary extraordinary with everyday objects.
For any further information about the product and the campaign, please contact us at support@banale.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are an experienced team with product development, and we know exactly how much time and effort this process takes. Moreover, we successfully funded 4 products: Silver Mask, Polo, Omni Pillow and Yoga Mat.

Our manufacturers already have the required components to construct a Banale Backpack, and they are very experienced and trusted in this industry. We are confident that we will deliver a high-quality product that meets the lofty expectations of our backers worldwide.

Our job doesn't stop after the campaign. Our number one priority once the campaign ends will be the upcoming global delivering process. Fulfilment and shipping is a big task when dealing with thousands of orders worldwide. We gained experience from the successful crowdfunding campaign of Silver Mask, Polo, and especially Omni Pillow and we will be meticulous and thorough when shipping the orders to our customers, giving ourselves enough time to manage each and every order.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Thanks to our replaceable filters and the self storage filter lasts up to 8 weeks.
Reusability and recyclability
We'll ensure filters disposal. With any new filters order we'll take the used filters back.

campaign.story:
Hi there, we're Nuzzie!
We're obsessed with designing the perfect weighted blanket.
We've been in business for over three years and have sold thousands of weighted blankets. Although our blankets get rave reviews from our customers, we weren't satisfied. We wanted to do better.
We totally reimagined how a weighted blanket looks, feels and is made. 
To preorder Nuzzie Knit at a steep discount to our future retail price, click Back This Project, or read on.  

What's Wrong with Traditional Weighted Blankets?
Not familiar with weighted blankets? We explain their benefits and the science behind them later on, but want to start with what we did to make Nuzzie Knit better than other weighted blankets.

Traditional weighted blankets are:
Filled with glass beads which can shift around and even leak (no one likes cleaning thousands of glass beads out of their bed)
Not very breathable, trapping in excess body heat (sweaty nights, gross)
Not machine washable or machine dryable (what century is this?)
Not very stylish 
We set out to fix all these problems, and more...
No More Pesky Glass Beads
Nuzzie Knit ditches the glass beads for our patent pending high density fabric filling, DuraFill™. By using fabric to add weight to the blanket instead of beads, Nuzzie Knit is more comfortable and durable.

Say Goodbye to Sleepless, Sweaty Nights
Our open knit design allows air to circulate, for better temperature regulation—you'll stay cooler in the summer and warmer in the winter
Easy Cleaning
Traditional weighted blankets need to be hand washed to prevent them from fraying, ripping and leaking. Nuzzie Knit's beadless design and durable fabrics allows you to just throw it in the washer or dryer—worry free.
Benefits of Weighted Blankets
Say goodbye to tossing, turning and counting sheep. Nuzzie Knit will help you fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer and wake up feeling refreshed.
Like other weighted blankets, Nuzzie Knit applies gentle weight to pressure points around your body making you feel instantly calm, grounded and stress-free...just like a swaddled baby. (It’s the same science!)
 Can a Weighted Blanket Help You? 
On a scale of 1 to 10, how well did you sleep last night?
We hope it’s a 10...but if you’re anything like the average adult, you’re not getting enough sleep. Restful and restorative sleep is crucial for your body to operate at peak performance throughout the day. In fact, the CDC declared sleep disorders a “public health epidemic”
That’s right, a public health epidemic. Getting enough sleep is a big deal.
→ The good news: Weighted blankets have been scientifically shown to improve your sleep quality. The gentle weight targets pressure points around your body, in a process called DPS or "Deep Pressure Stimulation". DPS activates the central nervous system, modulating its hormone production in beneficial ways. Specifically, it boosts serotonin (happy hormone) and melatonin (sleepiness), while reducing cortisol (stress).
Happy + Sleepy - Stress, completely natural and drug free! Now that's amazing.
→ The great news: The Nuzzie Knit can be of value to anyone in the following groups:
Anyone looking to improve their sleep quality 
People who have trouble falling asleep 
Remote workers who want to focus and destress during their work day
Adults and children with ADHD, anxiety, autism, restless leg syndrome, insomnia, and PTSD 
 Product Details
Specs
The Nuzzie Knit is 80" long and 60" wide (the surface area of a queen bed) and comes in 2 weight choices (15lbs and 20lbs). Please see the FAQ for a discussion on choosing the best weight. The fabric material is made of our proprietary patent pending DuraFill™ which is a high density fiber that is long-lasting and ultra durable. 
Care Instructions
Machine wash and dry.
Colors
We know, we know... we all love colors! The more the merrier and that's why we have 3 to choose from! You will be able to choose your color after the campaign is complete. We will be sending out a survey to all our backers which will allow you to choose your color.
We're No Newbies
With over three years of experience designing and making weighted blankets, we're confident that we can deliver. With hundreds of five-star reviews on our traditional weighted blankets, you can trust that we have the manufacturing capability and the customer service experience to make sure that you love your Nuzzie Knit purchase. 
 What Our Beta Testers Have to Say
We gave Nuzzie Knit prototypes to some of our past customers to stress test the product and find opportunities to improve and collect feedback. Here's what they have to say:
Join the movement
Help us bring this magical product to life! We’re offering steep discounts for our early backers. Seriously, you won’t see these prices from us again. 

Nuzzie Knit comes in 4 sizes:
8 lbs Child (60" x 41")
 15 lbs Queen (80" x 60")
 20 lbs Queen (80" x 60")
 25 lbs King (87" x 80")

To preorder Nuzzie Knit at a steep discount to our future retail price, click Back This Project.
Want two or more Nuzzie Knits? Simply double your pledge by adding a pledge bonus. So if you want two queen 15 lbs blankets, you'd add a $180 bonus to your pledge for a total price of $360.

A Message From the Founders
Nuzzie was born out of our own frustration with sleep. Like many of you, we suffered from insomnia and felt the negative effects during our waking hours. We tried every natural remedy out there, but nothing worked...until we tried sleeping with a weighted blanket.

After personally experiencing their therapeutic benefits, we were hooked and even launched our own blanket in 2017. Since then, we’ve become obsessed with customer feedback, researching materials and improving our product. It’s about time weighted blankets got a major design upgrade.

That’s where Nuzzie Knit comes in. We know it’s going to be a hit. We just need your help to help us get there. Thank you in advance for your backing, you won't regret it!
Get Your Project Funded Today!
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Unlike many Kickstarter campaigns, Nuzzie already has a mass production ready prototype as well as established relationships with manufacturers and shipping providers. 

We've been in the weighted blanket business for over 3 years and confident that we will deliver to all of our pledges.

The only tangible risk is that our production schedule may be behind our estimates. In this unlikely case, we will communicate with you as things develop so you know exactly when you can expect your blanket.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Our patent pending DuraFill fabric is one of the most durable fabrics out there and will be able to endure many wash cycles. The Nuzzie Knit also has no glass beads which means no leaking blankets which is the #1 reason that traditional weighted blankets are thrown out.
Environmentally friendly factories
The factory we choose will be in compliance with Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX which means there will be no harmful chemicals used in the production of the blanket.
Something else
We pledge to donate 1% of sales to the National Institute of Mental Health. Many consumers buy weighted blankets because of the negative effects of anxiety, insomnia, and PTSD. By donating profits to the NIMH we hope to reduce the demand for weighted blankets, thus contributing to the "Reduce" aspect of "Reduce, Re-use, Recycle".

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone,
Unfortunately there are unprecedented delays at major sea ports. Our logistics team has confirmed that the Nuzzie Knits are either A. in their containers at a port to be picked up by a semi-truck or B. in their containers on a ship waiting to dock at a port. 
There are 4 major factors at play: 1) large increase in consumer spending on the backs of stimulus checks increases the demand for imports, 2) many US companies needed to get shipments in to the US before the Chinese New Year, and 3) unprecedented and widespread winter storms causing shipping delays and thus shipping backups further up the logistics supply chain (sea ports), 4) COVID-19 affecting port and logistics workers.

Hi Everyone,
Unfortunately due to the extreme weather that has been occurring across the United States, there will be some delays in shipping. The dates provided in our last update are no longer accurate. I hope that the delivery dates will only be delayed by a week or so. We will keep you updated and will still be trying our hardest to deliver all our blankets before March. We are in contact with our logistics teams and will provide a more accurate update once we have one. We have no other information at this time.

Hello everyone! A lot of you have been reaching out about shipping updates and so we figured we should just post everything we have for all of you.
Here are the estimated arrival dates of our fulfillment centers listed by state:
CA: 2/12/2021

Hi everyone, just wanted to let you all know that our donation check is in the mail! As promised, we donated 1% of pledges to the National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH), and we threw in a little extra because why not :) Have a good weekend!

Hey everyone! Just wanted to send along some photos of the manufacturing process. We should be shipping these to our distribution centers within the next week and should be able to deliver all the blankets to our backers by mid-to-late February!

As a reminder, please finish your surveys on CrowdOx. We are very happy to see the completion rate increase dramatically since our last update but still there are 5% of backers that have not completed the survey and we want to make sure we get these blankets to anyone who backed us.

comments.content: Anyone find a fix for the edges rolling?

Hi Jon and Austin, We've exchanged a couple of emails previously. As I said, I love the weight and breathability of the blanket. I really don't love the edges curling up all the time in every direction. It's not going away at all and probably getting worse. I'm still hoping and wondering if you plan to deal with this on your next generation of blankets. If so, I would probably buy another one if you could guarantee that it wouldn't curl up. I now wake up several times a night with a 6" cylindrical lump where a nice even weighted blanket should be. I hope you can deal with this. Thank you.
I agree. The edge rolling is a problem. I end up rotating the blanket around to avoid the roll. Really like the blanket though!
The CrowdCox survey link seems expired, please let me know how should I proceed this.
Stay tuned
Is there any news about shipments to Europe? Thanks in advance for your reply.
I’m backer #330

It's not the virus that caused Justina to lose a sense of smell as that would require sinus and nasal congestion and doesn't require any testing. As Justina mentioned of suffering from insomnia, the most likely diagnosis is that her nervous system receptors are damaged decreasing her sense of smell. The CCP virus is bad quality like everything else from China and we must not jump to conclusions to blame every sickness and death on it.
I got mine yesterday. And the smell is just awful! Tried to air it out but still pretty strong after one day. Where does the smell come from? Is it safe to use it?

Thank for your response. What exactly is causing the smell? What chemical? I am sensitive to chemicals often added to new fabrics. They often “outgas” even after there is no odor, which isn’t healthy for me. So I need to know what is causing the odor. It has been outside, often in the sun close to a week and it still has an odor. Have you had the blankets tested?....Especially since some blankets have odors and some don’t?
When are you shipping to Texas? #663
Thanks for the quick response!
Just looking for some sort of timeline as to when I can expect to see this much anticipated product?

I am in love with this blanket. I suffer from insomnia and this blanket actually does help me sleep better. The use of the large knots helps with airflow, which is absent with a normal weighted blanket. I also can’t sleep under a normal weighted blanket because of the uneven distribution of weight hurts pressure points. I was pleasantly surprised at how well distributed the weight is in the blanket! My blanket had no discernible smell (have the navy/indigo color)
Justina you should be COVID-19 tested. The smell is real. No hate or ill-will is intended :) But if you cannot smell anything, that's a problem. FYI I am a doctor.
Thank you.
No worries, I am excited for it to come and thank you so much for the reply. ^^
any update on arrival at the IL warehouse?
In the comments below it is mentioned that West Coast orders are stuck in customs now. Would have appreciated an update as it is looking like "weeks" more.
I see several other comments with similar mismatched orders. What can we do to resolve this?
The response was pretty great customer service, too. Really appreciate it.

I really hope so too! I was so overwhelmed by the smell when I first commented that I forgot to mention, it really is a beautiful blanket, soft and a beautiful blue ( I got the dark blue). I didn’t mean to come off completely negative, as I do appreciate the good qualities. I’ll just have to wait to appreciate them more when I can actually be around the blanket
Product arrived today, wrong color for both. Please reach out to get this corrected
I received an email on the 17th saying it had been shipped. Received it on the 18th. That is fast!
In Colorado as well
Thanks for asking, I was wondering the same thing!
When are US deliveries anticipated? I will be moving in early February and set that new address as the shipping address. Is this ok?
I would like to change my previously selected color options on the survey. My previous selections are ‘locked.’ How can I do this?
Perfect, survey filled out, thank you!

I found the shipping cost is way too high for the European customer, and this was not mentioned before. I live in the UK and pledge $350 for 2 blankets. It will cost an additional $250 for shipping. I have pledged a lot of projects on Kickstarter, and most of them are from the US, but they all find a good deal with the distributor to bring down the shipping cost for EU customer. I understand the weighted blanket is a heavier item, but I found this shipping cost is unacceptable. Is there any chance you could resource a different distributor for EU customer? Otherwise, I might consider requesting a refund as I was not informed the shipping cost would be two-third of the pledge value.
Also: the shipping costs mentioned in the FAQs are pretty steep. Does that include taxes and duties?

May I ask why you've restricted the destination countries all of a sudden? When I pledged, it said clearly "Shipping anywhere in the world", and now, in the survey, I can't even select my country. Why is that? France is on the list, which is a European Union member like my country (Belgium), and therefore, both have the same import laws. Why would you export to the one and not to the other? It makes no sense. Could you please add Belgium to the destination countries as well? Thank you!
Thank you so much! I filled out the survey.

So I have 2 Early Bird queen Nuzzie, then do I have to pick them in the add on section? If so, according to the pledge summary (get 2 20lb queen blankets for $370) they should be $185 each but it only offers me to add on a queen blanket for $190 so is that a different add on? Would that add on a 3rd queen blanket to my order? In which case where do I go on the survey to tell what colors I want for the 2 blankets I am already getting as part of my pledge?
What do we have to do to finalize the survey?
Has that been sent out yet?
Hi, what is the equivalent size for a UK double bed? King or Queen?
Thanks again for the detailed explanation below!
Thank you so much for this detailed explanation!
@Nuzzie That's fair enough, hopefully it will be quite some years :)
@Nuzzie Fair enough thanks :)
And how is this different than Quietly?

I'm concerned whether this will truly be a weighted blanket and not just a heavy one. I knit myself, can I have a little more reassurance that this isn't just a knitted blanket and will actually be weighted?
@Nuzzie Ah interesting and sounds good. Thanks for clarifying :)
Hi Nuzzie, I've backed 2x 15lb blankets hoping that I will be able to upgrade one of them to 20lbs at the end of the campaign, will this be possible?
hi, will u be making the blanket in king size?
Also, any chance there’s a VIP level for the 20lb option? I’d probably prefer the heavier blanket, but I don’t want to lose the good deal that the 15lb VIP pledge offers!
Forest green would be gorgeous. I know there is an oatmeal color, but what about cream?
I agree with forest green!

Thanks, I weight 138lbs so was torn about the whole psi on a bigger blanket, guess I'll marinate on it a little..I've never owned weighted blanket, only slept with one on a friend's house and it was his childhood blanket from Korea
Any chance you'll offer a heavier version?
Excellent! How can my pledge be adjusted to get the 20lb model?
Never mind. I figured out how to change my pledge.

campaign.story:
The secret to ervet™ with Sanitized® protection comes from two of nature’s antimicrobial agents: Zinc and Bamboo. Zinc pyrithione is woven into our bamboo blend during the manufacturing process. 
Sizing Details
Queen: Flat sheet: 92x104" | Fitted sheet:60x80x15'' | Pillowcases:20x30" | Split-Comforter: 100x90" (50x90" halves)
King: Flat sheet:110x104" | Fitted sheet: 76x80x15'' | Pillowcases: 20x37" |   Split-Comforter: 120x90" (60x90" halves)
Cal King: Flat sheet:110x104"| Fitted sheet: 72x84x15'' | Pillowcases: 20x37" | Split-Comforter: 120x90" (60x90" halves)
Split-Comforter Sizing: International Backers, take note! Our Split-Comforter (Queen) sizing is 100x90"/ 254x228cm and we recommend this size for your bed sizes. Unless you prefer extra-large blankets, we do not recommend you choose the Split-Comforter (King) as this size is 120x90" / 305x229cm.

Sheet Sets: International Size Comparison Chart  
International Sizing Comp Chart (Sheet Sets only*)


Customize it your way!
We launched ervét because, quite simply, we didn't agree on bedding. For starters, we like to sleep at different temperatures. Not to mention, one of us is a bit of a cover hog. Sharing one comforter turned into a constant battle of tug-of-war every night, and buying bedding left one of us compromising on sleep temperature preference.
After launching ervét: A Two-Duvet Bedding System Designed for Couples on Kickstarter last year (and receiving amazing press, reviews, and award) we've been busy developing a performance bedding set that is more affordable, fresher, longer-lasting yet still customizable… to help our backers have their best night sleep yet and never go to bed mad.
With ervét’s Sanitized® treated Sheet Sets and Split-Comforter, you won’t have to worry about odors building up in your sheets, your partner stealing your blanket in the night or compromising on your preferred sleep temperature.
PLAY

PLAY


When you're finally ready to replace your sheets or split-comforter, we will help you donate them to our charity partner, Humble Design, where they will breath new life into a new home. This is the ervét sustainability promise.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our second Kickstarter. We understand risks and challenges are a part of launching new product concepts. We've been working with our manufacturer for two years and have a great working relationship. Any potential shipping delays will be communicated well in advance. Any time we've encountered issues with incorrect samples, or delays in getting samples, our factory has communicated to us every step of the way. That relationship is one we can pass on to our customers: trust, communication and honesty.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Treated with Sanitized® hygiene function, our sheets require less washing, so the fabric fibers stay in tact for longer.
Reusability and recyclability
Reuse () Recycle: when you are finally ready to replace your sheets, gently used sets we will help you donate them to our charity partner Humble Design where they will breath new life into a new home.  

For well-loved sheets, we'll send to our textile recycling partner where they will be remade into new textiles.

In return for donating, we'll give you a 20% discount on your next bedding set.
Sustainable materials
Each set of ervét sheets is made from eco-friendly, organic bamboo blended with recycled fibers, equating to 50 BPA-free plastic bottles per sheet set. That's 50 less plastic bottles in our oceans!
Environmentally friendly factories
USDA Organic
OCIA International Organic Certification
ECOCERT Organic Standard
NOP Certified 100% Organic
Certified Oeko-Tex Standard 100
Sustainable Distribution
Our sheet sets are packaged in a reusable Antimicrobial Travel-Size Laundry Bag - no plastic waste packaging.
Something else
Our Split-Comforter is shipped in vacuum-sealed recycled packaging, which reduces our carbon footprint as we do not use oversized shipping boxes which require more fuel to transport.

updates.update_userinfo: May Shipping Update: Remaining Backers Shipping Now
updates.update_content:
Greetings cocooners!
ervét™ + Sanitized®: Bamboo Performance Bedding is officially funded and on top of that, we've unlocked ALL 7 Stretch Goals during the campaign! 
THANK YOU FOR YOUR AMAZING SUPPORT OF ervét's SECOND KICKSTARTER!

updates.update_userinfo: April Shipping Update! We are almost there - team deep sleep!
updates.update_content:
Dearest dreamers,
The final 48 hours of the campaign is upon us! And since our last update, we've unlocked TWO additional stretch goals and are so close to unlocking our final stretch goal of $125k. Thank you all for your continued support!
We have a LOT of exciting news to share and in this update:

updates.update_userinfo: March Shipping update - First Backers Have Started Receiving Their ervéts!
updates.update_content:
Hello Dreamers!
Another week, another 2 milestones: $75,000... $87,500 (and counting...)! You guys are bamboooeautiful! We loved hearing all of your feedback and have been busy this past week working with our manufacturing and logistics partners.
We have some exciting updates as a result, so THANK YOU for your continued support.

comments.content: Received items in mail. Missing the sheet set. It's been ridiculous situation to figure out. There as been little help. I will change this comment if they ever find a solution. Please send the sheets of take every thing back and give a full refund.
I never got any communication from customer service to pick my color or to pay extra. And now it looks like the shipment is arriving in the states any days now. So... What did I get? I'm backer #778.

So much for getting our orders by the end of May...maybe you should stop giving estimates at this point and just tell us like it is: we'll get our orders "eventually." Hopefully. At this point, I'm just hoping it arrives before I move.
I’ve had to wait as long as 8 years to receive one of my Kickstarter rewards. I expect delays on all of my other open campaigns.
Thieves!!!!!

Clearly, you're new to Kickstarter. Sometimes you have to wait 2 years to get something. This is not a store, it's like a bet and sometimes you don't get anything. Just trust the one you gave your money.
It looks like I will be very close to my prediction of delivery in July.
I just filled out the typeform today. Then noticed the email indicated the form had to be filled no later than May 24th. Is my submission too late?
I haven't received any tracking info for my comforters. I didn't order any sheet sets, so shouldn't my items have shipped already?

I submitted the Typeform days ago, but there's no confirmation page or email; the survey just starts over. Also, I think it's extremely poor customer service for you to choose the color for a paid customer if they do not submit the Typeform by your deadline because of your bad deal with the factory.
I'll wait for the blue striped sheets.pls send form for me to confirm. thanks
Thank you!
Hi ervet, I would like to ask for those who received their pledges already since the start of this year, they were all plain color sheet sets? None were printed?

So it appears the backers orders who were shipped in the first batch included the lilac gingham. Those people wouldn't have to back pay the extra $25? But all of us who had to wait has to now pay extra to get the printed sheets/sets?
That aside, I'd love to change to a solid lilac color is if it was a slightly brighter purple. Right now it's a pretty dull purple. Far from the lilac gingham purple.
i can change mine to lilac.
Please just change my 3 sets to 2 classic blue and 1 grey. Thanks.
Thank you for having a little integrity and more importantly communicating what’s going on.
Why do the new classic blue and lilac colors look nothing like the the colors for Oxford blue stripe and lilac gingham?

So we're already uneasy because it's taken this long and now we need to pay $25 more for something we backed already, in a campaign that made several times the amount of its goal? When you ask backers for more money for something they've already ordered... Isn't that against KS's rules? It's basically holding us for ransom at this point. If we hadn't chosen already and whoops we can't make this color, sure, that's one thing. But what's the deal with this shoddy planning? USA backers and people who pledged for the two 'up charge options' are eff'd by this.
Just took a look at my order. It states my Cal/King comforter as being half All-Season. Hope that is a mistake as chose the full comforter to be All-Season.

I have been getting a message in my Junk Mail supposedly from FedEx stating they were not able to deliver my package Reward because my address is incorrect. I think it is just spam, but could you tell me if my reward has indeed shipped. Thank You.
We still haven't received our order. Is there a problem?
What delivery service is being used in the US?
I filled out the pledge manager. Any idea on when it will ship? If it hasnt shipped yet I will need to change my address

I asked about shipping exactly 1 month ago, and was told it would be shipping in 1-3 weeks, btw. Now it's "by the end of May." Is it just a guess at this point, or will we actually get this by the end of the month?
Will you offer a refund if, when we get our order, we are not happy with the product?
Seriously when can we expect information on this. All I see is they are on the way.
Hi, I have still heard nothing since April 12. Have you managed to track down my order yet?

Literally just opened the shipping box! So excited to have the blankets off up. Everything is so soft and I'm excited to get the sheets on my bed. You guys and gals did a dam fine job! Thanks again for being awesome
Already done. Waiting on reply now. Thank you.

i no longer require the twin sets. Wish to upgrade to 1 queen set. Also address is locked and will not allow me to change. This will need to be done manually. Please provide me way to change purchase and way to update the shipping address.
Our sheets got here a week ago and we love them so much!! Our only regret was just buying one set. They're so soft and comfy. Even the cat approves.
Still have not received my sheets. And now I need to change my shipping address if you have not sent them out. Please inform me what is going on?
Thank you for checking up on this for me. I hope it arrives before the summer!
I still have not received any bedding - which batch am I supposed to be in and what is the ETA? I am in US Backer 1316
pretty much everyone is batch 2 or higher. I was like 88 or something and will be in batch 2.
Hello Ervèt, I'd like to know in wich batch I am. Thanks !
Ps I am backer 536. It says it was shipped Feb 3rd and that’s the last correspondence I have.
Love the soft texture of my pillow slips! Thank you for a great product!

On March 13, you wrote “Hi Lynne, we're preparing for another update for this month and we'll be sharing it in the next few days. Your order is still on its way to the local carrier and we're hoping that it will be delivered to you any time soon.” I still have not heard or received anything. Is there any way to trace the status of my shipment.
Why is it taking so long between shipments? When is batch 2 going to be sent out?
How do I know which batch I’m in? I pledged $ in October... 6 months ago now.
Hi - I'm backer #789 - can you tell me where I am in the lineup for shipping?
Thank you for getting back with me.
I received my sheets earlier this week and slept with them for the first time last night — they are amazing! I love them!!
I'm glad you like them so much, this renews my hope :) Thank you for sharing!!
Hi I would like to know when will my new bedsheets be coming?
If I am in the second batch, and there is still no way of knowing, it appears it might arrive by July.
Wondering the same thing as Ice ...
Thank you!
That backed way after me**
I was hoping to change the sheet set from a queen to a king if possible (no change to the duvet or inserts).
Cant wait for this to show up, backer #1155 any update when this will show up?
I'm looking forward to getting these new sheets :)
Any updates? I haven’t gotten anything yet for any notice on shipping.
Hello, do you have any answer from the local carries? and when I can expect my shipment? Thank you.

And is it possible to change my address if it still haven't arrive at the local carries? If it is go to USPS they tend to refused delivery to my apartment lately then like to ship back to seller in 3 days. I would like to send to my UPS mailbox instead.
This sure would've been nice to have when I was without power for 4 days and freezing in my apartment...lol. Any idea when I might receive this in Texas?
Perfect! Thank yoy so much
Delete that comment, sorry. Was meant for some other bedding we backed. So sorry.

I received my package a few weeks ago and as we're in the hottest part of summer, just got around to putting the doona on the bed today. I am very disapointed that the king size cover is a good 10cm larger than the actual doona ON EACH SIDE. Yes, I took it out and tried a 90° turn but I had it lined up correctly the first time. With a "do not wash" comforter and 2 hairy cats that sleep on the bed, using without a cover is out of the question.
Received my notice of address lockdown on 1/26. It appears I could be in the second shipment. Perhaps those in the first got there notice in the first or second week of January.
Well,my address is about to be locked as I got an e-mail stating that they are about to ship me something. That is a good sign.

Thank you for the shipping update, much appreciated! I have a question though - my order was a super early bird, limited to the first 200 or so people, so I was wondering why my backer number was above 600? I thought being such an early adopter would mean my sheets would be in the first, or maybe second, shipment, not the last. Obviously I'm still very happy to be receiving my cosy new bedding, but I would have thought it'd be a bit sooner. Thanks! :)
Thanks for the reply! Looking forward to receiving mine soon :)

There isn't just one courier & you had responsible for remedy solution to make promise. I think everyone expect frequently update/estimate in order fulfillment. Everyone had their own plan while your project is hard to work with in loose management.
Hi when will my new bedsheets come?
Thanks for the update and happy holidays!
Hey thanks for the reply since the answer isn't a certain one could you please tell me how we would know which batch we're in . And what batch I'm in specifically. Thank you.
HOLIDAY CARD?

I and a lot of others have been really patient (and still am). However its things like this that makes matters worse. We understand what's happening with shipping and restrictions coming from out of the country etc. But isnt acceptable is a holiday card after the holiday. That's just salt on the wound. Try to be a bit more considerate of your backers. You do not have to wait til everything is in a tidy little bow (copywritten by your marketing team) this is something that could've been posted days ahead of Christmas. "Just a heads up guys the holiday card does not look like it's going to be available before Christmas..." in the next few days we're in the new year. We dont need the cutesy copy we just need the information.
I think it would be best if you post an update.
Thanjs! I will keep my fingers crossed.
Excited to hear the update, hopefully it's good news.
I thought it will be publish soon?
Thank you so much for quick reply. Good luck with everything ! Can't wait to receive your product.

campaign.story:
Meet Killacase™
Our antimicrobial phone case and screen protector protect your phone, keeping it clean everywhere, all the time. Have peace of mind at your fingertips!
yasss
Phones may look clean but they're not. We strongly believe most people, like us, care about personal hygiene but not enough to clean their phones multiple times a day. That’s why we created Killacase™.

There are over 1,000,000 germs on most phones which is 10x more than a public toilet seat. [1]
The idea came to us during the early stages of the recent outbreak. We realized that frantically washing our hands was pointless if we're going to use our dirty phones right after.
The only solutions were to continuously clean your phone with disposable wipes or UV sanitizers, which are high maintenance, wasteful, and temporary. So we created a low maintenance, reusable, and permanent solution.

We infused Killacase™ with silver because of silver's natural antimicrobial properties. It's one of mother nature’s most effective sanitizers.
Self-sanitizes in 1 Hour
Killacase™ keeps your phone clean even when you're using it. Unlike other products, our case and screen protector fully sanitizes itself within an hour.
How Does it Work?
When silver oxidizes, smaller silver ions are released. Then the following happens...
in other words...

Imagine germs as moths and silver as a lit-up bug zapper. Moths get attracted to the light and get zapped on contact. Now imagine a bunch of bug zappers teamed up, working around the clock.
Testing: We tested our prototypes with dozens of controlled Petri dish tests and at a microbiology lab, passing ISO 22196:2011 standards. 
The test is a specific method that evaluates the antibacterial activity of antibacterial-treated plastics and other non-porous surfaces and is the highest antimicrobial lab test standard. 
We are proud to say our lab tests have shown almost 100% efficacy within the first hour.
Why We Created Killacase™
9/10 people use their phone in the bathroom
We spend over 5 hours on our phone everyday
We use our phone in the dirtiest places


Phone Case Features
PLAY

 Ultra-Slim Profile 

Drop Protection  
Killacase™ absorbs up to 9 feet drops. We tested it at the most extreme heights and received SGS certification. With a raised screen and camera bezels coupled with Shockgrip corners, say goodbye to cracked screens and broken cameras.

Enhanced Acoustics 
Standard cases let sound waves flow downwards instead of towards you. We've changed that by redirecting the waves. It’s a small change but noticeable. Enjoy that extra bass!
Introducing KillaScreen
 KillaScreen is made with rock-solid tempered glass. Just like our phone case, it's infused with silver to keep your screen clean.
According to Shape, phone screens may contribute to breakouts. [2]
Together they are your one-stop-shop for
 360°, 24/7 protection for your phone. 

 Development & Story 
The “AHA” moment was easy, but developing a product wasn't so much. We started researching antimicrobial properties and found that silver is a very stable element. After multiple iterations, we're confident that our final prototype has all the protective and aesthetic features of the perfect clear case.
The final challenge is to raise funds on Kickstarter and gather enough pre-orders so we can start production.
Prototype Sketches
Prototype CAD Sketch
Prototype 3D Rendering

Logo Poll Results:
Thank you to everyone that participated! 
The winner is...

Rewards
Shipping
 Timeline 

 The Team 
Founded by three siblings
Special thanks to Syek, Su Ping, Sam, Tina, Sarny, Nicola, Won, Alex, Ana, Vanessa, Glara, Clarissa, Aaron, Jack, Tommy, Maxi, Jessica, Helen, Angela, Won, Dawson, Minsung, Anna, Jennie, Vincent and many more
There’s no way we could’ve achieved what we have if it wasn’t for these people. Thank You.
References
Click here for references.
Disclaimer
Killacase and KillaScreen do not cure, treat, or prevent illness(es) or condition(s). Killacase and KillaScreen are not  medical devices or treatments that prevent medical and health problems. Our company relies on the factual properties of antimicrobial silver, comments from microbiology professionals, and certified testing.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Funding and Interest:

The main concern we've had on creating Killacase™ is that there isn't an audience that appreciates our products as much as ourselves. Committing a huge amount of money to only learn that no one is interested would be our worse nightmare! That's why we're on Kickstarter to learn if people like our products and are willing to support us!

Logistics:

Mass shipping globally can be complicated. Thankfully we're working with a logistics company that has been shipping successfully throughout the pandemic. With their experience, we can solely focus our efforts on making our products even better.

Delays can happen due to external events. We promise that our team will do our best to ensure the best customer experience. After all, if we succeed it's because of you.

If you back us, we will deliver!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
All of Killacase’s designs are intended to be functional, protective, and long-lasting. Our cases and screen protectors are infused with silver particles and will last through wipes and washes.
Reusability and recyclability
We're using recycled plastic and paper for our packaging. Our ziplock packaging for Killacase is designed to be a reusable small toiletry bag.
Sustainable Distribution
We're making the packaging as light as possible since packaging makes up a majority of the weight. This makes shipping more sustainable.

comments.content: What happened that the project was canceled?

campaign.story:
My name is... Krysta Crawford, I've been drawing and writing stories for over 15 years for friends and family. I have decided to finally self publish my first comic book and my first Kickstarter! This kickstarter is also part of the make 100 campaign in support of small creative endevours and therefore this run will be limited to only 100 backers; 50 regular covers and 40 metallic covers and 10 limited edition gold covers. This first edition will never be reprinted with this cover again. This will be a 20 page fully colored book in standard comic size. 
What is Wolf and I?
"Wolf and I" is the first installment of a comic written and illustrated by Krysta Crawford, detailing the story of a college student named Violet and her best friend who can communicate with ghosts in the compelling tale of how Vi's life turns upside down after her grandparents unexpected truth leading to a close encounter with a mystifying stranger, and the concealed origin of her parents history. 
Sneak Peek Preface:
[I'd never realized how bizarre my life was until my last year of college or how my childhood memories would be the key to keeping me alive. It never bothered me that my best friend not only saw but was dating a ghost. It was something you just got used to when you had known each other since elementary school and your imaginary friends weren't so imaginary. The fact that I never knew my father because he left before I was born and my mother died in a car accident when I was six leaving me to be raised by my grandparents was just part of life. I could read people's emotions like an open book, but everyone has some sort of gift right? Then the nightmares started to get worse and random strangers kept staring at me everywhere I went. That was just the beginning....]
Interior two page spread
So, why kickstarter?...
As a new artist, I chose Kickstarter to be the funding platform to take the big step into the world of authorship and raise funding for the initial printing and launch of my first-ever self-published comic book! If you back this project you are helping me take a dream into a reality and be able to cover the initial costs of printing, shipping, and getting my first book into local comic shops and libraries. 
That's cool... but where is the money going?
I'm a visual learner so here is a pie chart of all that financial stuffiness... 
Shipping and Handling! 
All tiers will come with the comics packaged in a bag and board and shipped in a Gemini comic shipping mailer for protection.
I've backed...so now what?
This is the exciting part! You've helped an indie artist launch her first comic book! This project has 30 days to fund and if it does (fingers crossed, tell your friends!) we are expecting to finish wrapping up the final pages and submit the files to printing for review in March 2020. Then we will receive the hot and fresh off the press books which will be individually signed and numbered by the artist, carefully packaged and shipped. Our aim is to get everyone's comic and goodies in the mail by May 2020 (or earlier if all goes extremely well!)
Until then keep a look for updates here on Kickstarter! and follow the artist/author on Instagram and Twitter @FleurDeVillainy
BUT WAIT!.....
There are STRETCH GOALS!
ACHIEVED $1000- Every backer will get a print with their comic!
ACHIEVED $1250- Every backer will get a button pin 1.25 inch with their comic!
$1500- Every backer will get a sticker with their comic!
$2000- Four extra art pages in the book!
100 backers- All backers will receive an enamel pin of the wolf.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The story is completely written, the comic is halfway illustrated, printing company has been contacted with quotes and turnaround time. The risk to backing this project would be delay in shipping due to production time. We plan to prevent this by submitting files to the printer before schedule and keeping open communication with backers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: Thank you all so much for being the first backers for  Wolf and I issue one! Many of you know that issue two "Magic Rising" is LIVE right now on Kickstarter with 9 days left to go! I know many of you have backed issue two already but I wanted to let everyone know that we've officially hit 85% funded of our goal with 9 days left! As we are getting closer to funding I wanted to let you all in on a few of our "stretch goal" plans. First! Once we hit $1600 (which is only 100 more than our funding) ALL backers at comic level and up will receive a holofoil howling wolf/moon sticker ! Additionally we have plans for another  sticker, bookmark, 5x7 prints and another enamel pin to add on as stretch goals as the campaign grows!

updates.update_userinfo: Wolf and I: magic rising Launching today!
updates.update_content:
The day has come! Wolf and I: Magic rising- the second issue in the wolf and I series is going LIVE today at 10am PST. 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/fleurdevillainy/wolf-and-i-magic-rising

To all my wonderful supporters of Wolf and I... I have exciting news!
Wolf and I: Magic Rising is launching on Kickstarter August 9th, 2020. We've been working extremely hard to get the book rolling and ready. You can follow the project so you know exactly when it's ready to check out! We've got some great things planned with issue two including 4 exclusive covers from Flying Frog Illustration, Cara Nicole/Alfred Trujillo, and Sam Sawyer, and a Cosplay Cover from FleurDeVillainy.  I hope you loved Wolf and I issue one and continue as the story grows and develops. Feel free to share any photos on social media of your book and swag!

updates.update_userinfo: Check your post boxes in the next few days!
updates.update_content: Happy Saturday! I hope you are all staying safe. As of today the LAST Kickstarter backer package has been taken to the post office! I know some of you have already recieved your books and have posted on social media the last few days which is so exciting! I sent the books out in batches to make sure I didn't miss anyone. I hope you all enjoy your copy of wolf and I, your stretch goal rewards and your wolf enamel pin. If you are looking forward to issue #2 feel free to follow us on social media for updates! We will be posted an update here to all backers first when the launch date will be so that you have the first dibs on getting a copy. We will be doing a special "first dibs" limited run sticker for issue #2 as an early bird thank you!

I am over the moon excited to be able to post that the comics are done, the bags and boards FINALLY arrived and we will begin shipping out issue one of Wolf and I over the next week!
Please please please! If you have not filled out your survey take a couple of minutes to do so because without the vital information it asks I cannot ship your order!

Thank you all so much for being the first backers on the comic journey of Wolf and I. I have some very exciting news for you all and some housecleaning. Each of you should be receiving today in your email provided a survey for the address you want your comic and rewards shipped to. Please fill this out as I can't ship if I don't have an address!
Secondly- the fun stuff! While we didn't hit the 100 backer goal for the enamel pins stretch goal I made an executive decision that as a huge thank you for backing my very first kickstarter and comic you all will receive an enamel pin who picked up a comic! This has been a crazy fun journey and learning experience and I appreciate all of you and your support. ALL of the stretch goal rewards in IN! Enamel pins, prints, stickers and button pins!

Hey everyone! I wanted to thank you all once again for backing this first edition of Wolf and I! The book is coming together faster than anticipated (yay!) keep an eye out in your email this week because I will be sending out a backer survey to collect some information on addresses etc. Until then you can see up to date WIP's photos and information on our social media as well as live streams as we wrap up the last pages of the comic to get it ready to send to the press!

Thank you everyone who helped support me and buying a copy of my first comic Wolf and I. All backers will receive the following stretch goals with their comics: print, sticker, and a button pin. Unfortunately we did not hit 100 backers (this time) so enamel pins will be postponed until book two, but I look forward to finishing the art and shipping all the goodies out after March! Follow me on twitch, Twitter, and Instagram @FleurdeVillainy for WIPs and updates!!!!

Thank you all so much for backing and spreading the word! We are only 3 days away until the end of the KS and have 67 more books until we reach our cap of 100 for the MAKE100 campaign! We are only one pledge away from all backers getting a free 1.25inch button pin with their comic and print! But the most exciting news is that if we manage to hit 100 backers, selling all 100 comics in the next three days, all 100 backers will receive a free enamel pin of our wolf shapeshifter!!
