campaign.story:
FAQ
What are the ingredients?
Answer: Cocoa Butter, Coconut Sugar, Caramelized Coconut, Turmeric, Black Lava Salt Crystals, Essential Oils of Cardamom & Black Pepper.
Check out Jae adding the black lava salt crystals by hand:
Is your chocolate vegan approved?
Answer: YES!
Is your chocolate paleo approved?
Answer: YES!
I hear your packaging is compostable!?
It is! As a company we're committed to reducing food waste, so all of our packaging is 100% compostable in municipal and industrial composting facilities according to ASTM D6400 specifications. 
Check out Eka and Justin packaging some bars by hand:
Is this a "white chocolate"?
Answer: NO! Technically speaking, white chocolate is supposed to have dairy in it, so this bar doesn't meet the definition of white chocolate. Additionally, since we created this bar from "cocoa butter to bar" we're able adjust the ratios of all the ingredients, which is why we're able to use the same amount of sweetener that a dark chocolate bar typically has. The bold, lightly bitter turmeric root balances the sweetness and makes this bar truly unique amongst other chocolate bars in the world. 
I have an allergy to ________, can I eat your chocolate?
Our facility processes tree nuts, and this bar contains coconut. Our craft chocolate micro factory is free from all other major allergens like wheat/gluten, soy, and dairy. 
Is your chocolate organic?
YES - this bar will be 100% certified organic!
Is your chocolate fair trade?
YES - as a company we typically buy cacao and other ingredients decoupled from commodity market rates, which means farmers can depend on a steady, higher-than-market rate level of compensation for the ingredients we purchase from them. We're big believers in fair & transparent trade for everything we do! Check out the blog on our website at www.endorfinfoods.com/slowchocolate if you'd like to learn more.
Tell me about your single origin cocoa butter!
The cocoa butter we'll be using to make this bar is pressed from single origin, regeneratively grown cacao from Ecuador, from a farmer group we've been purchasing from for several years. We're the first chocolate company in the world to have paid higher levels of compensation for regeneratively grown cacao, and to commit to sourcing 100% regeneratively grown cacao for all the bars we produce, whether its this new Golden Mylk bar or any of the other bars in our lineup of all-stars and award-winners.
I've heard that golden milk needs to be consumed warm and/or with black pepper to be absorbed, how does this bar achieve maximum bioavailability?
To release the full bioavailability of the healthy compounds in turmeric, it needs to be heated in the presence of lipids (fats) for a period of time, and consumed with a small amount of black pepper. By virtue of the chocolate making process, the turmeric is exposed to hot molten cocoa butter for 12+ hours before we add just a touch of black pepper essential oil during the tempering process, to achieve the perfect balance of flavor and function. We've done all the work for you to have a perfectly portable, edible version of golden milk any time of day. 
Do you have your own website outside of Kickstarter?
Yes! Check it out at www.endorfinfoods.com - we've been in business for over 5 years!
What's the shelf-life for your chocolate bars? 
A little over a year from the date we make them.
Can you send me information on purchasing these bars wholesale for my boutique, grocery store, etc?
Yes! These bars will be available to current and future retail partners around the United States. Please send an email to orders@endorfinfoods.com if you're interested in our wholesale program.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The only challenges we could see from this project is getting serious demand, which would just mean we'd need some extra time to make and ship all the bars for backers of this Kickstarter.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Early Bird Special - 5 Chocolate Bars
support.descp: Be one of the first in the world to try Golden Mylk chocolate! This level includes 3 Golden Mylk bars with Turmeric & Caramelized Coconut Mylk, plus 2 additional dark chocolate bars from our lineup of award winners & best sellers, all delivered in a cotton drawstring gift pouch.

support.title: Kickstarter Special - 5 Chocolate Bars
support.descp: Be one of the first in the world to try Golden Mylk chocolate! This level includes 3 Golden Mylk bars with Turmeric & Caramelized Coconut Mylk, plus 2 additional dark chocolate bars from our lineup of award winners & best sellers, all delivered in a cotton drawstring gift pouch.

support.title: Early Bird Special - 10 Chocolate Bars
support.descp: For the chocolate lover in you! This level includes 5 Golden Mylk bars with Turmeric & Caramelized Coconut Mylk, plus 5 additional dark chocolate bars from our lineup of award winners & best sellers. Your bars will be delivered in a cotton drawstring gift pouch with stickers and a subscription discount code that will never expire and can be used as many times as you like! You'll be able to gift discounted chocolate subscriptions to anyone, or sign up for yourself any time in the future.

This level includes 5 Golden Mylk bars with Turmeric & Caramelized Coconut Mylk, plus 5 additional dark chocolate bars from our lineup of award winners & best sellers. Your bars will be delivered in a cotton drawstring gift pouch with stickers and a subscription discount code that will never expire and can be used as many times as you like! You'll be able to gift discounted chocolate subscriptions to anyone, or sign up for yourself any time in the future.

support.title: Early Bird Special - 25 Chocolate Bars

This level includes 15 Golden Mylk bars with Turmeric & Caramelized Coconut Mylk, plus 10 additional dark chocolate bars from our lineup of award winners & best sellers. Your bars will be delivered in a cotton drawstring gift pouch with stickers and a subscription discount code that will never expire and can be used as many times as you like! You'll be able to gift discounted chocolate subscriptions to anyone, or sign up for yourself any time in the future.

support.title: Kickstarter Special - 25 Chocolate Bars
support.descp: For the serious chocoholic! This level includes 15 Golden Mylk bars with Turmeric & Caramelized Coconut Mylk, plus 10 additional dark chocolate bars from our lineup of award winners & best sellers. Your bars will be delivered in a cotton drawstring gift pouch with stickers and a subscription discount code that will never expire and can be used as many times as you like! You'll be able to gift discounted chocolate subscriptions to anyone, or sign up for yourself any time in the future.

support.title: 1 Year of Chocolate
support.descp: Get 5 Golden Mylk bars plus a full year of our Community Supported Chocolate subscription, with 3 brand new bars shipped direct to your door every month.

support.title: 5 Years of Chocolate
support.descp: You win!! You'll receive 25 Golden Mylk bars plus five years of our Community Supported Chocolate subscription, with 3 brand new bars shipped direct to your door every month. Thats almost 200 chocolate bars that aren't be available anywhere else in the world, at 10% off the normal price for every box.

support.title: Origin Trip to Ecuador
support.descp: Join us on a visit to the smallholder farmer cooperative we purchase cacao from on the Emerald Coast of Ecuador. We've been purchasing fine flavor Arriba Nacional cacao here for years, and are proud to be the first chocolate company in the world to support the growth of regenerative agricultural practices by co-developing a premium program to compensate farmers for the extra work involved to implement these types of practices. This package includes beachfront hotel accommodations plus breakfast & lunch for 5 nights / 6 days. Flights, dinner, alcohol, and optional activities like surfing & horseback riding not included, dates TBD.

support.title: Origin Trip to Ecuador for Two
support.descp: Same as above, but with a shared room. You'll have the option to choose the bed configuration in your beachfront room between a shared bed or two beds, so this is a great option for friends or couples.

support.title: Food is Medicine Sticker + Recipes
support.descp: Get one of our classic "Food is Medicine" stickers and a recipe book download, including a recipe for Golden Mylk macaroons and more! Like all the small batch chocolate we make, all recipes will be plant based and free of allergens and refined sugar.

We're having a Valentine's Day sale on our website, and naturally you're invited to get some deals and have us send chocolate to your loved ones across the country!
Use the discount code "kickit" to get 20% off all chocolate bars (including Golden Mylk bars) and gift sets (including our very popular

updates.update_userinfo: Give us feedback on your Kickstarter rewards!
updates.update_content:
By now you've had a few weeks to dig into the assortment of bars we shipped out to you in December, and we'd love to hear your feedback in the form of short, sweet, and thoughtful reviews.
To review the bars you received, click on the link below for that flavor to go to our website. We can't thank you enough for your feedback - you'd be surprised at how much reviews from our fans help us out in the long run!

updates.update_userinfo: 50% Discount on Subscriptions • Last Minute Holiday Gifts (Kickstarter Backer Exclusive)
updates.update_content:
Hi friends -
Thank you so much for your patience as we recover from the fire that seriously threatened the stability of our small chocolate company back in August. It's been a wild and crazy year for our team, but we're pulling through and excited to have finally finished production on all the chocolate bars we need to fulfill the rewards for our Kickstarter.

Hi friends --
Thank you all so much for your kind words after my last update regarding the fire. It has been crazy inspiring to hear the outpouring of positive messages and support from you all. I'm so grateful for all of the kind words, messages, and offers of support. 
I'm writing today to confirm that we have all the Golden Mylk bars ready to go to fulfill ALL levels of Kickstarter rewards! We've moved on to getting the dark chocolate bars produced now, and if all goes well we should have the rest of the bars needed to start sending your shipments out by the end of this month.

updates.update_userinfo: Special Message for 1-year and 5-year Kickstarter Subscribers
updates.update_content:
Hi friends -
It is with a heavy heart that I let you know that a few weeks ago we had a fire at one of the facilities where our production takes place. There were no injuries, but a massive amount of chocolate was consumed by the flames or rendered unusable due to damage from the smoke. 
Over the last few weeks, I've been trying to keep our small team and the company as a whole moving forward in whatever way I can. Insurance will eventually come through and cover a lot of the losses, product will eventually be replaced, and we will eventually be able to ship your goodies out for this Kickstarter.

updates.update_userinfo: Golden Mylk Bars Ready - Dark Chocolate Bars Coming Soon!
updates.update_content:
Hi friends-
Things are moving forward with all things Golden Mylk chocolate! The first round of Golden Mylk bars was just finished, and we have a few more to go that we'll be working on over the following weeks. After that we'll turn our attention to the additional dark chocolate bars that will be included with your shipments, including some really wonderful limited edition bars that you'll be the first in the world to try.

Hi friends-
Great news - we're on schedule to start fulfilling pledges in late September / early October! 
I will be sending out surveys for your perks in early September, so keep an eye out for them.

updates.update_userinfo: Please fill in your rewards survey if you haven't already!
updates.update_content:
Hi friends -
Thanks again for making our Kickstarter a success! We're on track with purchasing, equipment, and all the other things necessary to fulfill rewards starting in September as planned.
In the meantime, I wanted to share another Kickstarter project that I'm really excited about that my friend Sana Javeri Kadri and her company Diaspora Co. launched to fund the purchase of the best CARDAMOM in the world. Seriously, it is AMAZING. Check out the Kickstarter , and please make a pledge!

comments.content: Really good! My order arrived today, it was late due to my own forgetfulness but wow!! I tried the tumeric bar and it tasted amazing! Stay healthy.
I so much wish you shipped internationally. Ate all my bars with family back in the USA over holidays, and now I am back in Hong Kong, craving Tumeric bars.
Thank you.

I got the rest of my order a couple days ago. The bars are great, such a unique flavor that I really enjoyed. I appreciate the work done to complete this campaign, and I will definitely be buying from Endorfin Foods in the future.
The tumeric bars are great. However, the coffee ones kinda stink, personally, as I hate coffee. I know, weird, but oh well, me. Unfortunately I seem to have gotten a lot of them in my assortment :(
At the end of the day we invested in a creative men sharing his love for unique cacao chocolate recipes. I highly recommend others to subscribe to the monthly shipment!
Thanks so much! I look forward to trying them!

Got mine. Wow, Ok, after many failed and scammed Kickstarter campaigns (that seems to be the norm now for Kickstarter), this was a very welcomed They were fabulous (no, haven't eaten them all yet, but it's a fight). Great stuff!
Tumeric bars were ridiculously good. Any chance you'll ever ship internationally again? I picked mine up when home for the holidays, but am usually based in Hong Kong.
K

It seems that the only response is going to be blaming your supporters for not understanding what we were backing. It's difficult to understand a thing that somebody never says. 231 projects backed, this is the first time I have ever had to report one to Kickstarter. Shame.
Has anyone gotten anything other than the message with a promise to "work it out"?

Nowhere did it say that I would be receiving Pumpkin Spice Bars, you have only said that there would be Golden Mylk bars and a line-up of dark chocolate bars. If they are golden mylk bars why do they say "Turmeric Latte" and the others say "Golden Mylk." When stores that sell your product order Golden Mylk bars do you send them the Pumpkin Latte bars and tell them they didn't understand what they ordered?
That's a pretty sad response to people pointing out your mistake. Hopefully you'll think about this over the weekend and come back Monday with something better.
Also - in your answer to my earlier comment you called me "Chris". Nice job of cut & paste.

That is not correct at all Brian. I did not back a project for something that included 'A line of turmeric bars'. I backed a project that had five bars whose ingredients were Cocoa Butter, Coconut Sugar, Caramelized Coconut, Turmeric, Black Lava Salt Crystals, Essential Oils of Cardamom & Black Pepper.There was nowhere that indicated I would get anything else. You need to fix what I backed or you need to refund me. This is a bait and switch.

Since I see you're replacing people who are short bars, I was short three Golden Mylk Tumeric bars that I pledged for. Since I didn't get them and you're sending replacements in January, I await my bars.
I don’t like pumpkin spice and would not have pledged for them. I don’t feel I have received what was promised.

Nowhere in the pledge or in the project description do I see it stated that the Golden Mylk bars are a "variety pack" or would contain any other flavors or ingredients than those listed on the project description. If this was supposed to be a variety pack, why are some receiving pumpkin spice but others receiving espresso? Why am I getting three pumpkin spice bars and only two plain? How is that a variety? There was no mention of any kind of flavoring being added to your bars besides what you list. Please send me the three plain Golden Mylk bars that I pledged for. I will not be eating or enjoying THREE of the FIVE bars I paid for at this point.

I see now that the bars are espresso + pumpkin spice. Neither of which are flavors I enjoy. The point here is that had there been any communication about this at all, I would never have paid for something I already know I would not enjoy. Trying to pretend that people are just being uptight or have somehow misunderstood the offer is very insulting.
Total 23 bars (short by two)
And... given the understanding and patience your backers showed you during your fire, it's doubly infuriating to be mistreated. No good deed ever goes unpunished, I guess.

I agree with Patrick Fjeld. It feels like a bait and switch when you substitute the Espresso Pumpkin Spice flavor for the Golden Mylk bars. I pledged for 5 Golden Mylk bars and got two. There are 3 of the Espresso bars. You say that the coffee flavor is barely noticeable but believe me - for those of us who hate coffee, it's obvious and awful. Doesn't matter if I stick them in someone's stocking. In the end, I feel gypped - and left with only 6 bars for myself (since one of the chocolate flavors was Turkish Coffee.) I didn't pledge for a "twist" on the Golden Mylk. I pledged for the Golden Mylk. If you were going to slip in a different flavor you should have at least only substituted for one or two bars - not 3 out of 5.

I just received my package, and there's a problem. Only two of the five golden mylk bars I received have these ingredients. The other three are Espresso Pumpkin Spice flavor, which is not mentioned anywhere in the campaign. I can't stand the taste of coffee, and I am not a fan of pumpkin spice so these bars will be going in the trash. I am very disappointed.

I chose to pledge for 5 mylk bars with cocoa butter, coconut sugar, caramelized coconut, turmeric, black lava salt, essential oils of cardamom, and black pepper along with 5 randomly selected dark chocolate bars. I did not back for two of the above mylk bars and three mystery flavor. Had that been offered, I would not have taken it because I wanted five of those bars. What you did is called a bait and switch. So is there a resolution to this or do I just leave with an awful impression of your company?
If I might suggest a better approach would be to acknowledge the mistake (it WAS an error) for presuming without asking, and ask what you can do to make things right. JMHO

I received the email asking if my address is correct, but it only has my name and street address, which are correct. It does not include the city, state, and zip code. Have those been redacted in the email?
Yes this is normal.
It is indeed a security measure and there should be a link with the email where you can check the rest of your address.
There Facebook also didn't have an update in the last couple of days. So we will see.
An update would be great.
Your last update was solely for your subscribers and said that they would receive orders in a week or two. What about about the rest of us? Any progress on getting a shipping date for us?
Do we have an update on the shipments?
How's the progress on recovering from the fire going?
I’m sorry about the fire. I need to update my address
So so sorry to hear about the fire! I’m relieved no one was injured but can only imagine how difficult things must be for you all right now, on multiple levels. Sending many good thoughts your way!
I’m so sorry that you’ve experienced another set back. Hopefully you are up and running again soon. I’ll happily wait for my reward. Keep smiling! :D
I am so sorry to hear this. Please hold tight, it is always darkest before the dawn. BIG HUG!
Thank you!
Hey is there any update?

Hi there -- I just sent an update out letting everyone know there was a fire that consumed a large amount of product. We will recover, but the timeline for fulfilling Kickstarter rewards has been pushed back a few more weeks. I'll be sending another update when we know the ship date, so stay tuned! Also, it'd be best if you deleted this public comment, to keep your personal mailing address private on the internet! Please feel free to write me a message if you're sending any personal info.
So FREAKING excited to sink my teeth into these!
Thanks

Just wondering why this product is available in stores before being sent out to kickstarter backers. I bought one just the other day right off the shelf.
Unless I’ve missed an email, it doesn’t seem like any other updates have been sent out. Have the survey’s been sent out yet, as the last update I had received stated early September? Thanks!

I don't necessarily agree with that. Kickstarters have an obligation to fulfill their promises to their backers, of course. But my backing is out of a desire to see the business/project succeed. If that means waiting a little longer longer for my booty, that's ok with me.
No update for a month. What's going on?

Congratulations! Looking forward to tasting your exotic chocolates for the first time.

Your bars will be delivered in a cotton drawstring gift pouch with stickers and a subscription discount code that will never expire and can be used as many times as you like! You'll be able to gift discounted chocolate subscriptions to anyone, or sign up for yourself any time in the future.

support.title: 1 Year of Chocolate
support.descp: Get 5 Golden Mylk bars plus a full year of our Community Supported Chocolate subscription, with 3 brand new bars shipped direct to your door every month.

support.title: 5 Years of Chocolate
support.descp: You win!! You'll receive 25 Golden Mylk bars plus five years of our Community Supported Chocolate subscription, with 3 brand new bars shipped direct to your door every month. Thats almost 200 chocolate bars that aren't be available anywhere else in the world, at 10% off the normal price for every box.

support.title: Origin Trip to Ecuador
support.descp: Join us on a visit to the smallholder farmer cooperative we purchase cacao from on the Emerald Coast of Ecuador. We've been purchasing fine flavor Arriba Nacional cacao here for years, and are proud to be the first chocolate company in the world to support the growth of regenerative agricultural practices by co-developing a premium program to compensate farmers for the extra work involved to implement these types of practices. This package includes beachfront hotel accommodations plus breakfast & lunch for 5 nights / 6 days. Flights, dinner, alcohol, and optional activities like surfing & horseback riding not included, dates TBD.

support.title: Origin Trip to Ecuador for Two
support.descp: Same as above, but with a shared room. You'll have the option to choose the bed configuration in your beachfront room between a shared bed or two beds, so this is a great option for friends or couples.

updates.update_userinfo: Kickstarter Relaunches TOMORROW MORNING - Free Bars for Backers of First Kickstarter!
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone -- 
Thanks so much for your enthusiasm and support over the last few days. TOMORROW MORNING we are re-launching our second Kickstarter, and I'm going to give everyone that backed our first Kickstarter FREE CHOCOLATE if you pledge again.
VERY IMPORTANT: there are an extremely limited number of pledges at the below levels for this Kickstarter. Make sure you make your pledge as early to get the best deal, because once they're gone, that's it!

Dear friends,
A lot has happened since I launched the Kickstarter almost a month ago. Truth be told, I haven't been able to spend the time I'd planned on getting the word out about the fundraiser for a lot of reasons, the main one being that my mother-in-law passed away less than a week after launching. 
I've been focusing my time on being with my partner and loved ones in this delicate time, and I don't regret it a single bit. Thanks to everyone receiving this message, we've managed to raise over 50% of my original goal. But with hours to spare we aren't going to make it, so I'm going to have to cancel the campaign.

updates.update_userinfo: 200 Backers and Counting - Please Help to Share Our Kickstarter!
updates.update_content:
Hello again friends -
Thank you all so much for your contributions! We're in the middle of the Kickstarter now, and have officially reached 200 backers - a big milestone! As of the time I'm writing this though, we're only at about 36% of our goal with 13 days left. This is a critical time in the fundraising campaign that will make us or break us, and as you probably remember as a Kickstarter if we don't raise our entire goal we receive absolutely NOTHING and ... This would be a sad day for everyone for sure!

updates.update_userinfo: We've got 99 backers and I'm glad you're one!
updates.update_content:
So thrilled by the support we've received thus far! 
We still have a long way to go!
I'm writing today to ask you to share our Kickstarter fundraising campaign wherever you can, and write something short, sweet, & personal when you do.

campaign.story:
Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering Hurdle Hanger. You'll get a special backer discount, and you'll receive your stuff before it is available in stores. 
The reason your clothes don't get hung up on hangers after you finally find that daily look of the day and then throw everything all over your room is because of how inconvenient traditional hangers are. 
Nevertheless, to maintain a clean room, or to keep our clothes in the best condition, we organize in some kind of way. 
By using the wrong organizing methods below
Introducing a clothes organizing solution that removes all of the existing inconveniences of pants maintenance such as crumples, crease, clip marks, and having to take out items from the pockets to help you organize your pants in an easier fashion. 
Hurdle Hanger can be applied to all wardrobes including tall and low types, and can organize clothes according to the material and condition. 
This version has improved the problems with Hurdle Pants Hanger's BETA version which had issues of tilting and being slippery, and will be pre-launched on Kickstarter.
.
.
Hello
 I never cleaned up my clothes in the past.  
This year, I promised myself that I would start to clean up my room and clothes more often, but I didn’t stick to it for long. I started wondering if there were any robots that could organize my clothes. I tried to rationalize my thinking, 'I'm too tired!' While kicking myself and thinking, 'Why am I so lazy?’. So I questioned myself, ‘Is the reason I don't clean up my clothes because of the inconvenience of clothes and pants hangers?" 
 If organizing clothes was as easy as throwing clothes somewhere, I would never be late for work in the morning because of not being able to find clothes to wear. Or I would never be sad because the clothes that I put all over the floor would get creased by the time I return home. 
 I created clothes and pants hangers that are easy to use even on busy mornings and on evenings when you're tired. I am pre-launching 'Hurdle Pants Hanger' through Kickstarter to get away from the stress of having to organize and clean up. 
 I hope you will be free from this stress by easily organizing your clothes with the Hurdle Hanger.   
Thank you
  info@collabospace.design
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If we succeed in obtaining our funding goal then we will start to discuss with different production plants to proceed with mass manufacturing. We are well aware of the related and relevant systems based off of the research done on many successful crowdfunding campaigns and so we are confident that we can deliver our product quickly and appropriately. Unexpected problems with the Hurdles Pants Hanger mass production process may delay reward delivery. As we continue to proceed with the project, we will update our backers on the progress of our product, mass production, and shipping related news as soon as we have them.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

@Robert Schramm: I assume you're in Germany: Try to contact the customs via the mail address, normally it works well to send them a scan/screenshot of your credit card receipt and the Kickstarter information. In the most cases they'll reply to you with the necessary amount you need to pay (not the 28,50 the Deutsche Post wants to earn, but only duty and European VAT, which is way less). After you transfered the money to the customs, they're able to return the parcel to DHL which will bring it to you for free. Did the exact same thing with my hurdle hangers (and many other things). You might just ask the customs about the situation with two parcels, but I think it shouldn't be more than 20 Euros for you to pay😊

campaign.story:
The combination of unique self-adhesive fabric and special design enable one bag to transform into many shapes. The fabric sticks repeatedly, and unlike Velcro, it is super soft!
Perfect companion for your travel and fitness
Just stick the black color to the gray color, much like the positive and negative side of a magnet. There are no magnets, and the material sticks to itself, so it’s PC safe. 
This patented material is nothing like anything you've seen on the market.
The combination of self-adhesive fabric and proprietary design allow a few properties you wouldn't expect from normal hook and loop fabric, such as:
The fabric doesn't lose strength and sticks repeatedly.
Super soft and crinkle free.
Easy to stick and unstick despite the insane durability and strength.
But we weren't happy with the bag alone.
1. Briefcase
No need to worry about the size and shape of the item you carry! Flat, cubic, ball, stick, small, or big, regardless of the size or shape, Origami Bag can carry it easily and relieves your stress!
2. Yoga Bag
Carry yoga mat and your fitness gears in one bag!
 3. Food Carrier
4. Grocey Bag
 5. Laptop PC Case
You can wrap your laptop and put it into your regular bag. Origami Bag absorb shocks to the delicate devices.
 Also good to keep small devices like a camera safe in a bag
6. Bag Strap
  7. Neck Pillow
It’s more than a bag! Origami Bag can also be used as your travel tool; a neck pillow in the airplane, a blanket, or a bag strap. Unlike a regular neck pillow, origami neck pillow supports 360 degree of your neck, and make seamless transformation to a blanket.
Take it with you on your adventures and make your travel more comfortable!
 8. Blanket
9. Shawl
10. Camera Case

11. Book Strap/Yoga Mat Strap
12. Electronics Wipe
The fabric is super soft. Good to wipe PC screen, camera lenz, and glasses!
13. Glasses Case
Protect your glasses in a bag.
14. Camping Pillow
Make a pillow instantly from a Origami Bag and a towel. You can adjust the thickness of the pillow just by adding towel.
The Origami Bag is 35in x 35in flat. That's 90 x 90cm.

The Origami Band is 23in x 4.3 in flat. That's 58 x 11cm.
The years our R&D team spent developing and perfecting this product have paid off. Our manufacturer firmly committed to shipping these beginning June 2019.

We are so confident in our product, we are backing it with a 1-year warranty. If you’re not satisfied for any reason, send it back to us, and we will supply a new one.
Shipping will be charged after the campaign. 
1) Origami Band: USA $5 /International $10
2) Origami Bag: USA $10 /International $20
3) Origami Set: USA $10 /International $20
4) 2 Origami Sets: USA $10 /International $20
5) 3 Origami Sets: USA $10 /International $20
*We are now working hard trying to minimaize the shipping charges.
We promise to deliver within 7 months of the last day of our campaign. We know we have the people, partnerships, and manufacturing schedule to make this happen.
If for some reason our schedule runs more than 30 days behind, we will throw in free Origami Band in every order.
Due to the history products not delivering on Kickstarter, we understand your concern about backing projects and seeing your money disappear. Too many creators have over-promised and under-delivered, shipping products in poor packaging, with bad materials, that look and function nothing like the images.
We want to overcome all of your fears, objections and possible concerns with the Origami Bag. If you ever have a question, please email us at support@modernninja.net and we'll get back right away.
If you're interested in sharing this project with friends, here are a few links:
- Facebook
- Twitter
- Pinterest

In partnership with Funded Today:The world's most successful crowdfunding agency.
Video: Tucker Debevec
Photography: Zack Pass
Are you a Kickstarter enthusiast?
Find out how to get 10% cashback on projects you love
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We look forward to delivering this to backers!

Our team has over 16 years of experience delivering textile goods. All main technical issues were resolved during the development of the functional prototype.

The only question left is how many we need to produce. Depending on the number of backers, production times may increase accordingly. Assuming we meet our current pledge goal, we are confident we can deliver by May 2019.

We'll make sure to stay transparent on production times if they change, and keep you updated with photos and video of the production run.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
The Code10 sling is the perfect way to carry your tech with you - lightweight, comfortable and theft-proof, it's designed to let you take your tech and EDC items everywhere, in complete safety.
Our unique cut-proof material is made from Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene (UHMWPE) and a fibreglass core. 
The Code10 Commuter is ideal for business meetings, weekend trips and urban carry. It allows you to manage your tech, clothing, documents and everyday carry items - all protected by our unique cut- and waterproof material.
Our unique cut-proof material is made from Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene (UHMWPE) and a fibreglass core. 
Unlike the majority of cut-proof fabrics, our material is lined with a waterproof layer, making it impervious to rain and heavy moisture.
Easily organise all of your daily essentials. The main compartment of the backpack can be separated from the rest of the bag - perfect for clothes, camera equipment etc. The rest of the bag is loaded with pockets and organiser areas to stash your stuff.
Feeling in a messenger mood? Bringing a backpack? The commuter easily switches between three different modes - backpack, laptop and messenger bag - perfect for any occasion. 
Where do you ship from? 
All of our goods are manufactured in China and will be shipped directly from Hong Kong. 
 Do you charge for shipping? 
We charge a small amount for shipping. The cost varies from country-to-country. You can see the price during the checkout process. 
 Will I be charged Tax in the EU? 
Customers in certain countries in the EU (France, Germany, UK, Ireland, Italy and Spain) will NOT have to pay tax on arrival. We will pre-pay all customs taxes, duties and admin fees meaning no sudden surprises during delivery! Customers in other EU countries may have to pay tax but we will do our best to minimise these. Please note that other than the countries listed above, we are not able to pay these taxes on your behalf. 
Will I be charged Tax elsewhere?
Taxes vary from country to country and due to the global nature of Kickstarter, it's impossible for us to make arrangements for every single country. However, we have done our best to minimise any taxes and import fees for you by either shipping from local hubs or pre-paying the taxes on individual shipments. Backers in France, Germany, UK, Ireland, Italy and Spain do not have to worry about additional taxes and fees, as we have paid these in advance.
Backers in the following countries should also not have to pay any additional fees: the US, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Hong Kong, Japan, China, Korea and Taiwan. Based on our experience, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia and Philippines should generally be fine but larger pledges (e.g. the multi-pack) may incur additional import fees. Backers in other EU countries may have to pay VAT or other import duties. Backers in Mexico, Brazil, India and Russia should be aware that the import process can be quite tricky and you may need to provide us with your tax information prior to shipping. 
How long will shipping take? 
Shipping will take between 3-7 days for most countries. We'll update all backers several days before our shipping commences and will notify you as soon as your product is on its way. Will my products be trackable? Yes! All orders will be fully trackable. We'll send tracking numbers out to you via email 2-3 days after your order has been shipped.
Can I get a refund if I don't like my product? 
Unlike most Kickstarter campaigns, our backers are able to claim a refund if they change their minds. Please be aware that the Kickstarter fees are not refundable and the return shipping fee will be borne by the backer. 
 Is there a warranty on the bags? 
Yes! All products come with a one year warranty. The warranties cover all manufacturing defects. More information can be found on our website. 
How do I contact your support team? 
Please send an email to support@code10bags.com 
 OTHER QUERIES If you have queries or concerns about Kickstarter and backing a campaign on Kickstarter, please visit the Kickstarter FAQs here. 
 Who are Code10? 
Code 10 was founded by Chris + Charlie, two product designers from Switzerland and the UK. We met whilst working in Hong Kong a city where your working life and the outdoors blend together. We both love to travel, surf and spend our time adventuring, which is how we ended up deciding to make perfect adventure bags!
 Why Theftproof? 
 Although Hong Kong is generally a safe place, it’s still a big city and there’s always the risk of pick-pocketing and petty theft. We therefore designed the pockets on the bag so that we could keep our valuables in an easy-to-reach position, but also completely out of reach of criminals.
Why Waterproof? 
With regular "Code 10" typhoons, Hong Kong can be a very rainy place - like many tropical places, it can go from sunshine to rain in a matter of seconds. Over the last few years we therefore found ourselves using waterproof bags a lot, especially if we knew we would be taking our laptops to a client meeting in the morning, then heading off to a beach or a hiking trail in the afternoon.

campaign.story:
The Really Useful Chord Progression Poster makes playing chord progressions and composing music easier and more fun.
-
  Overview

So you’ve thought of a nice melody for your new song...but how do you write a great chord progression to back it up?

Well, every Major and Minor scale has its own unique ‘set’ of 7 basic chords - chords that sound good together because they’re all made up of notes from the same scale. If you know the scale of your melody, these 7 chords in the corresponding set give you an instant starting point. Move between chords in a set, and move between sets themselves, to create unique chord progressions for your music simply and effectively.



Now this process is even easier with The Really Useful Chord Progression Poster!

The poster displays all 24 Major and Minor chord sets on one easy-to-read poster, giving you everything you need to create interesting chord progressions and jam away to your heart's content. It’s fully illustrated, so you don’t have to be able to read traditional musical notation to use it. But even if you can, it’s a lot more immediate and easy to use. It’s just the right size to fit on your wall in front of your piano or keyboard. And they ship anywhere in the world, making it the perfect gift for yourself or someone you love.



Formats
The poster is available in a range of formats to suit different budgets and applications. We’ve got you (and your wall) covered.

Digital Version - Downloadable, printable PDF version of the poster. This will be sent out immediately after the campaign is over.

Folded – A1 Size. Printed on 170gsm gloss paper. Folded down to A4 which means it is much cheaper to ship. Comes with a FREE Digital copy of the poster as soon as the campaign is over.

Rolled - A1 Size. Printed on 250gsm gloss paper. Comes rolled in a cardboard tube. This means there are no creases in the poster, but it does cost more to ship. Comes with a FREE Digital copy of the poster as soon as the campaign is over.



Funding & Rewards

Funding

We've developed the product, designed the brand, built the website and shot the video. Now, all we need is the money to fund our first print-run, so we can get The Really Useful Chord Progression Poster off the ground and into the hands of those whom it will benefit.

Rewards

We have a simple reward structure, with something for everyone.

1. Our ‘thank you’ reward which is for anyone who wants to donate £1 or more to our campaign.

2. We are offering our ‘Digital’, ‘Folded’ and ‘Rolled’ versions of the poster as rewards.

Download links to the Digital version of the poster will be sent out as soon as you have given us your email address by filling in your Backer Survey.
Assuming you fill in your Backer Survey in time, we will endeavor to ship your physical poster in the first week of December. This means with a bit of luck, your poster will be with you by Christmas!

Conclusion

This poster was designed out of a genuine need to bring certain learning resources together onto 1 easily-accessible format. We are really happy with the end product, and genuinely believe it will help many people learn to play and compose music far more easily. We love that thought, we love this product and we love this business. We hope you do too.


Packaging

Depending on which version of the poster you buy, it will be shipped in different packaging.

Folded – These A1 posters are folded down to A4 size (the same size as a sheet of office paper) and placed inside a mailing envelope. This means the overall package is very small and light, therefore it is much cheaper to ship than any of the other options.

Rolled – This version is the same size as the Folded version (A1), but they come rolled rather than folded (meaning they arrive with you crease-free). They are shipped inside an A1-sized cardboard mailing-tube, which means they are more expensive to ship than the Standard version.

Carriers & Transit Times

All versions (apart from Folded posters shipping to the UK) are sent via tracked and signed services, meaning you'll receive a tracking number for your order once it has been dispatched, and you'll be required to sign for the package once it reaches you.

UK
Folded
Service: Royal Mail 1st Class Average transit time: 1-2 working days
Rolled
Service: Royal Mail Special Delivery Average transit time: 1-2 working days

Europe
Folded
Service: Royal Mail International Tracked & Signed Average transit time: 7-10 working days
Rolled
Service: Royal Mail International Tracked & Signed Average transit time: 7-10 working days

Rolled

Cost

Rolled - £8

Europe

Rolled - £11

We've developed the product, designed the brand, built the website and shot the video. Now, all we need is the money to fund our first print-run, so we can get The Really Useful Chord Progression Poster off the ground and into the hands of those whom it will benefit. We’ve set a realistic funding target and we see very little risk that we will not be able to fulfill all rewards, but if there are any issues with production, our backers would be the first to know.

updates.update_content:
Apologies to everyone for the delayed response, we were having a much-needed rest after another hectic but successful campaign!
I'd like to thank each and every one of you for your support, it means so much to us to know that you find our posters as useful as we do. Needless to say, we couldn't make it happen without you.
Just to update everybody - all the posters have been printed and packed up, ready to be shipped. Please, if you haven't done so already, can you fill out your reward survey, as we can't dispatch your order until you have done so.

updates.update_userinfo: Only 3 days left of our campaign!
updates.update_content:
We’re 27 days into our 30-day campaign to launch our latest poster:
The Really Useful Chord Progression Poster
We’ve done really well so far, raising more than 200% of our original target – thank you! But there’s still time to grab a copy of the poster (we’re even offering bundles including our original piano poster) at a reduced rate, before anyone else.

With 7 days gone and 22 left to go – we’ve just hit our target! Thanks so much to everyone who has supported our campaign, needless to say we owe it all to you.

As a thank you, we’re introducing a new reward - The Really Useful Bundle
The bundle features both our new Chord Progression poster and our original Piano Poster, for a discounted price. Another bonus being you pay the same shipping for 2 posters as you would for 1.

updates.update_userinfo: We've just been featured on MusicRadar!
updates.update_content:
The lovely folks at MusicRadar have just published a feature about our campaign:
https://www.musicradar.com/news/the-really-useful-chord-progression-poster-could-look-great-on-your-studio-wall
It's always great to be endorsed by such a reputable Music magazine, and hopefully it will give the campaign the boost it needs to get over the line!

updates.update_userinfo: Less than a week in and we're at 70%!!!
updates.update_content:
Hi everybody,
Just a quick update to say thank you for all your support - the campaign is already at 70% with 24 days to go, so I'm really hopeful that we can get this over the line.
Please do share the campaign with anyone you might think would be interested in it - I'll be in touch in the next week or so with another update.

campaign.story:
No more capsule coffee
Just 10 seconds
The Fastest Coffee in the world
ARE YOU READY FOR NEW WAY OF COFFEE LIFE ? 
Coffee is an opening ceremony everyday, and we don't have much time to prepare.
Get rid of your coffee machine !!  
All you need is Tiremo drip-stick coffee, the most convenient coffee for just 10 secs needs with pure coffee bean.
IDEA
T'remo was created all the way  from one simple thinking.
"What if teaspoon and coffee-bag are combined together?"
You don't need teaspoon, just stir, it's the easiest way to have pure coffee 
 Comment (After open result)  
T'remo balances body and incense very well (S. Chang, 5 yr barista) 
If someone prefers darkflavor, I recommend S capsules, but, for mild flavor, I would go for T'remo (R. Shuwarz, 15 yr barista) 
T'remo brings out various flavor with bakery (J. Parker, 8 yr barista)
Our facility has the line for producing the Ver1. products. with 25 workers. If funding is achieved the goal, we will upgrade the equipment for Ver2.  
 Free shipping in US except US (1 set), EU, AUS, Japan, China (HK) 
My story 
After 5 years of striving T'remo into the real world, we released first version of drip-stick coffee last year. 
This year, we developed second version with change size / flavor / design of product with various supports from affliated company in the US (Hitrons Solutions Inc.) and launched the product to Kickstarter.
Your support will enable us to upgrade the production for Ver 2 (Kickstarter project) to reward backers. 
My final goal is to change the coffee life style of the world and Kickstarter is the first big step. 
Just try it, I think you gonna meet the new style of coffee.

campaign.story:
Guys, let's be real. Do you really love your dress shirts? 
We always make trade-offs when we buy shirts. Maybe we love the fabric, but hate the fit. Or we love the fit, but hate the collar or cuff... Now is the time to stop settling! 
At Woodies we guarantee a perfect fit, you design a shirt you'll love, and our new Stain Repelling Performance 2.0 Fabric will have you looking fresh. 
 Our new Stain Repelling Performance Shirt will have you looking good, staying clean and feeling comfortable.  
 Prone to spills and stains? We've got you covered! We use proprietary stain repelling technology to ensure that you look great. 
Our Perfect Fit Guarantee is what you'll come to love most. If on your first try something doesn't feel right, we'll send you a complimentary remake! We accomodate any sizing.
Enjoy a full range of unconstrained movement with our smart stretch fabric. 
Get from Point A to Point B in style and looking fresh. Our shirts are Iron Free. 
This fabric has been in development for 2+ years. And we're proud to bring a 97% cotton, 3% stretch fabric that's packed with features you'll love. 
Soon after we wrap up the Kickstarter, we'll be sending you a voucher to redeem your pledge on www.woodiesclothing.com. 
1. You'll enter in your custom sizing (with as little as your height, weight and average shirt size)! We use advanced sizing algorithms that calculate all your measurements in seconds.
This shirt is made custom to your sizes (and we accomodate ANY size)! 
2. And you'll select your customizations.
*optional customizations - placket style, back pleat. 
Soon after we launched, we received many requests for pledge add-ons of our Performance Chinos, we thought that the Performance Shirt 2.0 and Performance Chinos would make a perfect team!
You choose the sizing, style and color of the shirts and chinos. You'll be able to make these selections once the campaign ends. 
Much like the Performance Shirt 2.0, The Performance Chinos are full of features you'll come to love (think - stain repelling, moisture wicking, smart stretching, etc...)
With our innovative fabric you'll be wearing our shirts a lot more, and doing a lot less laundry... And you'll help save the environment along the way!
 We sell directly to you. No retail markups. No middlemen. 
We strive to give backers a great value and through our direct-to-consumer pricing we maintain the highest level of quality and construction. 
*We've added considerable cushion room in this timeline. We'll be working very hard to surpass our deadlines.  
We love Kickstarter. Our team is constantly backing projects, and finding inspiration from the creative community. We've launched several successful projects of our own, and have delivered great products to happy backers! 
We love our Backers, and you're integral to our business. We're in constant contact with our backers, and many of our strategic and product decisions are directly influenced by your feedback. 
With your backing and support, we'll purchase these new fabrics and start production on this new line of our Stain Repelling, Performance Shirt 2.0! 
Thank you! 
- Jacob (Founder, Woodies Clothing)
OUR MILL
We're working with a renowned mill that we know and trust in Asia (they were actually the mill behind our original Performance Shirt). They methodically surpass all of our quality standards. We've been developing this fabric in collaboration with this mill for 2+ years. 
We're working with multiple textile patents to ensure that your Performance Shirt 2.0 keeps up with your busy life. 
OUR PRODUCTION TEAM
We've worked with our production team since the beginning. They're a highly qualified team of tailors that do incredible work. 
Want to see more unfiltered reviews? See what people are saying here. 
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $250MM raised between them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With manufacturing abroad, there is always a chance of delays in production. We have added a buffer in our delivery time to meet (if not exceed) our backers expectations. We are a lean team, but will be working hard for a timely delivery.

We will be working closely with our manufacturers and will be monitoring the Kickstarter closely to anticipate production and allocate capacity appropriately.

If there are any delays or unforeseen circumstances we will keep our backers posted via updates.

Thanks!!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

comments.content: Woodies delivers another incredible fitting piece of clothing for my wardrobe. Beautiful fitting clean and crisp white shirt, ready to take me places once this pandemic lets us back out into the world. Looks awesome on and helped me dial in the perfect fit, even after all this time that has passed (not Woodie's fault!) Really appreciate the extra effort, thanks again Woodies, great job!
It it possible to get my money back? I never used the coupon.
I am waiting for an answer. My redeem coupon didn't work. I try to redeem last year and since then I am waiting to order my 4 pending shirts and 1 pants. Awful service!!!
I love these shirts. *Exactly* as advertised. More colors maybe?
Anything new incoming?
I also haven't received my shirt. What is going on?
Chris

Received my shirt yesterday. It’s a nice thick fabric, soft to the touch. Looks good. I found the sleeves a bit too long, but the fault is entirely mine, as I it is done according to my measurements. In terms of “performance” features it has 2-way stretch and is water-repellent (I tried pouring water on it, and it just beads off). I didn’t find it particularly moisture wicking or wrinke-resistant. I suppose it’s the flip side of being made from a natural fabric. Generally, I’m satisfied. Thanks!
Hi, we're almost June and still nothing from you for an order placed in January... Any update? Shipment tracking?

After several months I have received a shirt and one pair of chinos. It has been very disappointing because the items are not "performance" at all ("lots of wrinkles, the chinos are like other standards Inés). Also the shirt arrives with a mark (big brown "X") in the inner part. Why??
Hi, I haven't received yet, can you please check my order? Thank you.

Got my v2.0 Shirt today in Los Angeles, Ca. and the fit looks awesome! The material is really luxurious and the two-way stretch gives the shirt even more of a comfortable feel. The construction of the shirt is top notch and feels exactly like the shirt was tailored just for me. Very sturdy and high quality like I expect from @Woodies, no surprises there. Sturdy collar and cuffs for sure, and thanks for the spare collar stays. I didn’t get the center back collar button like I asked about but, still great work Woodies. As always, thanks for coming through for another successful campaign!
Beautifully tailored shirt arrived (first of two backed). Nice job, Woodies.
Received my 2.0 performance shirt today in Japan. Thanks Woodies Team!
Today I received half of my order, is the other half on it's way?
if you cant for-fill then please refund me
Great! I wear my watch on the left wrist.

All in, this shirt compares more to the non-iron Charles Tyrwhitt ($40) or Twillory ($60) shirts I own. I was expecting significantly more performance and travel-readiness for a shirt retailing for $130, which is more than what I paid for the Bluffworks or MoS shirts that I really adore. To be fair, it was never marketed as a travel shirt, but I assumed that at a minimum the non-iron would compare to a non-iron CT or Twillory. Lesson learned, I suppose.

campaign.story:
How To Get All Your "Stuff" Done Each Day: Kittens!
Artist: Adam Koford
Plan your day. Make more time. 
Have more fun. Save some cats.
We all have too much to do in a day. And there are no less than one gazillion productivity tools to help you do everything on your list. And it’s not just YOUR list, is it? It’s the list from work. The list from school. The list from life! And then there’s laundry or dishes or just buying toilet paper and putting it on the dang roll.
You know who doesn’t worry about stuff? Kittens. And yet, look at them go. Little productive members of feline society, such as it is. Kittens get the same 24 hours you do, I do and every  king, emperor and president has ever gotten since the dawn of time.
The trick to getting stuff done is managing those 24 hours. We've gamified your productivity AND added adorable cats.
The cards in Kitten Things Done are designed to help you make yourself accountable, in a tangible and fun way -- and to DO all the things you have to do each day. It’s flexible enough to use it with other productivity systems, like Reminders on your iPhone, or a web-based, collaborative online project management system. Really! Think of it as a meta-tool. 
How It Works
Build your deck using the cards included. There’s a good sampling of the “stuff” most people who work in offices have to do: Meetings, planning, projects, checking email, and so on (full list below). Each card is a 30-minute increment, so you build a daily deck of 16 cards for your 8-hour day, then another 16 for when you get home, and we’ve thrown in an 8-hour “sleep” card because we’re optimistic you can get fully rested.
As you go through your day, you’ll “play” each card, and set a timer for each item. As you work through the cards, you’ll see the discard pile add up, meaning you’ve been very productive! If you don’t get to something or want to put it off, just toss it in the discard pile or move it to tomorrow’s deck.
Before you go to bed, check what you did that day by looking at your discarded cards on one side of the wallet (or whatever system you have for keeping track -- it could be your back pocket, we’re flexible!).
Now, before you go to sleep, build your next day with the cards in the deck and whatever you pushed off to tomorrow. Your day can’t total more than 24 hours! But it CAN total less, especially if you’re on vacation…
When you wake up, as you do stuff, just move the card that matches what you’re doing to the discard side and voila! You’re keeping track! You’re getting stuff done!
Now, the idea here is you can use KSD cards as you see fit. They could be something you go to when you’re like, “what do I do next?” Or, you could use them as you check things off a list, moving through your deck to account for all the big and small things you accomplished that day. There are cards that allow for flex time, or time spent chatting with co-workers, and so on. Plus, if you suffer from decision fatigue, just pull one randomly and let fate decide your next task! 
Designed For Real-World Use
Personally, I developed these while working a 50+hours a week gig in tech news. I worked at home, and it can be hard to stay on task. So I started using the Pomodoro technique, which makes you focus on a task for 25 minutes and then take a 5 minute break. That’s essentially the system! But Pomodoros are just blocks of time. I had generally similar things to do every day, but not always. Some days I’d have a two-hour meeting, and others I’d need two hours to just write. I hated juggling projects, so I needed a kicker to remind me to jump into project mode. All of this was coming from a very unstructured life, but one I had to keep on track every day. I merged the notion of blocks of time based on stuff that had to get done (projects, checking email, writing, etc.) with Pomodoros, and originally called it Pommes. 
But kittens are more fun. Plus, I now have two kittens, KitCat and Jiji, and they are as opposite as night and day. I had planned to write a book on how kittens get stuff done without really trying, but I like games, so here we are. And there's sort of a game included... those numbers on the cards actually account for the energy you "gain" while doing things. Some are energizing, some are depleting. If we get go over our funding level, we'll explain how that works in more detail with a special treat.
Buy now and save
The Psychology
Build your deck as you’d like to spend your time through the day. Put the LAST thing you want to do that day FACE UP (meaning the kitten doing the thing is facing up on the table), then keep adding stuff face up. Ideally, Evening Ritual is that first card (on the bottom), and Morning Ritual is at the top. 
As you go through the day, take the card off the top, and move it over (and turn it over for maximum satisfaction). If your day gets thrown off whack -- maybe a fender bender, maybe a forgotten lunch at home -- you can just move the cards around! Nothing wrong with that.
At the end of the day, you can easily see what you missed in your plans, and tomorrow you can course-correct. 
This gives you the brain rush of checking off a to do list (which you can still do!), and something tangible so you're not checking your phone or computer and getting distracted all the time. 
Support Saving Cats and Artists!
A portion of the proceeds will go to cat rescue groups. My hope is we can keep making decks, with different artists and themes, plus booster packs, to fit everyone's needs over time. Both of my cats are rescue cats and I believe it's important to help control their population AND find them happy homes! A portion of the print sales will also go to the artists who contribute. 
We have the printers ready, we have the designs done, and we have the rescue groups picked out for this crowdfunding round. Now all we need is you!
Designed for work AND play!
Questions? Just ask!
Thank you for helping make this dream come true!
Keep an eye on the website: kittenstuffdone.com as we’ll announce booster packs and tips on working with the cards! We'll also have a full list of all the artists and where you can find their work outside of the KSD project.
List of Cards in Base Deck
Here's the list of 50 base cards included in what is essentially a starter pack, which seems to fit most of our daily workloads.
Instruction Card
One special 8-hour "sleep" card (the only card that isn't 30m)
Two blank cards you can write on in permanent marker for whatever extras you need
One "Flex Time" which you can just leave face up all day to account for all those times when stuff happens outside your control (Bob just keeps popping into your office, doesn't he?)
One Exercise card, because that's really the minimum, right?
Two Meditation cards, which is wishful thinking but oh so nice
Two Driving cards, as the average commute in the U.S. should be around 30 minutes (don't worry, we'll have booster packs, or you can use a blank or wild card)
Two "Wild" cards, to account for even more random stuff, or use more flexibly than the blanks you write on
One Napping card, which is always nice
Two Project Work cards, to account for those work projects
Three Cooking cards, because homemade meals are really best for you
Two Shopping cards, which you hopefully won't use every day
One Set Goals! card, to account for those life goals and work goals you need to think about
One Focus Time which can be used for anything, really, as long as you commit to focusing on it exclusively for 30 minutes
One Staring Into Space card, because sometimes we need to stare out a window and consider if we should have bought a boat
Two Lunch cards
Two Dinner cards
One Breakfast card
One Hobby Time card, because everyone should have a hobby!
Two Email cards, because you shouldn't spend too much time in there
One Medical Appointment card
One Shower/Bath card
One Planning card, which could include all sorts of planning, like parties if your name happens to be Angela (that's an Office joke)
One Phone card, in case you still use those
One Journaling card. If Marcus Aurelius could find the time, so can you!
One Social Media card, because you should limit this!
Two Reading cards, which could be books, or more email (egad!), or even internet articles
Two Entertainment cards, which is how we relax
One Snack Time card
One generic Work card, in case you just needed to be reminded
One Stretch/Yoga to get your day off to a good start or need a reminder to wind down
Two Social IRL cards in case you're needing some face time with friends
One Meetings card (yeah, that's wishful thinking, but the ideal meeting should only be 30 minutes!)
One card for Chores
One Morning Ritual card for brushing your teeth and, uh, other things
One Evening Ritual card for... again, brushing your teeth and such
Of course, you're not going to use ALL of these every day -- but we think it's most of the stuff you're likely to do!
Next Steps
With over 20 years of media experience, this isn't my first rodeo. This project has been years in the making, and what you're seeing is the culmination of a lot of refinement and rework. Our supplier is reliable, and there's about a dozen spreadsheets to guide us. We're going to do our very best to ship everything in time for the holidays!
Of course, the artists are the real heroes here. From locals to well-known illustrators, you can find the full list of artists and their contributions on the Kitten Stuff Done website. 
Plus, we've got a lot of future plans! Braille decks, decks with dragons and other fantasy creatures, lots more booster packs and perhaps even some surprises... Later this year we'll launch forums so people can share success stories and trade ideas and tips. This is the beginning of a long journey, we hope!
Stretch Goals
Here are some stretch goals if we EXCEED our funding goal:
At $10,000 = We'll make the cards using an air linen-finish, plus orders of 2 decks will get a free wallet. And everyone who orders at least ONE deck gets a sticker!
At $15,000 = Enamel Pins unlocked! Buy for just an extra $6 on your order, free stickers for everyone! 
At $20,000 = Plastic Cards unlocked! A 52-card deck deluxe edition PLASTIC cards for $20 (over 20% off)
At $30,000 = Art of Kittens Book Unlocked (Available for $45) a picture book of all the artwork (Spring 2019)
At $45,000 = Artist-specific coffee mugs! ($20 each) & everyone gets a poster!
Reference the artist and what the cat is doing to order a print
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Cards could be subject to tariffs, there could be snafus with printing, and shipping is always a risk factor. I've had years of experience selling things online, plus providing services, and I've spent a considerable amount of time finding a reliable source for all rewards. I have a small team ready to fulfill orders in a timely manner, although if this goes really big we could have to delay some late orders.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Kitten Stuff Done Logo Sticker
support.descp: A cute little sticker to show your support! Domestic shipping only. If we unlock our stretch goals EVERYONE who buys at least one deck will get a sticker :)

support.title: Donation to project and cat rescue
support.descp: We'll split this one 50/50 with a local cat rescue group! The other half goes into the kitty so we can continue our work building more decks and donating a portion of the proceeds to more cat rescue groups throughout the year.

support.title: Base Deck of 50 Cards, 20% Off Retail
support.descp: Get the base deck: This includes enough cards to plan a couple of days for most office workers (see card list). It includes a card for sleeping, and plenty of cards to plan an 8-hour work day, your commute, and stuff to do after work. Cards are poker-sized (2x3"), and have a durable coating. Includes tuck box. As an early adopter, you'll get 20% off the retail price!

support.title: 2-Sided Vinyl Wallet + Base Deck
support.descp: A special pocket-sized vinyl wallet with one side for the cards you have yet to use, and the "discards" of stuff you've done. Very handy! Add a sticker to customize them! This reward includes the base deck in a tuck box.

support.title: 50 cards + 2 Blanks + Ltd Ed Jumbo Box
support.descp: The full base deck of 50 cards, plus two extra blank cards, plus a special Kickstarter-only extra-large box to store future booster packs.

support.title: Kitten Stuff Done T-Shirt
support.descp: Show off your love of productivity AND kittens with this soft, beautiful t-shirt. It's a limited-edition print available only during the Kickstarter launch. Domestic shipping only.

support.title: 12 Card Booster Pack: Mindfulness + Base
support.descp: The Mindfulness pack gives you everything you need to put your phone away for 8 hours and practice self-care. Cards include more meditation cards, specific yoga poses, and other actions that will help you center yourself. A great way to get away from it all without ever leaving the house. Plus, you get a base deck as well and BOTH at a discount!

support.title: 12 Card Booster Pack: Student + Base
support.descp: Students of all ages will benefit from this booster pack, which includes homework, study time, and other cards that help motivate kids of all ages. Includes the base pack, so you have sleep, flex time, and lots of other useful cards. Get both at a discount with this reward!

support.title: 12 Card Booster: Weekend Warrior + Base
support.descp: This pack includes cards for the weekend, like mowing the yard, organizing, decluttering, going to a show, and so on. It's a mix of chores and relaxation -- just like the weekend! This reward INCLUDES the base deck, so you can fully plan your entire week plus the weekend. And you'll be getting both at a discount!

support.title: Buy Two And Save!
support.descp: Two 50-card packs in a tuck box. Save even more when buying two at once! Come in the standard tuck box.

support.title: Limited Ed. Coffee Mug + Deck
support.descp: Base deck PLUS: A lovely 2-tone coffee mug for our early adopters. Show everyone you're waking up ready to Kitten Stuff Done! Domestic shipping only.

support.title: 8x10 Card Art Print + Deck
support.descp: The base deck of cards PLUS: Choose one of the cards you like, and we'll print up a frame worthy copy for you! A great way to show your appreciation of the artwork, and a portion of the proceeds will go directly to the artist.

support.title: Cat Rescuer Special
support.descp: Get the base deck of 50 cards, plus 2 extra blanks, plus the bigger box, and $25 goes to cat rescue efforts. A great way to show your support! You'll also get a personalized thank you. Domestic only, limited availability.

support.title: 8x10 Signed Print of Artist's Work
support.descp: Same as the 8x10, but the artist will sign the artwork themselves! Subject to availability and time, of course. Very limited! Shipping as quickly as we can. PLUS you get a base deck and 2 extra cards!

support.title: Retailer Special: Buy 10 & Get A Poster
support.descp: Want to sell Kitten Stuff Done in your store? Buy 10 decks at once (the base deck, 50 cards), all in the tuck box, and get a promotional poster to help explain what they are and what they do.

support.title: Deluxe Donor Package!
support.descp: Includes: The 50-card base deck, the vinyl wallet, a sticker, a coffee mug, a special enamel pin, AND we'll make you a custom card. Only available in the U.S. Due to the customization, this one takes a little longer to deliver.

support.title: Mega Super Deluxe Package!
support.descp: Wow, you really love being productive AND cats! Here's what you get: The 50-card base deck, the wallet, a sticker (maybe a couple of them!), coffee mug, special enamel pin, a custom card, AND personal delivery. Yep, we'll travel to you and hand deliver all your goodies. Heck, you can even choose a booster pack just because we like you! U.S. only, note that shipping ourselves will take a while.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Delivery time: In manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time. We're working with a manufacturer that is very professional and organized. We are working closely with them to make sure production goes smoothly. In any case, we will do what we can to deliver before the expected delivery dates!

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the UK, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges. 

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster.

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
If you don't have time to watch the full video...here's a short version :)
PLAY

NEVERQUIT Elevated Merino socks are the result of over 1,366 hours of research and development on the material and design. We dedicated over seven months of working together with our community and manufacturer to make the best merino wool socks available on the market based on your wants and needs in a versatile product. Packed with cutting-edge features -- NEVERQUIT Elevated Merino are the socks that your feet deserve.
Combining technical materials that combat harsh outdoor conditions, from rustic environments to urban cityscapes.
Whether your life calls for keeping up with a fast-paced urban lifestyle, or challenging you against the elements of the wilderness, these merino wool socks have got you covered. By combining an urban design for daily use and technical materials for harsh outdoor conditions, NEVERQUIT Elevated Merino will not quit on you. 
        Egg Drop Experiment - Regular vs. HexaShock Cushioning System
Weight Comparison
Water Drop Test
Durability Test
   Questions? See the FAQ! 
 Wondering what makes our socks premium? So are we! Here's why!
 Limited FREEBIES
US & Canada shipping = CA$ 7 (~ US$ 5) 
International shipping = CA$ 14 (~ US$ 10)
Shoe sizes are in US measurements. Click here to convert to a different size.
                           The Elevated Merino Socks have been under development for more than a year. We've overcome many challenges and are ready to go into production. Below is an estimated timeline for production. You'll be the first to know if anything changes.
If a stretch goal is made possible with your help, we will group the shipment of rewards with our merino socks and ship everything in late January 2019. 
This campaign is not our first rodeo. When we first perfected our pharma-grade zinc oxide fibers and HexaShock advanced cushioning technology, we headed straight onto Kickstarter with our NEVERQUIT everyday socks. Our production came to fruition with huge success. Learning from our first campaign and listening to our customers, we came back with better ergonomic designs to support your feet and reduce stress on your sole. Our team is now more than prepared to deliver good quality and value, given our hindsight of success! Take the word of some happy customers with happy feet:
We hope to keep expanding our work, but regardless of where we end up we could not have done it without the support of an incredible network of customers, suppliers, and friends. A healthy organization creates value that extends far beyond money and into all points of its operation. In short, profit should never be the reason a company exists; PEOPLE are the essential factor. More than anything, our goal is to build NEVERQUIT into a company worthy of your respect. We just need to move forward, one step at a time.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
GENERAL CAUTION 
You - the backers of our Kickstarter campaign - enable us to bring new products to life. You'll be the first to receive new products and you'll get to see exciting progress of our production. The money you pledge towards our campaign goes directly into the development and production of our products. This campaign is not a store front. If you want full service from NEVERQUIT Apparel Inc., we ask that you wait until the products are available on www.WeCanNeverQuit.com and purchase them at full retail price. 

RETURNS & EXCHANGES 
We unfortunately cannot offer refunds or accept returns on items sent as Kickstarter rewards. If there is a sizing issue, we'll be happy to exchange sealed products with the correct size, provided you cover the shipping fees for the exchange. All socks come in permanently sealed packages (for hygienic reasons); once opened, they cannot be exchanged. Therefore, please try one out before opening the remaining in case you want to exchange those for another size. 

INTERNATIONAL BACKERS 
Outside of USA & Canada, we ship to select countries using DHL, FedEx, UPS, or Canada Post. The list of countries below will require special arrangement for shipping and higher shipping price due to a 99% chance of shipments going missing or being held at customs. Algeria, Chile, Costa Rica, Egypt, Guatemala, India, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kuwait, Morocco, Philippines, Pakistan, Qatar, Romania, Russian Federation, Saudi Arabia, South, Africa, Tunisia, United Arab Emirates

All international shipments are subject to duties, taxes and administration fees which you are responsible for paying. Most countries will assess duties/taxes and in certain countries the carrier will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you afterwards. If you refuse delivery, your package will be abandoned. Once abandoned, we cannot ship another package to you or issue a refund.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
