campaign.story:
Since our last successful Kickstarter, people all around the world can’t take our jeans off! We’ve been touring North America demoing our jeans at events across the country all while innovating our proprietary technical performance denim making them better than ever!
What started as a stylish climbing pant has quickly evolved into a pant that is perfect for virtually any activity. Introducing Boulder Denim 2.0: stretchier, softer, more water repellent, more durable, and now more affordable than ever!
...with our limited early bird deals! Early birds run out? You can still save through Kickstarter. Select styles even ship out 3 weeks after our Kickstarter campaign ends with other styles shipping before Christmas.
Our athletic fit is designed to have a slim tailored look for men with muscular legs without being skin tight. Most athletic builds have to size up their waist to fit their bigger legs and butt. With our athletic fit, you no longer have to size up the waist.
 Our men’s slim fit is designed to have a slim tailored look for men with a more slender frame. They’re a medium-low rise that fits slim body types perfectly.
Our men’s jogger-chino hybrid is a cross between our slim and athletic fit that converts from a chino to a jogger with a simple low-profile cinch.
 Our women’s high-rise skinny fit flatters most body types. Our unique contoured waistband sits lower in the front and higher in the back eliminating gapping and preventing the front from digging in when seated.
Our women’s mid-rise straight leg flatters most body types from curvy to a straighter frame. Slim fitting from the knees up with more room below the knees. Our unique contoured waistband sits lower in the front and higher in the back eliminating gapping and preventing the front from digging in when seated.
Our jeans are perfect for travel and the outdoors so we wanted to design a puffy jacket that would be the perfect companion to our denim. Our water-resistant hooded puffy jackets have a tailored slim look for both men and women. They are water resistant and feature a waterproof reverse-coil zipper. Our jackets are made with DuPont’s environmental and vegan-friendly Sorona filling that keeps you warm without harming any animals. The jacket also easily rolls into a pouch converting the jacket into a comfortable travel pillow which is perfect for travel, camping or taking a quick nap at work.
                                    Taz and Brad met 14 years ago as busboys at their local Spaghetti Factory in Vancouver, Canada. They had a “did we just become best friends” moment after they spent an entire shift discussing business ideas and ways to make the big bucks as 15 year olds. Fast forward 14 years with a couple of successful and failed businesses under their belt, they feel they have finally hit the jackpot with Boulder Denim which allows them to pursue their passion for climbing while building a brand that fits perfectly into their lifestyle. For the past year, Taz and Brad have been touring North America sponsoring climbing festivals and getting the jeans on as many people as possible at climbing gyms across the continent. At the same time, they've been working directly with their manufacturer to make everyone's favourite denim even better and more affordable than ever.
Videography: Jeff Frieberg of Sora Digital 
Photography: Levi Harrell, Jeff Fierberg, Mark Scherle, Bradley Spence 
Location Sets: Bacchus in New Paltz, Central Rock Gym in Warwick 
Props: Peak Design’s Everyday Backpack 30L, Future Motion’s Onewheel XR
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 2nd Kickstarter. Our first time around, we ran into many unforeseen obstacles since we were so fresh to the apparel business. (It took us 6 months just to get custom buttons and rivets from YKK). We learned from our mistakes and are much better prepared this time around.

Some of our styles and colors are already in production and ready to ship as soon as the Kickstarter ends but in order to get you more styles and colors, we need your help to hit our minimum orders. To get you your jeans quicker, we’ll send a survey out to our backers mid-campaign to get a feel for what the popular colors and styles will be so we can order the fabric as soon as possible to get a jump-start on production.

Supply Chain Risk: Sometimes we can run into tiny delays which can delay production from as little as 2 weeks to as much as 2 months. We feel we're much better prepared this time around and feel delays, if any, will be minimal.

There is a small chance that if we don't get enough backers choosing a certain color or style, that we won't go into production with that particular color or style. If this happens, you'll be able to choose a different option.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello everyone,
This update is for everyone still waiting on their rewards that include our jogger/chinos. We apologize for the late update on the status of the jogger/chinos as we know that you all expected them to ship before the end of May.

Hello backers!
We know most of you have been enjoying your new jeans. Thanks for all the positive comments – they make  our day! Everyone who is not waiting for their jogger/chinos should have received their jeans by now. If you're waiting for the jogger/chinos, then keep on reading as we have an update for you.

Hey Backers!
Thanks again for everyone's patience. We just wanted to let you know that we've been shipping hundreds of packages each day. Many of you have received your jeans and have been sending us so much praise. We're so glad you like the jeans!
If you have not received your jeans or tracking information, do not worry. They are going to ship very soon. We are currently receiving hundreds of emails on specific order statuses. At this time, we cannot give anyone specific order details as our number one priority is getting everyone their jeans as soon as possible. If we have to reach out to our shipping team for specific order statuses, it will delay everyone’s shipments.

Hey everyone!
We would first like to say that we have been so grateful to receive so many kind emails, comments, and messages from you. We understand that we are bound to lose some customers over the outrageous delays but we never thought we would receive so much praise and understanding. You really are the best customers that a brand could ask for. Thank you so much for sticking with us through our growing pains. We're beyond thankful and we've learned a lot from this.

Hello to our patient backers,
This update is for all our backers who are still waiting. Thank-you all so much for your patience. Unfortunately this update is going to require a bit more patience for those still waiting on their rewards. 
Last night, we had a very disappointing and surprising two hour phone call with our manufacturer. Up until last night we kept being told that we would have the jeans in-hand at the end of February by our manufacturer.

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping Update + Pictures of Women's Jogger/Chinos
updates.update_content:
Hey backers!
We first wanted to thank-you all so much for your patience and support on everything. You've been awesome to work with and we really appreciate everyone's kind words and support along the way. We couldn't ask for a better group of backers. We also want to apologize for all the delays we've had these past few months. We really don't want to let you down and are trying our best to make sure everyone is 100% satisfied. Thanks again for everything!

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping Update + Caring for your Boulder Denim jeans
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone,
Thanks again for all your patience on everything and happy Thanksgiving to our American friends!
We wanted to give our backers an early heads up on our Black Friday weekend deal.

OK! Thank you, for the super quick answer!!!

hey guys I am in the Denver area and wanted to know if i could come on down to get a sneak peak at the new line?

@Boulder Demin. Hmm, I just double checked my email and nothing. I know I have in the past received emails from you guys, as in the January time frame I believe you sent out emails requesting feedback.

Hey Guys. First off, I wanted to say I am a backer from your first campaign where I bought 3 pairs. And by and large, they were extremely comfortable and happy with them mostly. I see that some of my feedback from the original campaign was incorporated into the new jeans, which is awesome! However, I am a little upset that you didn’t give your previous backers a heads up on the new campaign, and I only managed to find these by browsing Kickstarter. This unfortunately meant I missed out on the early bird and that had me completely bummed. I wish I had known about this earlier.
I've been looking for jeans that have all of these features without any luck. I'm happy to have finally found what looks like the perfect pair of jeans! =)

campaign.story:
The Dorai mat is available in 3 earth inspired colors.
        Optional comfort cover is available to supply softness to your toes.
        The Dorai Comfort Cover is made from a soft, high-end, machine washable cotton fabric that dries out quickly when paired with the top surface of the Dorai Bath Mat, not allowing for any growth of mold or mildew.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Since Dorai Home is a new company, there are risks and challenges to getting this product off the ground. We have taken every measure possible to prevent the things we can control, but with anything in life there are some things out of our control. A factory we work with could be prone to fire or a boat with our containers could get lost at sea. Our product, as with any, also runs the risk of failing at QC.These conditions are an extreme that every product faces, and that’s why we have a support team that will always go above and beyond to find a solution.

Thankfully, Kelsey and Jason are not only experts, but so are the team members they have around them. Jason and his team at Klugonyx have developed and built over 100 products. We have tested systems and processes that help products get from A to Z and have the right people making sure that every step of the way is done to our standards.

This is not our first rodeo and we're confident that we will be able to deliver a product that will dry your bathroom faster than the leading bath mat competitor. A boat lost at sea is no match for the dedication and foresight our team has put into bringing you a rewarding bathroom experience.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: CHECK OUT WHATS NEXT!

updates.update_userinfo: Major fixes happening: fulfillment center change
updates.update_content:
Hello backers,
We’re hugely appreciative of your patience and support from those who have reached out, and want to share the latest update on your Dorai products. Our hope is to be transparent as we’ve found a solution that enables us to move forward and you get your orders.

Hey everyone,
We are shipping! But, our fulfillment center failed at fulfilling our first 20 orders properly.
Some people might have received more mats than expected, missing covers, mixed set of units, etc.

updates.update_userinfo: Bath mats are on the way!
updates.update_content:
Hey Backers, 
We hope 2019 is off to a stellar start and your resolutions are going strong! 
We appreciate your patient enthusiasm as we perfected the last details on your Dorai Bath Mats and Covers. Final quality checks were completed two weeks ago to ensure we're delivering the best product, and they are looking mighty fine. The Bath Mats, covers and coasters are on the way to our fulfillment center. You can expect them delivered to you in February.

Hey Everyone!  
Just thought I should get you all up to speed on the manufacturing process. We are actively in production right now and it feels so good :) 
 MATS 
The mats are almost done being cut at the factory.

Hey everyone!
Production is underway and we are SO HAPPY

It's survey time!
Hope everyone has a great weekend. Be sure to keep an eye out tomorrow for the Dorai Kickstarter survey in your inbox. You'll be able to select your colors and be first to access our newest add on products.
These instructions will be coming to your inbox tomorrow and included below: __________________________________

updates.update_userinfo: WOW! We are so thankful for all of you! Let us tell you about the next steps.
updates.update_content:
Backers, friends and believers, 
We are so thankful that we not only achieved our goal but we got 700% of it... This is beyond what we could have wished for. 
Now its our turn to pick the baton back up and fulfill these wonderful bath mats.
Next steps:

30 more minutes with only $800 till we hit $70k!
Help us out!
Major update coming later today
Thank you So much everyone!

I have 2 others that are used daily but they seem to be fine. I need a replacement; please let me know what can be done. Thank you.

AJ

Hey there Jason... got all my stuff in and I love them. Just why I thought. I guess I always assumed they’d be a hard board since they look like a solid surface in the video. I am concerned though. Where the cover wraps around to the bottom side of the Dorai, it makes the edges bulkier and leaves a rectangular space in the center. My husband is 250 pounds and he’s concerned that if he’s stepping in it with that gap between the mat and the floor, the mat will flex over time and break. Would you please let me know your thoughts on this. Thanks so much!
Mine arrived here today April 3 2019; Eastern Canada

I also didn't realize it was more like a board instead of a mat. Is the cover that came with it supposed to be a cover or is it to make the mat stop from moving? The mat does move some when I step on it like I'm getting out of the shower. So I don't know if I fully trust using it in the bathroom or someone lighter than me uses it.
Cheers for getting back to me.

Just got the 3 mats & covers. Like Jason below, I also was surprised at the thickness and solidity of the mats. We only have one bathroom where we can use a mat by the shower because the other two bathrooms have doors that open into them and will not clear such thick mats. I wish you would've made that more clear, i.e., they're not "mats," they're "boards."
Looking forward to seeing how this works.
Can't wait, Thanks!

Hi! I haven't received anything yet, not even a tracking code. I read the update and comments regarding the problems with the fulfillment company, but since I haven't had a shipment (wrong or otherwise) I wonder if there's a different problem..

Wow I just want to say. Thank you for this great and transparent update. It is very rare that updates come with this kind of detail on Kickstarter and assuming this is genuine, I can really empathize with you guys. It sucks that you are needing to deal with all of this when it is out of your control. Hopefully it all gets sorted out and thanks for sticking with it for our benefit as well!!
I too appreciate the detailed comment. I'm hoping you can get things straightened out enough to do a more general update, but in the mean time, hang in there, and thank you.

campaign.story:
IM Socks are the World's First 100% Waterproof socks 
Don't compromise style for functionality with IM socks.
Designed to fit, feel and perform like regular socks yet protect against all types of weather. Our technology will keep your feet dry, whatever the season. 
Say goodbye to wet or sweaty socks
Breathable and Moisture Wicking. Unlike other socks, im socks allows your feet to breathe, reducing sweat and odor build up.
Our design process 
We have spent the past 1,5 years developing a new waterproofing technology. After some research and a lot of prototypes, we are ready to introduce IM socks to the world. We are confident that IM socks technology is the next innovation in sock wear.
Our Production process
We work together with a highly representative company in Portugal. Which is well known for high quality and detailed work. They only use the best and 100% long-ST cotton with a high tear resistance.
IM socks wil be there for you, every step of the way.
 How to order : 
1. Click Back this Project Below: Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page.
 2. Payment: Enter your payment information. Your payment will not be charged until the very end of this campaign 
3. Size, Color & Shipping Information: Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your Size, Color choice and submit your Shipping at the very end of this campaign.  
--- Free and easy shipping all over the world! ---
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have spent the last 1,5 years developing this technology and we worked every day to dial in the design and technology. 
We even made a journey to Portugal and worked with our manufacturers to ensure that quality control is met at every step of the production line. 
The next important milestone will be mass-production and we've already made a lot of progress on that front. 
We understand that no campaign comes without any challenges. In any case, we promise to communicate with transparency
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: 19 DAYS ON THE CLOCK, TIME TO MAKE THIS POSSIBLE! THANK YOU ALL!
updates.update_content:

campaign.story:
Introducing The SilverAir Merino T-Shirt
A simple t-shirt, beautifully designed and engineered with a fabric like no other. We combined luxurious merino wool with pure silver on the inside to give you extraordinary next-to-skin comfort and the very best anti-odor performance. A nylon exterior provides structure and adds durability, all while keeping the weight of the product less than 120 grams (in a medium size). This is our lightest t-shirt yet: perfect for traveling, and equally great for daily wear in a wide range of temperatures.
Re-Engineering A Flagship  
This product is an evolution of the founding design of the SilverAir T-Shirt, the first product we launched on Kickstarter almost 5 years ago. At the time, our goal was to develop the best athletic t-shirt in the world and we think we delivered just that. Then, we saw you using the t-shirt for traveling light and even as daily uniforms, so the products that followed were geared towards everyday performance. With this new generation, we bring to you a t-shirt engineered with our most advanced and versatile fabric yet, and one that is simply a joy to wear day and night.
Product Details
For every new product, we custom develop the fabric from scratch. For this t-shirt, we created a double sided fabric with merino wool on the inside for its ability to regulate temperature, manage moisture, and resist odor. We use premium grade 17.5 micron fibers which are ultra fine and feel incredibly soft against the skin.
While merino wool is bacteriostatic and offers a first layer of protection against odor, we add pure silver (in the form of metallic yarns) which we find to be the most effective solution for neutralizing odor causing bacteria. The production of our SilverAir yarn begins at the molecular level where the metallic formulation is precisely controlled and is free of nickel and other heavy metals. Unlike chemical and nano treatments, our silver is permanently knit into the fabric and will never wash away. When you turn the product inside-out, you can actually see the silver throughout.
To complete the fabric, we plait the exterior with nylon for a durable finish and a beautiful hand feel. The strength of the nylon perfectly complements the lightweight merino. We use an open knit structure that is airy and breathable to create an extremely light but sturdy t-shirt that weighs less than 120 grams (in a medium size).
You'll love wearing it by itself in warm weather, and it makes a fantastic base layer during the winter. Best of all, it is highly packable and lets you travel light without the burden of heavy luggage. You can comfortably fit two t-shirts, two pairs of socks, and two underwear in a small packing cube that will fit any bag.
We wanted to appeal to a wide range of style, in a variety of conditions. As with all our products, the main focus is always on the material and construction. The body of the t-shirt is seamless, so it is void of any stitching. It has a pure uninterrupted form with mesh knit in the underarms and two clean jacquard lines down the back. The sleeves are stitched to the body using flat-lock seams to prevent chafing, and follows a raglan construction to enable better mobility of the arms while sitting cleanly over the shoulders.
With each new iteration, we continuously strive to simplify and improve a product based on your demands. We believe the SilverAir Merino T-Shirt is the epitome of everything we have learned so far. We can't wait for you to try it!  
Image Gallery
Styles & Colors
T-SHIRT - Available in short sleeve crew neck, short sleeve v-neck, and long sleeve crew neck.
*Long sleeve t-shirts have a $10 surcharge.
*Carbon Black color has visible silver lines on the exterior (see 00:27 in Kickstarter video).
UNDERWEAR - Available in boxer-brief with or without fly.
SOCKS - Available in ankle or crew length.
*Crew socks have a $3 surcharge.
Measurement Guide 
The products we are offering in this campaign are going to be available in following sizes:
*XXL size T-Shirt will be available in short sleeve and long sleeve crew neck and covers chest size 48"
About Us 
We want to simplify your life with thoughtfully designed gear. We believe that the clothing you wear everyday should not only be comfortable and good looking, but also functional in every aspect.
We design each product from scratch with materials and components tailored specifically towards it, and with an eye on details. Although we started with functional sportswear, our products have evolved to be core basics that you'll want to wear daily and travel the world in.
The brand was born on Kickstarter and we continue to release major products here. Amongst all the other benefits, it most importantly allows us to connect directly with our customers and have meaningful discussions around a new product that we created for you.
Important Details About The Campaign
This is our 7th Kickstarter campaign, and we are humbled by the support that you've shown us over the years. We try to offer great deals here and you're also the first to receive new products. The money you pledge towards our campaign goes directly into the development and production of our products. We hope you understand that this campaign is not a store front. If you want more flexibility in trying our products, we recommend purchasing them from yathletics.com at retail value.
REFUNDS 
We generally do not issue refunds for Kickstarter pledges. If for some reason you want to back out of your pledge after the campaign ends, you may request a refund but we reserve the right to issue or deny it. If we do issue a refund, we will deduct 10% from the total pledge to cover the payment processor and Kickstarter fees associated with it.
EXCHANGES 
If the product(s) you receive do not fit, you may exchange them for a different size, except for socks and underwear. T-Shirts must be new and need to be in their original packaging with hang tags attached. Socks and underwear come in individually sealed packets and cannot be exchanged once opened. We recommend trying one pair before opening the remaining ones so you can exchange sealed socks and underwear for a different size.
To learn more about how to exchange products, please visit https://www.yathletics.com/pages/ksreturns
INTERNATIONAL BACKERS
All international shipments are subject to duties, taxes and clearing fees which you are responsible for paying. Most countries will assess duties/taxes on your package and in certain countries the carrier will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later. If you refuse delivery, your package will be abandoned. Once abandoned, we can’t ship another package to you or issue a refund.
Partners
We'd like to give a shout out to our marketing partner, Jellop, who helps us reach new backers. If you're running a crowdfunding campaign, we highly recommend working with them.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 7th Kickstarter project. We’ve delivered some of the highest quality products to our backers in the past and this one’s not going to be any different. The only risk we can think of is the projected timeline of the delivery of rewards. Since this is a brand new development, there may be unforeseen challenges in production. If any issues come up, the delivery of your reward will be delayed.

That said, we’re pretty straight forward when it comes to communication and have built a reputation of being transparent with our backers. We'll make two promises:

1. We will deliver the highest quality product to each and every single backer. We take extreme pride in making some of the best products in the world.

2. We will keep the lines of communication open at all times. If we have hurdles, you'll be the first to know about them.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Thank You, New Colors, Brand New Product
updates.update_content:
Happy New Year Everyone!
The production of all SilverAir Merino T-Shirts are now complete. They are expected to arrive at our warehouse in the next two weeks.
We plan to ship out all remaining rewards between the 20th and 31st of January. You'll receive an email with the tracking information when your reward is ready to be shipped out.

Hi Everyone!
We have exciting news for some of you. Production has picked up so we decided to fly in some of the products that were completed. At this point, it's just short sleeve crew neck t-shirts in certain sizes but we're planning to ship out whatever orders contain only these products in the next week or so.

Hi Everyone!
Here's a summary of today's update:
V Neck t-shirts are looking great.
Everything is on track with production.
We'll send the product selection form to you on November 15th.

Hi Everyone,
I hope you all had a fantastic weekend! 
Now that the project is complete, we are preparing for manufacturing and need your help to determine the breakdown of raw materials. We'd really appreciate if you can answer this 10 second questionnaire about sizes and colors - https://goo.gl/forms/JdvN42YBZlC6TddQ2

Hi Everyone!
We're almost half way through the campaign and are excited to finish strong and start production in the coming weeks. Originally, we were making only crew necks and long sleeves in the first production run, with V Necks coming afterwards. After getting a lot of requests for the V Neck, we revisited our production plan with the factory and will be able to fit all three styles in the first production run. So, there you have it! V Necks are officially available for this campaign.

campaign.story:
What would you do if a time machine hurled you thousands of years into the past… and then broke? Could you survive? Maybe. But could you, acting alone and stranded at any point period in Earth's history, reinvent our modern world from scratch? Probably not.
Not unless you took this book and bandana back in time with you, that is.
Look how pretty!
Over the course of the past few years, I've collected all the science, engineering, mathematics, art, music, philosophy, facts, and figures you'd need for even the most clueless time traveler to build a civilization from the ground up, and I've put it all into this book / extremely fashionable accessory. Your new world will be one in which humanity matured quickly and efficiently, instead of doing what we did (which, to be specific, was spending 200,000 years stumbling around without language, thinking disease was caused by weird smells, and living completely oblivious to the fact that tying a rock to a string would unlock navigating the entire world). It's a deeply researched guide and ridiculously funny history of the key technologies and innovations that made each stage of human civilization possible (from writing and farming to buttons and birth control), and it will make you smarter, more competent, and completely prepared to thrive – at any point in history.
And if you don't have room for a whole book in your temporal carry-on, you can still carry the highlights with your new attractively-designed and information-dense time travel bandana - enough to create a technological civilization from first principles. It's chock full of civilization-building information that's great to keep around in your back pocket...or wrapped around the top of your head. 
And if you want some beautiful art to show off the time periods you'll visit... keep reading for the postcard stretch goal. :)
Tell me about this book.
Happy to! It measures 6x9, and it's a really attractive hardcover, and inside are 464 pages of text and pictures, illustrated by the amazing Lucy Bellwood. The premise of the book is just like in the video above: in the future time travel is being practiced routinely, and this is a guide meant for the passengers in those time machines - in this case the FC3000™ - to consult should anything go wrong. It's a time machine repair guide, but then it turns out time machines are the most complicated machines humans have ever made, and there's no user serviceable parts inside, and it's actually easier to explain how to rebuild civilization from scratch in any period of Earth's history! So that's what this book does, promising that instead of going back to the future... you can now bring the future back to you.
Here's the table of contents, showing off the sort of things you can find in this book!
This is a non-fiction work of popular science wrapped in a delightful fictional candy coating.
All the information in the book is real, and despite the fact that time travel isn't real (YET?? SO FAR AS WE KNOW??), it is a sincere, honest, funny, and deeply-researched attempt to prepare you for the eventuality of being stranded in the past.
The time-travel conceit keeps things light, and lets me work in lots of jokes so that the book isn't a dry list of facts and figures: instead it's as exciting - and funny - as a really good time travel novel. Imagine if the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy was real, but focused entirely on time travel - it might look something like this. The book begins with a flowchart that lets you determine what period in history you're stranded in, all the way back to the Big Bang. In the middle, the book does things like explain how to forge iron while also reinventing art and philosophy. By the end, you are actually for-real prepared to rebuild civilization, all on your own.
Here's what some people are saying about advance copies I gave them!
"A dazzling piece of work that's also genuinely hilarious." - Elan Mastai: All Our Wrong Todays
"Such a cool book. It's essential reading for anyone who needs to duplicate an industrial civilization quickly" - Randall Munroe: xkcd, What If?
"Technically, we are all time travelers and we are all trapped. So, even if you happen to be scanning this blurb in what you perceive to be a 'normal' timeline, I heartily recommend you read this book cover to cover." - Zach Weinersmith: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal, Soonish
"A witty pop science guide intended for those demanding times when one needs to create a civilization from scratch... a fun, thoughtful, and thoroughly accessible reference for curious readers, students, and world-builders, as well as wayward time travelers." - Publisher's Weekly (starred review!)
"Packed with cool, fun, and useful stuff... a friendly and thought-provoking reference, just the thing for the bright kid in the family, to say nothing of the neighborhood time traveler." - Kirkus Reviews
Okay, now tell me about this bandana!
The book is inspired by a shirt I designed back in 2012 - after finishing the shirt, I still hadn't scratched that itch, and began to wonder if you really could condense all of civilization down to 450 or so pages. So I started researching. And once I'd written the book, I thought, wouldn't it be nice to take this full circle and bring this back to textiles with a Temporal Survival Bandana? The bandana itself is 22 inches square has more information than the shirt did - including instructions on how to use the bandana itself to invent other technologies like the water filter, the bandage, and the sexy adult handcuff! And if you do ever find yourself stranded in the past, it will be the single most valuable - and most dangerous - piece of fabric in human history.
You can get one exclusively with this Kickstarter!
That shape in the middle is the template for building a unit cube - whose weight, when filled with water, will be the basis of the measurements you need to build the other technologies explained on the bandana, up to and including telescopes, microscopes, smelters, electrical generators, and penicillin. At the top there's instructions for testing if unknown foods are safe to eat - a useful thing to know if you're stranded before the invention of domestication. Those pictures you see in the at the bottom are ways to transform the rotational motion of a water wheel into more useful motions, like the up-down motion of a hammer or the back-and-forth motion of a saw. Seems pretty straightforward, but it still took humans thousands of years to figure this stuff out!!
Or rather, it DID take us that long, until you and your brilliant bandana showed up in the past.
Why are the bandana and book together?
Well, here's the thing. This book is already being printed, and it'll be available in bookstores on September 18th... but these days most book orders happen online. That's great, but it would be MORE great if you could support independent booksellers! That's where this Kickstarter comes in: all the books ordered through this Kickstarter will be funneled through indie bookstores.
By buying the book through this Kickstarter, you not only get the exact same book you'd get from a giant online bookstore, but you also get it signed by the author (that's me!), PLUS you get the time traveler's bandana, PLUS the stretch goals we unlock (see below) - all for the same price you'd pay at retail. It'll be shipped direct to your door on the release day, and you'll get to feel good about supporting cool indie bookstores like:
The Strand in NY
BookPeople in Texas
Watermark Books & Cafe in Kansas
Tattered Cover Book Store in Denver
Joseph-Beth Booksellers in Ohio
Vroman's Bookstore in California
The Beguiling in Toronto, Canada
It's thanks to these amazing booksellers that we can offer the book at a price low enough to give you all these exclusive goodies on top!
Can we use stretch goals to make this Kickstarter even more awesome?
Well heck, why not! Here's what I've got planned: every threshold we unlock will result in a new update, in which I (RYAN) will get stranded, Carmen Sandiego / Where's Waldo style, in a different period in time. While I'm there I'll source a postcard showing off that time, and everyone who backs will get one of each. These are actual postcards, suitable to send in the mail to your pals and say "wish you were here", only instead of promoting boring old places in the present, they're encouraging temporal tourism at various highlights in Earth's past. They'll be drawn by a variety of super awesome artists!  We'll unlock more soon as we fund!
$10,000 = UNLOCKED: 1492 CE, with art by Alex Thomas!
$20,000 = UNLOCKED: 1912 CE, with art by Bill Mudron!
$30,000 = UNLOCKED: 2041 CE, with art by Anthony Clark!
 $40,000 = UNLOCKED: 650 BCE, with art by Shelli Paroline and Braden Lamb!
$50,000 = UNLOCKED: 65,000 BCE, with art by John Allison!
$60,000 = UNLOCKED: a postcard by David Malki!
$70,000 AND $80,000 = UNLOCKED: a Chrononaut's Choice time travel pamphlet giving you a curated adventure in time, going to everyone at the book tier or above!
$90,000 = UNLOCKED: a postcard by Rahzzah!
$100,000 = UNLOCKED: an excerpt from the book!
$150,000 = UNLOCKED: a postcard by David Hellman!
$200,000 = one last postcard from Ben Hatke!! That's NINE POSTCARDS in total going to everyone who's getting anything physical!
The back of each postcard has an exclusive temporal survival tip tailored to each specific time period. They're going to be AWESOME.
So now with you're not just getting the signed book and bandana: you're also getting temporal tourism postcards, and as the Kickstarter continues, more and more cards will get added to that pack.
What tiers do we have?
We've kept it pretty simple: there's a tier to get the postcards ($10), a tier to get the postcards and bandana ($20), and a really attractive tier that gets you the postcards, the bandana, and a SIGNED copy of the book all for $27 - the same price an unsigned book alone costs in a store! After that there's some tiers for those who want more than one book (you can get two or three), and finally a single-edition $1000 tier in which I hand-build you a time travel survival kit - which includes the book, bandana, and postcards too, of course.
Each tier has a US and Canadian edition - besides the countries they're shipping to, they're otherwise identical.  That's right, Canadians: by teaming up with The Beguiling, we've managed to keep shipping costs identical!  Plus, the books will ship out of Toronto, so you don't need to worry about any customs costs at the border.  THIS WAS A LOT OF WORK BUT IT'S GOING TO BE AWESOME. <3
NOTE: the last time I did a Kickstarter with signed books was for To Be or Not To Be, and there I ended up signing 15,000 books in five days, during which I accidentally broke the world record for most books signed in a single day in the process. I have only gotten better at signing my own name since then.
This sounds great, but who are you and what else have you done?
Hi, I'm Ryan North! You may know me as the author of Dinosaur Comics, or The Unbeatable Squirrel Girl for Marvel Comics, or from my illustrated choosable-path adventure books like William Shakespeare Punches A Friggin' Shark and/or To Be or Not To Be - both of which were launched here on Kickstarter (and To Be or Not To Be became the most-funded publishing project ever on Kickstarter at the time!) I've also done writing for Bungie and once got stuck in a hole with my dog. You can read more about me here to assure yourself that I'm not one of those fly-by-night science writers!
I want to ship outside the US and Canada - can I back this Kickstarter?
Unfortunately we can't ship these books everywhere - the numbers simply don't work out (and also there's weird legal issues, since book rights are different in different countries). If you're outside the US and Canada, you may want to wait until the book comes out for real in your region - translated versions will shortly be available in:
Russia
Poland
China
Korea
...and MORE??
And if you're in the UK - great news: the book is already available for pre-order there! 
Thank you! <3
I'm really excited to soon be able to share this book with you - it's the longest book project I've ever worked on! - and I really think it's the best, too. Hopefully what I've said in this Kickstarter intrigues you! Drop me a line if you've got any questions, and if you choose to back this campaign, thank you! I really think you'll have a good... time.
(sorry about the pun, no regrets)
(Oh also! Thanks to my friend Jennifer Ward for her voiceover work, Jason Shaw for the music used in the video (Thingamajig), AR Sound Effects for the time machine SFX, and Freqman for the "time machine just broke" SFX. All music and SFX are used under a CC-BY license!)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The book itself is done and already being printed (yay, publishing!). The bandana design is ready to go, and we've got a printer who can turn an order around in 15 days, which gives us plenty of time to get them - and the books - shipped to Make That Thing, who I've partnered with to help fulfill this project. I'll visit their warehouse to sign all the books for you, we'll put them in envelopes, and then we'll ship them off your homes. 

All books are being shipped to a single warehouse, which will make things simpler. I've run two successfully completed Kickstarters in the past, and I feel really confident about this one, since unlike the others, the book is already being printed! That's how come we can ship so quickly after the campaign closes.

The main risk is unexpected shipping delays causing the book to arrive in some places after its release date on the 18th of September, but we're going to do all in our power to prevent that: we want you to read this book as soon as possible!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey everyone, 
I've been checking in here once a month for any people who that haven't filled in surveys yet, but unfortunately I can't keep the fulfillment companies waiting forever.  So if you haven't filled in your survey, now is the time!  I'm gonna call it on July 16th - one full year after we launched - at which point the fulfillment era will shut down!  So for the very few of you who haven't responded to the survey yet - you've got the next month and a bit to fill in your surveys and let me know where you want your books (and bandanas, and postcards) to be sent!

updates.update_userinfo: Want more time travel bandanas? The TIME is now
updates.update_content:
Want more temporal survival bandanas?
One of the most common messages I've gotten is "hey, can I get another bandana?  I would like to give it as a Christmas present and/or ensure that everyone around me is a properly-prepared time traveller".
Now you can!!  By clicking this link, right here!!

updates.update_userinfo: Our book is a WRITE-IN Goodread's Choice award semi-finalist! Also: horse babies
updates.update_content:
Just a couple of quick notes for you!
First off, I was super surprised - and super humbled! - when I found out yesterday that HOW TO INVENT EVERYTHING is a semi-finalist in the Goodreads Choice awards!  It's up as one of the best Science and Technology books of 2018.  Since we weren't in the opening round I assumed we weren't in the running, but enough people wrote in HOW TO INVENT EVERYTHING as their selection - without me running a campaign for them to! - that now we're in the semifinals.  So if you're so inclined, it only takes a few seconds.  And thank you!!

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping update and Talk Nerdy podcast
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone!  This is just a shipping update for you!
Everyone who filled out their surveys by the deadline has been shipped!
Everyone who filled out their surveys late (as of two weeks ago) has ALSO been shipped!
If you haven't filled out your survey yet we haven't shipped your books, because you need to fill out your survey for us to do that! :)

updates.update_userinfo: SHIPPING IS BEGINNING, get your addresses in now!
updates.update_content:
Hey everyone,
Just a quick note to let you know that WE ARE ABOUT TO BEGIN SHIPPING, and I need your addresses now!  I'm turning off the option that lets you change your address on Saturday, so now is your last chance to double-check your address to make sure it's right.  And if you haven't filled in your survey, do it now!  That's how you get your awesome book and bandana and postcards!!

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping surveys have been sent out!
updates.update_content:
You should have a message in your email asking for your address - and if you haven't gotten it, you can fill out the survey directly here on Kickstarter.  Right now everything's on track to begin shipping in two weeks - if not sooner! - so you should fill out your surveys right now.  Thank you!!
(I've left "allow address changes" on, so you'll be able to tweak your address on the off chance you move in the next little while.  I'll turn off that option two days before we ship, and at that point everything is locked!)

updates.update_userinfo: That's the campaign, thank you so much!! Here's what happens next
updates.update_content:
And that's the campaign! We started with a goal of $20k and reached it in two hours(!). I thought the best-case scenario was we'd reach $100k (hence all those stretch goals early on so close together!) but you have blown this out of the water and raised over $225k for this crazy book. I'm so thankful, and I CAN'T WAIT to get How To Invent Everything into your hands.

campaign.story:
Hey Kickstarter Friends!
We're happy to be back with our 3rd Kickstarter and Freshest idea yet... Peppermint Tech.  
We've combined naturally anti-microbial Peppermint fiber 🌱 with super soft and moisture transferring ProModal, then added stretch for the ultimate underwear experience.  
Exclusively here, we're offering  first-run premium JUMPERwear at up to 40% off to help us fulfill the big MOQ (minimum order quantity) this custom blend requires.
So grab some Amazing Deals on pre-order rewards, and be the first to rock Peppermint Tech!
 Field Testing (literally :)) 
PLAY

                                                                                                                                                                                PLAY

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING - (Rest of the world) may have to pay additional import duties and other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods, based on the import policies of their respective countries.   The shipments are marked as rewards.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Manufacturing technical apparel with the complex textiles and applications can mean delays. That being said, the JUMPER Team has over 20 years of design, development and manufacturing experience. We are committed to mitigating delays in several ways:

1. We have multiple cut & sew facilities that produce large volumes of underwear product eager to produce the peppermint tech undies.

2. We are sourcing our textiles from an industry leading mill.

3. We have completed several rounds of prototypes during our 18 month development process.

4. We are relying on experienced team members with 20+ years of technical apparel design, development, and manufacturing experience.

5. We've built in contingency delays into our 5-month timeline. Our production schedule includes custom milling our textiles, components, cutting, sewing, QC and shipping. We not only have a team, but factories and mills committed to this project being a success.

All this being said, we will be continuously updating backers through the manufacturing process and offer complete transparency on work in progress.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey Friends!
We shipped out the last backer reward on Friday.

Hey Kickstarter Friends!
We should be exiting the production in about 10 days.   WOOOOOOT!
We've booked freight so we can start delivering asap.  Double wooot woot!

Hey Kickstarter Friends!
Quick production update.
Last week Andy got back from the Quality Control trip with our cut and sew factory.  
Good thing the trip was so timely, because he discovered a major execution failure in the leg opening.

Hey Kickstarter Friends!
We wanted to give you a quick update before the weekend.  
We were able to get a slot back in to our cut and sew facility....wooooot!

Hey Friends!
These came in last night.  Photos and the other colors coming soon.
We've tested what seems like every brand and type of underwear (especially the most premium) out there, and these final pre production protos beat them all.  The body fabric, waistband, the pique mesh, the trims, stitching, and technical design... these are going to make some noise:)

Hey Guys!!
Update time.
Our fabric is finally finished!  
It's difficult to show you how awesome this peppermint tech fabric is over the internet, but once you touch it, we're guaranteeing .

updates.update_userinfo: Production updated- Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays!
updates.update_content:
Hey Friends!
Hope you are enjoying the holiday season!
We wanted to give you a production update before the official holiday break.  We've been hoping to get you real life photos of the finished fabric by now in each colorway but the fabric mill is running a bit behind.  We've had a choice to pressure and rush the mill or let them do their thing.  In the past, rushing a mill is asking for a rushed result, which is never good.  We're letting them do their thing.

Hey Friends!
I just got back from Asia meeting with the cut and sew people and our fabric mill.  First, our mill was so incredible.   For some background, we caught wind of these specialized fabrics about 2 years ago and it took us what seemed like forever to find a supplier. We didn't just find a supplier, but they are the leader in plant-based textiles.   It was so cooooool!

Hey Guys,
We're pushing back delivering the surveys for a few days as we make some updates.  
This doesn't affect production at all.  In fact, we've already put in the fabric order to the mill and reserved space with our cut and sew facility.

campaign.story:
JITNI: BOOK OF LIES is Westhavenbrook's next live action martial art/adventure film. With this campaign, our goal is to raise enough money to make a 10 minute proof-of-concept short film.
Should we raise more, our goal will be adjusted to multiple short films. Should we raise significantly more than our goal, we will make the entire feature. These stretch goals will be revealed as each funding milestone is passed.
We are confident in our ability to meet this goal as we have already made a feature length action film, THE DANGER ELEMENT (currently in distribution), on a very tiny budget. You can see the trailer for THE DANGER ELEMENT below. 
In JITNI: BOOK OF LIES we meet a modern day knight from an order founded in the wake of the second crusade who is pulled from his isolation beneath an ancient monastery to rescue a friend. He is soon drawn reluctantly into a quest to stop an ancient secret society with plans to free an imprisoned demon.
JITNI: "Book of Lies" Concept Art
Our film group, WESTHAVENBROOK, formed in 2001 when John Soares, Justin Spurlock and Ben Beames began experimenting in cinema together. We made hundreds of short films, several of which won awards, before collaborating on the making of Doug TenNapel's SOCKBABY series, a no-budget martial art/comedy web series that gained a global cult following on the internet before the days of YouTube. It was the first time anyone in the group got a taste of what the internet could do for underground cinema. We went on to make THE DANGER ELEMENT, John's first feature length action adventure film. It was released on YouTube in short segments in order to build a loyal following which eventually allowed for a third of the film's overall budget to be crowdfunded. Today, THE DANGER ELEMENT can be found on Amazon and its distribution rights have been sold in several countries.
JITNI: "Book of Lies" Concept Art
These underground productions have been incredibly challenging for WESTHAVENBROOK, but have also allowed for personal connections and experiences among the expanding group of artists working under its banner that cannot be duplicated anywhere else. 

John's personal goal has always been honest expression in art. On top of having made films for nearly 15 years, he has worked in the Hollywood studio system for 4 years as an editor, but has always felt that the kinds of films he wants to make are not necessarily the kinds of films Hollywood makes. THE DANGER ELEMENT proved to him that this is not enough to stop him from telling these stories. His dream is to be able to continue making these films through the direct support of his audience and to offer a uniquely personal product that  they might not find anywhere else. 
Concept art for "Book of Lies" by Art Director Cassie Meder
THE CREW
Since the completion of his first feature length film, John Soares has lent his skills to projects for NBC Universal, Dreamworks Animation, Titmouse Inc., Amazon and Netflix. and his work has been distributed in international markets. Although much of his time between his previous project and the current endeavor has been spent working on mainstream media projects, John has never ceased in developing scripts for multiple projects born from his own unique vision. Of the many screenplays John has written since 2012, the project you are here to support is among the works he's proudest of.
Cassie Meder; Art Director, Production Manager, Actress
 Cassie Meder joined Westahavenbrook in 2010 in her acting debut in THE DANGER ELEMENT. She has since established a career in fine art, showcasing her traditional and digital works internationally; while forming a small business selling her images to collectors worldwide. Cassie has returned to the fold of Westhavenbrook to oversee art direction and production design, as well as to revisit a character previously featured in John's first feature film; THE DANGER ELEMENT... in a way you probably wouldn't expect. 
Ted Smith; Prop builder
Ted Smith began working with Westhavenbrook in 2011 creating iconic costumes and objects for use in THE DANGER ELEMENT, all while working for a prominent prop house in Hollywood. Ted has worked on some of the biggest movies in history including THE FIFTH ELEMENT, TITANIC, STAR TREK: INTO DARKNESS and many others and has produced and directed his own film, GUARDIAN OF THE REALM. In the midst of all this, Ted still took the time to work on our independent low budget production because he believed in the vision of Westhavenbrook. Ted has since taken the reigns of his own career and creativity, forming a business building costumes and props for independent artists in his own studio on his own terms, as well as building his own streaming and YouTube brand; THE EVIL TED CHANNEL. This independent force will be returning to the team to create key props to support our story, as well as to continue being one of our greatest cheerleaders. 
Doug Jones; Actor
Should his incredibly busy schedule permit, Doug Jones has expressed interest in joining us to revisit and reinvent his character from John's previous works, but don't get too ahead of yourself guessing in what way! We have something very unique in store for the likes of the world's favorite monster-man. 

Doug Jones has had an incredibly successful and busy year having started filming on the second season of STAR TREK: DISCOVERY as well as having starred in the 2018 Academy Award winner for Best Picture, THE SHAPE OF WATER.
Glen Gabriel; Composer
Swedish composer Glen Gabriel has been working closely with John since the stone age of social media communications... that's right. MySpace. Since meeting John and later composing the beautiful, dynamic original score for THE DANGER ELEMENT, Glen has since created music for a James Cameron production and has played an integral role in the development of this project as well as Westhavenbrook's potential for moving projects to international locations...
We look forward to having you on our next big adventure! If you've been with us through it all, welcome back. If you're just now joining us, welcome to the family. We have an incredible path ahead of us. 
Follow the team on instagram! @jitnii 
Can't donate now? Please share! We will be happy to share our endeavors with you in the future; just sign up for our mailing list to be notified!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Film is difficult to do without studio support and there are endless unpredictable factors that can slow down or stop the production. WESTHAVENBROOK is, however, uniquely capable of overcoming these obstacles, having made multiple ambitious projects with extremely limited resources, including THE DANGER ELEMENT, a full length, award winning action/adventure feature created on what is essentially no budget by industry standards.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

The rarity of these objects, the expense of having them produced and the need to have funds left over to make the film are factors that account for the expense of this reward.

updates.update_content: Rewards for the Book of Lies Kickstarter project are getting closer every moment.

When we I launched the Kickstarter campaign I had everything I needed to produce the promised rewards. But an application that I had used for years for producing DVDs and Blu Rays was discontinued once we were in production. Trying to find  a suitable replacement for this tool has proven to be a real challenge. I have gone through several candidates, some of which I payed full price for just so that I could test them. Earlier today I tested the first application that finally meets my standards. This means that I can finally begin making the Blu Rays for those backers who have them coming.

Sue McGarity , one of the executive producers on the project, passed away recently. Sue loved theater and film production and was very supportive of Westhavenbrook.

I'll be adding a dedication for her to the credits of the Blu Ray edition of the project.

It was brought to my attention that my previous release of the digital download pack did not actually allow you to download the folders individually. I apologize for that and have repaired this problem.
Below you will find links to 4 different folders.
The films were made in 4K, but we have included smaller files in case you have trouble with large video files. Each folder also contains 3 digital posters designed by Cassie Meder.

I am happy to announce that the two short films promised in the campaign, the initial short film and the stretch goal short film, are now both finished. 
We are looking at ways to get a package of digital download folders containing the films to each of you. You'll get to see it before anyone else!
I know we are delivering this later than promised, but I will always be incredibly grateful to the patience and support that each of you have shown me. I'll never stop thanking you for this.

campaign.story:
Featured On:
 Here is the full promo for PAQ, for those who wants more drama.
We travel all the time. In fact, 4 Billion people travel on airplane every year. Whether it’s a business trip, a long-planned family trip, or a weekend getaway, most of us needs to pack.  
Packing is a boring, time-consuming task. We all have better things to do than planning what to bring and folding everything carefully into a small bag only to be unpacked again.
Bring PAQ with you the next time you pack!
Added to the inconvenience is the concern that our stuff will not get there safely. Many of us have been there. Whether it’s a broken sunglasses or a spilled shampoo bottle, it can spoil the whole trip and makes us regret not putting more care into packing.     
Did you know that 20 million luggage are lost every year? No one knows how many more are mistreated. We’ve all heard horror stories of how our bags are thrown around, dragged and shoved into cargo. Imagine what all that would do to the stuff inside.
We roll, we fold, we bundle We pick the smallest bag possible so that the bag is a tight fit and won’t have empty space inside for things to tumble into a big mess.  
We take precautions. placing each item into the bag with space maximization in mind. We use packing cubes and vacuum packs, wrapping anything breakable with shirts and pajamas, zip-locking all the bottles, cover our shoes with plastic bags to protect our cloths from dirt and shoeprints, etc.  
Folding, zipping, compressing, wrapping and zip-locking is not the sexiest thing to do. Plus it takes up valuable vacation time.
Some take 2 hours just to pack. My girlfriend did and we missed our flight. (A lot actually happened that day)
Some just grab everything they need and shove it all into the bag. I did, and it costs me my good camera lens.
The Game Changer  
Wouldn’t it be better if we can choose any bag we want, fill it up with everything we need, and never have to worry? No spill, no broken glass, no wrinkled cloths. PaQ lets you do exactly that, and more….
PAQ Protects your stuff!
Pack Faster, Protect stuff from damage, Arrival notification. What more do you need?
*PaQ lets you pack faster!    
**PaQ protects your stuff from damage, spill, crease, and even theft!
***PaQ Notifies you when your bag arrives at the pickup carousel, so you don’t need to stand there waiting!
Smartphone notification lets you know when your bag arrives
 Packing with PaQ is simple;    
1. Pick a luggage  
2. Fill it with all the stuff you need  
3. Spread PaQ over the content.  
4. Press the big yellow button (or use PaQ mobile app)  
5. PaQ will auto-inflate until the bag is filled.’’
Packing with PAQ, No straps required.
 How PaQ Works  
PaQ expands and fill any remaining space inside your luggage, creating a tight cushioning fit. The tight fit that PaQ creates holds and protects everything in the bag together through bumps and swings. So, when you get to your hotel room, your stuff will also get there in one piece.
How about the return trip? When our bags are so filled with souvenirs and crumpled clothes? No worries! PaQ can be folded to as small as a rolled T-shirt to save space.  
Because no one wants to be that person with too many layers of cloths.
 PaQ can be used on all sorts of bags. So, wherever you go, however you plan to get there, PaQ has got you covered.  
*PaQ helps protect your stuff inside a luggage/case.    
**PaQ keeps your duffle bag/backpack in shape all the time.  
***PaQ tracks your baggage’s whereabout and notify you.  
PaQ does all this while needing minimal input from you. Guaranteeing to save you time, protects your stuff and lets you focus on your vacation.
So, the next time you pack, just PaQ and Go
 PAQ ships with 1 year limited warranty. The warranty covers accidental damage to the PAQ bladder and and electronic malfunction. We will replace and malfunctioned PAQ Free Of Charge but will requires inspection and shipping charge on accidentally damaged PAQ.
 PaQ is powered by 2 AA batteries,    
Why not rechargeable Lithium battery you ask? Well there are two main reasons:  
1. Lithium batteries loses their charge over time and are completely drained within 3-6 months. In a time when there are dozens of things we have to recharge every night (Smartphone, smartwatches, power-bank, tablets, camera battery, another power-bank, another camera battery, a laptop, headphone, portable speaker, etc. We simply do not have enough electrical socket! PaQ can last over 2 years without needing a new battery, even if you use it every week! 
2. Lithium batteries are banned from check-in baggage. This regulation is relatively new but is starting to become international standard. The reason being that Lithium batteries (especially low-quality ones) can burst into flame. Alkaline battery, being safer, is allowed on all flights.
Rewards
Enjoy up to 40% discount for Single PAQ and 50% discount for Double PAQ!
 PAQ x chipolo
With PAQ x chipolo add-on, you’ll be able to track the location of your luggage and be notified when your luggage is in range. This frees you from the much-hated never-ending luggage-watching crowd at the airport.  Now you can just sit back, relax, and wait for the prompt on your smartphone.
PAQ now ships with a dedicated chipolo socket
 For Business opportunities, please contact us at paqcompanion@gmail.com
More pictures for press can be found here.

updates.update_content:
Great news everybody!
Production and QC of the first lot has finished and we are quite satisfied with the result.
This means that we can start the packaging and shipping process right away.

updates.update_userinfo: Survey for Lot 1 closed, Production to be done by August 30th
updates.update_content:
Hi
As you all know we planned to split the production into 2 lots as we do not have sufficient funding to produce and assemble all the pledges at once. 
You should have received a delivery survey that asks for 19AUD (~13.5USD at time of writing) please note that the fund will go directly to the assembly and shipping cost of your PAQ and will put your name on a the list for the first production lot.

Here comes the long update.
Prototype: The Prototype finished and was sent to us after new year break. Since the inflatable bag mold is already made, this prototype featured the real deal (but not the right color though). Per functionality, the prototype circuit board performs well, cutting off air-pump power as soon as adequate pressure is reached. This ensures that PAQ never over-inflates and can be used in any container from a small backpack to a large luggage.

updates.update_userinfo: First Production survey to close on the 7th of July
updates.update_content:
Here is a quick production update on PAQ.
We were hoping to go for a big update this time around but things don't go as planned and we would like you to be informed. 
A production prototype is finally underway. We should get a picture to show you all in 1-2 weeks. After confirming the prototype, production will begin on the plastic mold, inflatable bag, and circuit board. Estimate delivery date for all backers is January-February 2019.

A lot happened since the last update. Our prototype gets to the factory. 
We have them source the parts for production. We received their initial quotation and pictures of sourced part. 
There was some problem with the air pump part not being the same spec and shape as the one we use in our prototype. They tried to find the exact same air pump shape but could not, so we'll need to adjust the ABS casing to fit the new pump design.

updates.update_userinfo: Production Samples arrived. Schedule for production. Urgent request.
updates.update_content:
We have come to agreement with a professional (yet friendly) manufacturing and assembly plant in China. Our prototype is being sent there at the moment. 
Once it gets there we will discuss detailed material and manufacturing to make sure that PAQ is produced according to our specification and to the highest standard.

campaign.story:
NOT-SO-SUPER GLUE
Let's face it: superglue is yesterday's adhesive.
It says it takes 30 seconds to set - yeah right! More like 30 minutes! It gets everywhere you don't want it to. AND it dries out when you don't want it to!
And if it really is so SUPER...then why do you also need epoxies for gap filling, sealants for cracks and leaks, and glue for specific materials?
 Introducing TOTAL GLUE - the only glue you need!
PLAY

Total Glue is a specially-formulated glue designed to cure instantly when exposed to blue light. Simply apply the glue, shine the included light on the glue, and in 5 seconds it will fully cure! 
ALL-IN-ONE
Total Glue combines the strength of super glue, gap filling properties of epoxy, and light-curing speed of acrylic resin together to make the ULTIMATE glue...without all of the negative experiences associated with those adhesives!
SUPER GLUE VS TOTAL GLUE
PLAY

Total Glue completely cures in 5 SECONDS when hit with the included blue light. Super Glue needs AT LEAST 1 minute to set...and then 24 hours for a full cure!
EPOXY VS TOTAL GLUE
PLAY

Total Glue is your gap filling choice over epoxy - NO mixing required, NO mess, and it cures in seconds instead of minutes!
OTHER LIGHT-CURING ADHESIVES VS TOTAL GLUE
PLAY

You may have seen other adhesives on the market that cure with light. One big difference is that Total Glue bonds objects together with or without the light, while the other acrylic adhesives CANNOT bond without the light.
  Total Glue's unique light-curing properties enable it to perform hundreds of different types of repairs.
BOND, FILL, SEAL, & REBUILD
BONDS WITH AND WITHOUT LIGHT
Total Glue bonds in 5 seconds when exposed to the blue light, making repairs and projects happen faster than ever! Unlike other light-curing glues on the market, Total Glue ALSO bonds objects without the light - it just takes about a minute to cure. 
FILLS GAPS LIKE EPOXY
Because Total Glue cures with light, it can fill gaps like an epoxy, but without the annoying mixing process, and the inevitable messes! Just alternate between applying Total Glue and curing with light to build up layers until your hole or gap is filled!
SEALS CRACKS AND LEAKS
Use Total Glue to seal off cracks in tile, counters, pipes, and more! You can also insulate exposed wires on computer and phone cords, saving you from the costly replacements. 
REBUILD/CREATE OBJECTS
Rebuild structures like handles and key fobs with Total Repair, or create new objects like a bolt for a screw!
WORKS ON ALL MATERIALS
WOOD
METAL
PLASTIC
GLASS
CERAMIC
HIGH STRENGTH BOND
Total Glue not only cures very fast, but it cures very STRONG. Watch us lift a bowling ball with Total Glue below!
PLAY

SANDABLE & PAINTABLE
Total Glue can be sanded down and painted. No ugly repairs or projects here!
CRAFT LIKE A PRO
Total Glue is the perfect tool for crafters and creators.
Its precision application tips allow for delicate projects to be accomplished without the mess, and the resin cures clear leaving no residue! 
The blue light cures the glue when you need it to, and where you want it to, helping you get more projects done faster. 
Because the glue cures with and without the light, you don't need to keep switching out different adhesives for different projects!
SO MUCH MORE!
We can't even begin to cover all of the amazing things you can accomplish with Total Glue. Here are a few more examples:
3-D PRINTING
CIRCUITRY
 SHOE REPAIR
PLAY

5g of Glue – Specially formulated glue can be cured by blue light or pressure   
Plastic Casing +Squeeze Applicator – Protective casing for easy application and storage   
Blue Light – Removable blue light LED and applicator to cure glue in seconds; batteries included  
Applicator Tip + Precision Tip: Total Glue comes with applicator tip for clean and easy application. A separate precision tip is also included for very small and precise repairs.
Cap – Keeps the glue from drying out  
 We learned about light-curing adhesives from the dentist office, and were blown away by the properties that make them so useful to dentists! So we set out to use this technology to make a glue to end all glues!
It took over 2 years for us to find the perfect adhesive that met all of our requirements:   
Cures in 5 seconds by light application 
Also cures under pressure where no light can get in
Maintains the same strength level as super glue 
Works on all surfaces 
Weak scent 
We tried the following types of adhesives: 
 1. Cyanoacrylate: This is the type of adhesive found in regular super glues. However, we couldn’t find one that cured under light.
2. Acrylic-based adhesives: Acrylic adhesives can be cured by UV light (you’ll see these in a lot of “As Seen on TV” products), but the bonding capabilities are poor, and such adhesives can’t cure under pressure without the light. 
Finally we discovered a specially-formulated methoxyethyl cyanoacrylate, that could both bond under pressure and cure instantly under blue light! It also met our other requirements, making us confident enough to bring this product to you!
Total Glue Sampler - $10
Total Glue Starter Kit - $30 ($25 for EarlyBird!)
Total Glue Family Pack - $55
Total Glue Pro Kit - $85
Total Glue Ultimate Value Kit - $230
 HOW TO PLEDGE?
1. Click on this link: https://kck.st/2L28TIS
2. Select which pledge level you want to support.
3. You will receive updates from us on the status of your order.
4. The expected receive date is October 2018!
        Once we pass $100K in pledges, a stretch-goal reward will be unlocked!
 Here are your two options for the reward:
1. For every $10 additional dollars you pledge on top of your current pledge, we will give you 1 additional unit of Total Glue with NO ADDITIONAL SHIPPING CHARGE!
OR
2. For every $25 additional dollars you pledge on top of your current pledge, we will give you 3 additional units of Total glue (at the price/unit of our Early Bird!), as well as a FREE unit of our Original As-Seen-On-Shark Tank Repair Wrap!!
For those of you wondering what in the world a Repair Wrap is, please click on this link and be amazed: What Is FiberFix Repair Wrap?
Final 3 Days Stretch Reward Pledge
The FIBERFIX: STRENGTH OF THE GODS KIT gives you $210 worth of FiberFix product for $100...that's more than 50% off!!
 Here is what is included in the kit:
Can I Still Qualify for the Other Stretch Goal Rewards with this Pledge?  
YES! If you also want the other stretch goal rewards, simply increase your pledge $ amount on top of your "FiberFix: Strength of the Gods" pledge level by either a multiple of $10 or $25 and you'll qualify for the extra Total Glue (and free 1" Repair Wrap for every $25) at no additional shipping cost.
 Total Glue has been featured in these media outlets:
We are a team of entrepreneurs and problem solvers with over 30 years of product development, manufacturing, and retail experience. Our FiberFix products have been featured on Shark Tank and are in over 24,000 retail locations worldwide. We are passionate about empowering consumers to fix things they could not easily fix before. 
We recognize the Kickstarter community as an innovative group of users, and wanted to introduce our ground-breaking Total Glue directly to you. We love the early adopter mentality of the Kickstarter clan, and know that you are not OK settling for the status quo! Neither are we! We genuinely want to revolutionize the glue industry, and want you to join us for the ride. We can't wait for you to try out this product!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’ve been in the tapes and adhesives business for 5 years and are very familiar with the manufacturing and fulfillment of consumer products. That being said, there is always the risk of delays due to shipping conditions or problems at the port. Additionally, the production timeline of such a specially-formulated glue can take a lot of time. However, we have built what we felt is a reasonable timeline buffer into your schedule for receiving the product. We have every expectation that this will be a seamless production process; however, we want to make sure you aware of the potential risks.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Backers,
We've seen comments from some backers indicating they have not received their product yet. 
We had some backers fill out their backer survey pretty late, and because we couldn't afford to wait for everyone to fill out their surveys we went ahead and processed and shipped the vast majority of orders so that those backers would not have to wait to receive their product.

Hello Backers!
We have had some inquiries into how to get replacements for any product where glue leaked. Please message us directly and we'll get one processed for you! It's difficult to keep track of comments and responses, so messages are the best way to accomplish this.

I think I got a workaround for the exploding glue problem. What worked for me was to seperate the black and the blue cap prior to breaking the seal. Screw the black cap on first without using the blue one. This way you can easily feel when the cap is screwed on firmly, but without the risk of being unable to unscrew the blue one afterwards.

I had no problem opening the tube, just make sure you hold it at both ends during assembly. One hand should handle the cap while the other has a firm grip near the the uv light, it can handle the torque.
If you open while you are gripping the whole body of the tool, you will unintentionally put pressure on the bars, not letting them open and you will get glued.
