campaign.story:
THE ULTIMATE PANT FOR TRAVEL, OUTDOOR, & EVERY DAY. 
After three years of searching for the perfect fabric, we are finally ready to present to you our finest, most versatile product yet - The Evolution Pant. A highly-functional pair of pants designed to be the only pants you need for travel, outdoors and everyday. Built with a unique stretch nylon Supplex® fabric, The Evolution Pant is stronger, softer, stain-proof and packed full of travel features to allow you to do more with less!
The Evolution Pant is the only pair of pants you need. A pair of pants that can be worn multiple days in a row without washing. A pair of pants that packs small than a t-shirt, moves with the body, and replaces at least three pants in your closet. A pair of pants that dresses up enough to get through any meeting, yet is rugged enough for any outdoor activity. Designed from the yarn up to feel like a fine cotton, but perform like a high-grade nylon. One pant for travel, outdoor, and everyday. The Everyday Pant, Elevated.
Available exclusively on Kickstarter, back the project and save 30%.
1. Back this project- You will be pre-ordering the pants
2. Select your reward level- Get Kickstarter exclusive discounts!
3. Calculate your Add-Ons
Please note, with add-ons you will select these products after the campaign is over. For now, just add the “add-on dollars” that represent what you will select after the campaign. Don’t worry if you get this wrong we can help you after the campaign.
The Evolution Pants are stain-proof, water-resistant, durable, packable, and versatile. Making them the ultimate pant for travel, outdoors, or everyday!
The Evolution Pants are packed full of features and meticulously crafted. They have been designed from the fiber up to be the best pants for traveling, outdoor activity, and the best everyday pants on the planet.
STRETCH GOAL REACHED!
Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goals, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE classic colors of your choosing and THREE inseam lengths from Short, Regular and Long. Thanks casting you color votes, sharing and helping make The Evolution Pant a reality!
You will select colors at the end of the campaign. Note- Colors may vary slightly in production.
For PR inquiries please e-mail colin@prmedianow.com
                                                                                                                                                                                     WHAT MAKES THE EVOLUTION PANT SO REVOLUTIONARY?
Stain Resistant
ARE THESE OUTDOOR PANTS? 
 Let's make one thing clear - these aren't just travel or outdoor pants! The Evolution Pant has been meticulously designed and crafted from the yarn level up to perform, look great, and feel great in every scenario no matter the weather or occasion.
COLORS:
Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goals, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE classic colors: Charcoal, Kahki, and Navy. 
You will select colors at the end of the campaign. Note- Colors may vary slightly in production.
    Water Resistant
To create the most versatile pants ever, we had to start from the yarn. We searched for years to find the ideal fabric with the soft feel and look of a cotton fabric, the durability and toughness of a nylon, stretch, and stain resistance. We finally found the ideal partner to create this fabric at a fully vertically integrated, sustainable, Bluesign approved mill in Sweden.
The key to the Evolution Pant is the nylon Supplex® fabric. Nylon is an incredibly durable fiber used in many products from rock climbing harnesses to parachutes. Supplex® takes the durability of nylon to the next level. The uncommonly strong fibers are air-texturized to make them incredibly soft. Supplex® takes hundreds of these extremely fine, air-texturized nylon fibers and spins them into thick durable yarns. The added fibers cause the yarns themselves to be stronger, but also more dynamic. The resulting fabric is abrasion resistant, ultra-durable, with the soft hand feel of cotton, and the perfect drape and stretch.
                                                                                                                            Available in:
Color: Charcoal, Navy, and Kahki
Sizes: 28-40 
Inseam: Short 30inches, Regular 32 in extendable to 34 in, Long 36 in extendable to 38 in.
                   REWARDS:
   ADD-ONS:
GOALS:
STRETCH GOALS REACHED! 
Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goal of $300,000, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE classic colors: Charcoal, Navy, and Kahki. We will also offer the pants in THREE inseam lengths: Short, Regular and Long. See details under Fit and Care. 
Thanks for helping make The Evolution Pant a reality! 
You will select colors at the end of the campaign. Note- Colors may vary slightly in production.
 FIT:
Model: 5'10', 160 lbs, size 32
STRETCH GOAL 2 UNLOCKED- Evolution Pants in Short, Regular and Long
Thanks to your overwhelming support we’ve quickly reached our stretch goal of $200,000, and will now be able to offer The Evolution Pant in THREE inseam lengths: Short, Regular and Long. See details below.
THE EVOLUTION PANT SHORT
SHORT only has 1 inseam length
 THE EVOLUTION PANT REGULAR
REGULAR has and extendable inseam from 32-34
 THE EVOLUTION PANT LONG
LONG has an extendable inseam from 36-38
  Model: 5'10' 160 lbs, size 32
CARE:
Due to our pieces having a Durable Water Repellent application, they will absorb less odor and staining. Thus, they can and should be washed less frequently.
CARE: Wash with like colors with mild detergent cold. Tumble dry low or lay flat. Do not use fabric softener during wash as this may damage the water repellency. Do NOT bleach. Do NOT dry clean.
A BETTER PROCESS: 
Why Bluesign? The Bluesign® system regulates and reduces environmental impact through the entire textile supply chain from yarn to the finished product. The system reviews the use of chemistry, energy usage, water and air emissions, worker safety and consumer safety. By developing guidelines and monitoring the implementation of the bluesign® system, Bluesign Technologies is encouraging the textile industry to increase their efforts in sustainability and reduce their environmental impact across the entire textile supply chain.
Handmade in the USA
USA Factory
USA Factory
Western Rise was founded on a desire to make multi-functional clothing that looks amazing and performs even better. We were overwhelmed by the amount of stuff in the world and wanted to simplify our lives and focus on the things that actually matter. Stylish, versatile, performance clothing allows you to do more with less meaning you can ditch the big suitcase, travel light, do more and see more.
It took a lot of people to bring this project to you, and we couldn’t be more excited!
We truly believe that it is not only our responsibility, it’s our obligation to protect the world we are part of and enjoy. Because of this we are 1% For The Planet Members and donate 1% of our revenue (gross revenue, not profit) to a group of certified nonprofits.
 Please note that per Kickstarter guidelines, we cannot use this crowdfunding project to raise funds for charity. We will certainly support our beneficiary organizations outside of Kickstarter, and celebrate this commitment with our backer community.
We can't say it enough. Thank you for supporting believing in us. We can't wait to get these new pants in your hands. 
                                                            In honor of our third birthday as a company, we are launching into a new category, the next generation of apparel. What better way to launch than to share our project with you first. We wouldn’t be here without the loyal support of our customers. It is your support, feedback, and encouragement that have brought us to this point. It has been a long journey to get here and we are excited to get started on the next phase together.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have been in the clothing business since 2014 and have brought over 24 styles to market. Our team has extensive experience in fabric design and manufacturing high-quality apparel as well as fulfilling lots of orders. We have our manufacturers lined up, and our production team is waiting for our signal. We know what we're doing, and you should be confident that we will deliver what we promise when we say we will. 
 
We have dealt with our fair share of manufacturing hiccups and always deal with them in a transparent, responsible way to keep our customers not just happy with their products, but also proud to support us. Should any issues come up, you can be confident we will handle them with transparency and the utmost care for you, our backers.
 
Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain, and have a lot of confidence that we can make what we say we'll make when we say we'll make it. But sometimes things happen, like fabric delays due to yarn being stuck in customs. We add time padding for these events, but sometimes it's not enough. If anything should arrive late we will get through it together.
 
We're deeply committed to and excited about delivering a high-quality product, on time, that we know you'll enjoy for a long time to come. 
 
Thank you for your support! We are deeply grateful that you're on this journey with us!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,

We hope this email finds you healthy and well. Summer is in full swing here in Telluride which means it is officially shorts season (When you live at 8,750 ft the shorts-wearing season isn’t very long). Which makes us all the more excited to announce the restock of one of our favorite shorts.

Hello Backers,

Happy New Year. I hope this update finds you healthy, and well.

2020 was a wild year! Like each of you, we did our best to manage COVID-19's impact on our supply chain, our team, our families, and everything in between. Despite the challenges, we had some big wins as well. Western Rise launched , a brand , and opened new headquarters and a showroom location in Telluride. We were proud to become , and with your help, we were able to of habitat and waterways and . To all of you that supported our small company in 2020 thank you from the bottom of our heart. It wasn’t easy and we certainly had our fair share of challenges but we have a lot to be grateful for as well.

Hello everyone,

Our fourth Kickstarter campaign is LIVE!

We just launched the ultimate performance accessory on Kickstarter. Meet the Versa Hat. We have been working on this hat for years and are excited to finally launch it with you.

Hello everyone,

2020 has been a crazy year! We have all made adjustments to our daily lives, and for many of us, this has included shopping a lot more online. Keeping track of where you shop, remembering log-ins, and tracking your shipments can be complicated. In an effort to make your lives easier, we have decided to offer some of our flagship pieces on Amazon Prime USA. By managing our own store on Amazon, we can ensure our Prime customers receive the same great quality and customer service you have all come to expect from us on Kickstarter and at westernrise.com.

updates.update_userinfo: PERFECT GIFTS FOR YOUR ONE-OF-A-KIND DAD
updates.update_content:
After countless requests over the last two years, we are excited to introduce the Evolution Short! They are now available for pre-order on our website.
Designed for ultimate versatility, the Evolution Short has unlimited potential - durable enough for hiking or biking, tailored for everyday, built swim-ready, and comfortable in the broadest range of possibilities and destinations.

Hello backers,
We hope you are all staying healthy and safe. With Summer on the horizon, we are hoping you are able to make the best of your situation and are having the chance to get outside (while social distancing of course!)

At Western Rise, we are still up and running, although it looks a bit different these days. Our entire team is working from home, and we have taken additional safety precautions to ensure our warehouse team is safe and healthy. Exciting new things are continuing to happen despite the quarantine. We are excited to share what we have been working on with you over the next few weeks.

Hello Backers!
Happy Holidays from all of us at Western Rise. We hope you are enjoying the holiday season. 
It’s been a hell of a year at Western Rise in the most encouraging and inspiring way possible.  We are beyond proud of the work our team has put in. The team made incredible strides in supply chain, sourcing and product quality, both improving upon our favorite styles and introducing a few new favorites. We traveled all over the world to find the best materials and factories to bring the world’s best products to life. We’ve worked tirelessly to improve the experience for customers, showcasing products more clearly and making exchanges and returns easier. Beyond that, we capped it off with , and we have a handful of new products and a couple of new category launches coming to the site in 2020. It’s been a big year to say the least!

comments.content: I too didn’t get my pants. If this is an error on my part please let me know how to rectify.

The back pockets was a surprise for me because it is a bit too small IMO, a bit larger would be nice, but this is only my opinion though. Please make short-pants with this same fabric with different styles & fit and make more colors for this pants, too, for example: charcoal, grey or brown-ish colors. Oh and I want you to make good durable tees too, like those with anti odor and stain repellency, and of course, light one. You have won my trust especially about fitting. I will keep an eye of your next amazing projects! Keep up the good work!

I put my Evolution Pant on this morning to take it out for a spin. Nothing to adventurous just some energetic cleaning around the house and taking care of the cats. The material moved well with me and never cinched up or became tight in places. Gusset is welcome, for sure. Although it doesn’t hide it well, my iPhone X fits perfectly in the media pocket with room to spare and without any fear of it popping out, slides easily in and out, even while seated. The material can attract lint but not as bad as other tech fabrics and at least it isn’t because of static from the material itself, I hate that. My Evolution Pant fabric is not a static electricity generator so far, and I’d like to keep it that way. Kudos to you @WesternRise.

Woohoo! Received my Email Evolution Pant (30” inseam) today and wow! Tried them on just the one time and they fit great, very lightweight but the material has a nice feel and hand to it, they don’t feel like other tech materials that could snag and run like pantyhose. They feel like they could dry faster than anything else I own. The jeans styling and the slim fit is just right, I can’t wait to put some serious time in them on our trip to Chile and Peru. Great job guys, I wish I had pledged for two pair and gotten a light color now that I know how awesome the Evolution Pant is.

campaign.story:
Hey!
After 2 Kickstarters and over 100,000 wallets sold, we’re back to spread our love of Tyvek® and Art. Showcasing 7 brand new designs by cutting edge artists worldwide, the Micro Wallet is our slimmest, strongest design yet. Not only that, a portion of every pledge will go to support the artists collaborating with us. Join us in our mission to put beautiful art in every pocket.
 
Micro Wallet is as small as a card when closed, yet fits up to 8 of them easily. A simple yet intuitive clam-style opening allows you to store and access your cards on-the-go with a flick of the wrist.
We know you carry around some bills as well, so we designed an all-new cash compartment. And yes, it fits all kinds of bills.
Micro Wallet starts out at just 0.3mm thicker than a standard credit card. We challenge you to find a slimmer wallet.
Micro wallet is made from one continuous piece of Tyvek® smart material with RFID seamlessly integrated into the fold which makes it virtually unrippable and highly resistant to wear & tear all while keeping your private electronic information safe from theft. Apart from being super-durable, the Tyvek® we use for Micro-Wallet is also water-resistant, so rain or shine, you know you’re protected
Don’t worry about loading up your Micro Wallet with cash, cards, receipts, notes, or whatever else you fancy. It’s paper thin, but still expands over time while remaining beautiful and never compromising durability.
When closed, Micro Wallet keeps your private data safe from electronic theft. The 360-degree RFID protection is built in so you won’t even notice it. Where did we fit it all in? Well, that’s our secret.
        Choose Any Designs. Exclusive Packaging. 30% Off Retail. Share the love with some people you love.
 
   Paperwallet was born out a of desire to fuse function with design and comfort in our everyday carry accessories. In 2015 we launched our first Kickstarter campaign for the Slim Wallet followed by the Magic Coin Pouch. Thanks to our amazing backers and supporters, over 100,000 people worldwide are enjoying our products everyday.
We’ve listened closely to what our customers were missing and what they wanted - and designed the Magic Coin Pouch to be the ultimate minimalist solution for coin and cash. Here is what our customers are saying about the Magic Coin Pouch and Slim Wallet.
   We are extremely grateful for the support we’ve received from our crowdfunding community. We love what we do, and its you that makes it all possible.  
Patent no. 14536350
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is Paperwallet’s 3rd Kickstarter project. We have more than 10 years of experience in designing, testing, manufacturing and shipping our products globally. We understand the risks and challenges of the production process which is why we perform rigorous testing of all products before launching them to market. Unexpected issues may arise and if they do we always deal with them with our customers’ satisfaction at the top of our priorities list.
 
In short, we know what we’re doing and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will, when we say we will. We promise that should any unexpected issues arise, we will handle them with clear communication, transparency and care. 

Supply Chain:
We are very proud of our supply chain and are confident that we can create the product with the highest quality and on time. We promise to put our energies and focus to ensuring customers satisfaction, product quality, and meeting deadlines.

Logistics:
One challenge we have considered is blasting past our funding goal and coping with a large direct-to-customer delivery. However, we have learned a great deal from our last campaigns and have lined-up several options for survey & logistics partners who have vast crowdfunding experience.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey, 
We are super excited to hear that some of you have already started to receive your rewards! For those of you who have not yet receive your shipments, do not worry it is still early and your shipments are on their way.
We’d like to take this opportunity to dive into the details and share some insights with you about your new Micro Wallet and Coin Pouch.
IT'S NOT PAPER
Please take your seats and prepare for shipping.

Hey, 
As we approach the final stages of production, we start to get logistics organized. Therefore, we plan to lock down all orders in 1 week.  All backers will have until Thursday the 26th of July to finalize their surveys, add any product and if necessary change their address.
SURVEY LOCK DOWN - THURSDAY, JULY 26

Hey!
We are happy to let you know that we’ve started production, are making great progress, and are still on track to deliver on time!
In the past few weeks we have been busy purchasing all the required raw materials, produced the RFID blocking material, finalizing the artworks for both products and packaging, and started our move to final production.

updates.update_userinfo: Surveys are in, and we’re on to production!
updates.update_content:
We are pleased to let you know that we have received over 90% of surveys and have enough data about the demand of products & designs to jump into production. We're oiling up the gears of or production machine and are on schedule to ship out in August... this summer!
There are still over 800 backers who have not yet completed their survey. If you’re one of the 800 please make sure to check your inbox, spam folder and promotions folder to find the link to your survey. If you still can’t find the email you can access your survey via the recovery link below. Simply click the link and input the email associated with your kickstarter account.

Hey,
Check your inbox... we've just sent out the surveys!
If you don’t see it yet check again and then try checking your spam or promotions folder.  If you still don't see it you can use the link below and enter the email address associated with your kickstarter account to have another survey emailed to you.
Our Kickstarter campaign has come to an amazing end and we extend a HUGE THANK YOU for helping us reach such an incredible success!

updates.update_userinfo: Introducing the Brooklyner & 7 FREE Artist Posters

Hey,
With less than a week left to the campaign we have reached amazing new heights!  We're happy and honored to have over 6,000+ backers and we'll say it once again - we are very thankful and appreciate the support from each and every one of you!
Introducing Philippe

With more than 5,000 backers strong and over 1,000% funded we truly can't describe how grateful we are. 
WELCOMING OUR NEW ARTISTS: Deimion & Marlies

campaign.story:
The Tutorials Book
How to THINK when you DRAW will be a 200 page full colour hardback book measuring 8.5" by 8.5". The book collects together MASSES of my drawing tutorials, covering an enormous range of subjects. The series is EXTREMELY user-friendly, designed to benefit every skill level, from the absolute beginner to the seasoned professional. The tutorials are better seen than described, so GO HERE for 100 FREE TUTORIALS.
The NEW 600 Page Sketchbook
The Deluxe Collection Part 3 will be a 600 page softcover black and white book measuring 8.5" by 8.5". The artwork will be divided into chapters themed around character design, pose and gesture sheets, monsters, robots, concept vehicles, environment design, world building and much more.
The Art of Stranski reprint
The Art of Stranski is a 100 page full colour hardback book measuring 12" by 8.5". The original book raised £40,000 on Kickstarter last year and immediately sold out. We're offering you another chance to get it. To learn all about the book, just visit THE ORIGINAL STRANSKI CAMPAIGN HERE.
Shipping costs for customers outside the UK
For UK customers postage is FREE, but if you live outside the UK you'll need to add a shipping cost when you pledge, as detailed in the boxes on the right. I'm sorry it's expensive, but these books are HEAVY (especially the sketchbooks).
Sketchbooks 1 & 2
In the higher tiers you can get my two 600 page Deluxe Collection Sketchbooks at a lower price than normal. These books are softback black and white MONSTERS, filled to the brim with thousands of my designs, concepts and illustrations. To sample the work in these books just check out THE ORIGINAL SKETCHBOOKS CAMPAIGN HERE.
A huge thank you for taking the time to watch the video and check out the campaign, you can find out more about me and my work HERE.
Now just scroll down to choose your rewards...
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I've had a great deal of experience with both publishers and printers from working on the many books I've written and illustrated. I've designed and produced books for large publishing houses such as Random House, and also successfully self published many ambitious projects, including three campaigns on Kickstarter, which collectively raised £60,000, and were all completely delivered on time.

All the artwork for the HOW TO THINK WHEN YOU DRAW book and THE DELUXE COLLECTION PART 3 is finished, and the books are completely laid up. I already have proof copies, so once the campaign ends we can put the books right into production. Then it's just a case of sketching, signing and prepping up all the packages in good time ready to ship to you in August.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: The UK's MOST SUCCESSFUL comics KICKSTARTER of ALL time, COMPLETELY fulfilled ON TIME.
updates.update_content:
Well, here we are at the final update on this record-breaking campaign - all the surveys have been sent out over the past 3 months, and every single package (if you've filled in your survey!*) has now been sent, meaning everyone will have their books by the end of September, as promised. In fact, the vast majority of you have them already.
7,500 copies were signed, 450 pieces of original art now have new homes, I processed through 10 TONNES of books, and sent out more than separate packages to over different countries. for bringing this thing to life, without you it would not exist, and an extra thank you to who helped me out in the crazy first month of sending all those tier one packages (he got so he could bag and box a book in under ).

updates.update_userinfo: Going into production: The Fulfilment Schedule.
updates.update_content:
Hey guys, I'm back to tell you how the production schedule will run from here until September. I know that many of you have never backed a Kickstarter before, so I'm going to go into quite a bit of detail around how its going to work.
I'll be receiving the funds from Kickstarter in the next couple of weeks, at which point I'll send the 7,600+ books to print , and I'll order the 3D glasses (for Stranski tiers) and all the packaging etc from the manufacturers. Once it all arrives here at the studio I'll begin sending out the "surveys" (which will come to you via email from Kickstarter - it's basically a form asking for your delivery addresses etc).

updates.update_userinfo: £243K ($343,000), 24,000% funded, the UK's MOST SUCCESSFUL COMICS KICKSTARTER of ALL TIME. THANK YOU!
updates.update_content: Guys, you took this crazy free tutorial project of mine and turned it into a £243,000 kickstarter, I am so SO grateful for the support and love you've all shown me through this campaign, it is MASSIVELY appreciated. You have no idea how wonderful this has been to watch unfold, and what it means in terms of how much more free online content I can now put out each week. What an amazing community of kind, generous and inspiring creators you all are.

updates.update_userinfo: £200K (well over a QUARTER OF A MILLION DOLLARS). Thank you ALL!
updates.update_content:
This morning the Kickstarter passed £200K (well over a quarter of a million dollars), so THANK YOU ALL.
I wanted to take this moment to say that if you're a struggling artist, and money's tight, then please know that you DON'T NEED TO BACK THIS CAMPAIGN TO SKILL UP. Nor do you need to pay for expensive subscription or paywall services, or online courses. Just keep it tuned to The Etherington Brothers, and we're going keep on delivering MASSES of tutorials on you're ever going to need to know about drawing and writing (and some stuff that you may indeed need to know!), week in, week out.

updates.update_userinfo: We're now in the TOP 25 MOST FUNDED comics projects of ALL-TIME after just 2 WEEKS.
updates.update_content:
Guys, thank you all so much, you've bumped this project into the TOP 25 MOST FUNDED comics projects of ALL-TIME on Kickstarter! 
Thank you so much for all the wonderful comments and incredibly generous sharing and shouting out about the campaign you've been doing, it is so so appreciated. We're posting up multiple FREE tutorials EVERY DAY on the blog and social media at the moment, hope you guys are enjoying them :)

We passed £100K ($140,000) last night, and I just wanted to drop in and say a HUGE thank you to you all for pushing this thing so high in just seven days. The support you guys are giving this project is wonderful, thank you all SO MUCH.
And huge cheers to those of you that have dropped me a line to tell me that even though you don't have the funds back the campaign, you're sharing it out and spreading the word. That is VERY kind of you!

updates.update_userinfo: We've been trending as the MOST POPULAR LIVE PROJECT on ALL OF KICKSTARTER. Thank you!
updates.update_content:
Hey guys, just wanted to say a MASSIVE thank you to you all for coming on board the campaign.
There is such a wonderful community around these free tutorials. Your kindness in not only backing the project, but also sharing it far and wide with your friends and followers, and taking the time to write me really awesome messages of support has been so, so amazing. Thank you ALL! You guys got this project trending as the MOST POPULAR LIVE PROJECT on ALL of KICKSTARTER, which is just INCREDIBLE.

I can't say I can afford to be epic every time but I am happy to be epic this time. I hope to see a full Stranski comic book in the future. Format wise, I am largely stuck with the floppy industry, which I'd prefer to be abolished in favor of thicker collections of various production values. Little manga books up to lovely French comic volumes. Just one consumer's tastes to throw into a bucket in the corner. Good luck no matter what you do.

FYI - Received package 1 of 2 yesterday 8/24/18 in Tennessee, US of A. Just in case you wanted to keep mailing data or whatnot. Loving it. I very much enjoy the matte-ness of the paper. I've long felt the shiny magazine paper the comic books largely converted to is actually annoying - too reflective of light, too reactive to body oils, making finger prints, etc. But I really love Stranski, I need this to be a series of some kind. I feel such a Disney/Tintin/Will Eisner/Milt Caniff delicious comic mutant baby that needs to be birthed. Something PG-ish, film noir with more imagination. campaign.story:
Our world timer shows the time for the main 24 time zones simultaneously whereas a traditional GMT can only monitor one other selected time zone. True world time watches traditionally cost upwards of $5,000 to $20,000, however we devised a new kind of solution. Using a clever dual-layer rotating disc system, we are able to reverse engineer the first quartz hybrid world timer using a Swiss GMT movement.
This isn’t our first rodeo. The World Traveller will be our fourth watch collection to be created by Kickstarter. Our quality, transparency, & pricing is second to none - we offer full warranties & communicate our production process from beginning to end.
Elliot Havok watches have been featured in these outlets
We’re using the best materials and components we can find to build an excessively quality watch- Italian Natural Calf Leather, Swiss Movement, and 316L Stainless Steel Case with Oyster Bezel.
FLUTED BEZEL
The case is to be sandblasted first, to have all the edges softened, but also brushed on the fluted oyster bezel, to offer a distinct surface. A fluted bezel, such as on a Rolex, practically doubles the available flat polished surface area on the bezel. Allowing not only a greater surface for light refraction, but also the ability to reflect light from different angles at the same time.
Featuring Single Layer Superluminova C3
For the past 5 years we have chose to work with an established watch manufacturing group known for rigorous quality control. We have a great relationship with our manufacturing partners. We've thoroughly toured their facility multiple times and they are completely aligned with our goals. In 2017, they revamped all their facilities with the latest manufacturing equipment and processes.
With multiple stages in the manufacture and quality check process, we are confident in their ability to deliver a quality product. We were impressed with their sophisticated manufacture process including different rooms for assembly, air pressure checkpoints, water pressure stations, 48-hour timekeeping accuracy test, and (of course) a drop test. All of their facilities meet all necessary regulation and code for operation.
Though they host the manufacturing of many large retail brands, the general managers made sure all of our requirements were met and accommodated. Their experienced staff and attention to detail was what made our decision to choose them so easy. We, at Elliot Havok, are extremely confident they will meet our needs.
We will offer the Havok watch at wholesale pricing with radical transparency. Not only should the watch be priced so that nobody breaks their bank, but what goes into the watch should be disclosed.
By delivering directly to YOU, we can cut out all the middlemen markups.
SPECIFICATIONS: 
Case Diameter: 42 mm 
Case Thickness: 9 mm 
Face Diameter: 38 mm 
Band Material: Italian Leather Band 
Band Max/Min Length: 21cm/15.5cm 
Band Width: 20 mm 
Lug Width: 2.5mm 
Total Weight: 57g 
Case Material: 316L Steel 
Back Plating: Stainless Steel 
Clasp: Standard Buckle Clasp 
Clasp Material: Stainless Steel 
Dial Window Material: Sapphire Crystal Glass 
Display: 3-hand Analog w/ Rotating GMT & Date
Movement: Swiss ETA 
Water Resistance: 5 ATM / 50 Meters
Get Your Project Funded Today!
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
       HI-RES GALLERY: HERE
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If this project gets funded, we will have to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadlines. Projects often have trouble when facing the production process and deadlines for shipment.

The project could face possible challenges if the quality of the product or packaging does not meet our requirements after production. However, we have extensive experience and close relations in manufacturing and production.

In addition, we will not be outsourcing the post-production work to another company. Our team is prepared to ensure that post-funding will run like clockwork when the time comes (pun-intended).

Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of production. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and ahead of schedule.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
HELLO BACKERS!
It’s the end of the longest winter and we’re having our annual SPRING SALE! Thank you all for all for supporting our Kickstarters in the past and this code will allow you to get any timepiece in our collection for Kickstarter pricing!

Hello Backers!
Hope you all have been well! Just wanted to drop a quick line and let you know we are having our annual SUMMER SALE - exclusively for our Kickstarter backers! If you've ever wanted one of our previous models like the World Traveller or Racer Chrono, now is the best time!

comments.content: ****crickets****
Elliot Havok - Customer Experience Manager
Never received watch. Three further emails to them unanswered.

I haven't got the tracking number nor received the watch yet. Not sure if my address is correct, also because I'm asking for the watch to be shipped to Thailand. Just wanted to know how I can track the progress on this. Thanks!!
I got the tracking number, but haven't received the watch. I've emailed you several times with no response. Could you get back to me please?
Hi. I didn't receive the email. I will send one directly to you. Thanks.

Got the watch and this is the second watch from Havok that I backed in KS. The Traveler watch is neat but the fonts are really small for me and quite difficult to read. I got the onyx black and not sure if it is just me but the color was more vibrant in the pictures than the actual watch. Lastly, the times in each of the cities that are not directly aligned with the indices are not accurately shown unlike those that are directly aligned with the indices. Is there a way to adjust this? I followed the instructions and read it several times to check if I missed some details but still having challenges making it work.

I received mine and feel so amazed with the overall finishing and the details; it looks fit and I am not regret at all ! you are doing very good job team. This is one of the best collection on my watches!
Received the watch last week - and so far the only project I backed that actually was delivered on time. Congratulations, it seems you guys really know what you're doing. Thank you!
It’s a nice looking watch watch but the font is so tiny that even with my reading glasses I can’t read the names or the inner wheel numbers. Not suitable for less than perfect eyesight.
Just arrived today in South Korea. Looks beautiful, Thanks Havok!
Got my watch today, it is looking great. Thanks Havok.
thanks for the watch Elliot I love it
Are you going to sell its spare bands in the near future? Not the ones for QCW, but the same ones for World Traveller. I truly love this watch and want to use it for a long time. Thank You.
Overall I'd give it a 7.5 out of 10 :)

Sent you guys a dm. According to tracking my package was delivered over the weekend while I was out of town. Says accepted by a person.... Thinking it was stolen? Next steps? Contacted usps in person they are going to ask the carrier that delivered over the weekend.
When should I be receiving my watch?
Ah, got it! Very clever.
Any update on my order label created was suppose tobe here 8/31/2018
Hi got tracking number of says label was created and waiting for item? Any update?
Got it! Just beautiful.
@Nick you must live next to them that fast
Arrived today!! Looks beautiful. Can’t wait to make this my daily watch.
Hi there! Been a month since our last update, are we getting another one soon?
So, when are the early shipments starting? Are you shipping a certain style or region first?
Thanks!
A piece of quick update would be most appreciated. We are your investors not regular customers. It’s very important to keep your “investors” updated on a regular basis. Thank you.
I haven’t received my survey yet. How can I fix this?

I notice that you have a sale on your website for 25% off which also applies to the world timer which brings the price down to $ 126 change. Isn't this unfair to all the early Kickstarter supporters? I can understand a price change or discount after the Kickstarter commitments are met..but surprised to see this even before the Kickstarter pledges are fullfilled.
Did all surveys were sent out? Im yet to find mine
Hi everyone, I'm planning on selecting the Cloud White but before I pay $12 bucks for a black band, is anyone here willing to swap bands with me? Thanks.
When will the surveys be collected?
News please
Any update on when you will be shipping?
I wish the black version had gold instead of silver, man that would look beautiful.
Thanks
Hello, will there be additional options after funding to allow extra band selections as add-ons?
Great looking watch! Can't for the next update.
I've seen several other city suggestions posted here. Any thought to having a poll for the most wanted? I personally would prefer Tokyo over Seoul.
How does the daylight saving time work for this watch?
Why is my Super Early Bird pledge more expensive than the other pledges?
Is there a possibility to state lower value on the shipping invoice - say 20 USD ?
Smaller size for women!
I didn’t see a white face as an option in the poll. That’s what I prefer. Thx.
Would you consider doing a day/night color on the inner rotating disk to better indicate the difference? Or maybe even a different color tone on the numbers themselves?
Please give us the midnight blue dial with the silver steel case!!!
Another example is the edge with cities of one color and the gimbal of another color.
Would it be possible to get the blue dial with the silver case?? It looks so much better...
+1 Tim never thought of that

Regarding the straps update. The reason I would like either metal or rubber or both as optional straps is that I am one of those crazy people who does not wear leather, fur, or anything else made from animals (I am also vegan). So I end up having to find my own replacement straps, which is not always easy. Other options might be carbon fiber or Nato type (nylon). Anyway, everyone always does leather because it’s easy. Be different! :-)

Congratulations on the success of your campaign, I was wondering if it would be a possibility to offer different case bezel combos? I really like the white face but would prefer the watch with the black straps, would it be at all possible to order that combination? Again congratulations and much success to you.

I'm already a backed, will absolutely be picking one up! But I'd love to see th blue face in the silver case, instead of just in the gold. I have been on the hunt for a blue faced watch, but, frankly, I only want a gold watch that's made of gold!
Especially since countries like Brazil shift during their summer/our winter - I think I would always confuse myself during the spring and fall changeovers
I'm take poll of color backers are going to choose. Please post your choice.

I like the point metallic red color of the triangle at 12 o'clock of the Quarter Century watch. Can you consider to make sandstone gold case with the white face? It would be great if you can change the color of the second hand of the white face watch to the exact same metallic red color as the red triangle at 12 o'clock. I really like that red color.
@creator was looking at the green watch comments theres a backer posted earlier needs help
Really 5-7 years on the battery thats great!
How long does the battery last on average?

On the Midnight watch is the date in blue or black? It is difficult to tell as some images seem to show blue on white and others black on white. I also wonder if it would not be better if the date was white on blue or white on black for respectively the Midnight and Onyx Black watches.
A black rubber watch band as an additional item/perk would be great. Thanks!
I also would like to have the Midnight blue in brushed stainless steel.
What will be the retail price?
@breb you got me beat, I think this is my 26th watch. I’ll second the forest green, don’t have one of those yet
My suggested color combo would be the midnight blue face with the standard 316 case or a “space grey” variety. The gold finish is a non starter on the blue for me

I’m curious if you plan on doing any additional metal/face color options. I already have your QCW in steel/white and I really like the gold color but am hoping for a more flexible face color as blue wouldn’t be a day-to-day color for me.
I hope there will be options to buy extra leather straps of different colors or textures.
Are we open to using the Havok font logo from the quarter century watch. Somehow I prefer that version than the common Havok logo

campaign.story:
We’re back! It “only” took 1 year, but we finally cracked how to engineer t-shirts that will make it easier than ever to look your best.

The outside repels liquids and semi-liquids, while the inside wicks away moisture. Sweat stains are not visible and you stay dry even in the most humid climates.

Engineered to make life easier - without compromising on style and comfort. 

We use a unique combination of 3 of the most innovative textile technologies - something which has never been done before in a 100% cotton product.
On the outside our t-shirts are hydrophobic. This means that they repel liquids and semi-liquids. Even serious spills like red wine or beetroot juice can easily be rinsed off with water.
We added natural silver particles to the yarn, which kills the odour-causing bacteria in your sweat.
The inside absorbs and wicks away moisture, automatically spreading your sweat across a larger surface and towards the exterior of the cotton, making it easy to evaporate through the fabric. Moisture wicking also makes the fabric breathable and fast-drying.

Visible sweat stains become a thing of the past - even in a grey t-shirt.
Our mill in Portugal only uses 100% soft long-staple 180 g/m2 cotton with a high tear resistance.
Our t-shirt is the perfect marriage between style and performance. Together with our designer we used data from 67.000 men to design the perfect fit. Our grading ensures the basic fit matches 85% of European male bodies
We specialize in premium basics made for an action-packed life. They work wonders when you bike to work or go on a long-haul flight. However bear in mind that we make fashion products, not sportswear.
  Our dress socks are antibacterial and odour-free, thanks to the 12% Frescura silver we have added to the fibers. The silver kills 99.9% of bacteria, which means your feet (and socks) stay fresh all day and even longer.
Our story began one year ago on this platform, when we launched the odour and stain repellent white dress shirt.

We got 1000% funded and immediately quit our jobs, so we could turn LABFRESH into a real business.

Without Kickstarter we wouldn’t be here today.

Launching new products is scary. It requires a lot of resources to get new technologies out of the lab and into a real supply chain.

That is why we would like to see if the Kickstarter community is interested in our new invention before we go into full-scale production.

Our mission hasn’t changed. We want to fight fast fashion and over-consumption by creating products engineered to last a lifetime. True sustainability is when you can wear your clothing for years instead of buying new stuff all the time.
Lotte Vink & Kasper Brandi Petersen
How to measure A and B 1) Lay your favorite t-shirt on a flat surface 2) Start measuring on the seam 1cm below armpit (A) or 1/2-way your waist height (B)3) Measure the distance to the exact same spot on the other side4a) Exact match? Great!
4b) Not an exact match? Not to worry. A deviation up to 3cm should still fit, as the shirt will be stretched out.

C and E should be the leading measurements when deciding what size to choose.
No harsh chemicals. Yes, we use chemicals. But we don’t dip our fabric in big tubs of chemicals. Instead of traditional coatings we press a paste directly into the fibers, so that the surface remains unaffected. OEKO-TEX certified and in accordance with the REACH, which is the strictest standard for use of chemicals in textiles in the world. It’s so safe so our scientists literally use their mouths during the development process.
We work with some of the best mills and factories in Portugal - one of the most respected manufacturing hubs in Europe. All treatments are sourced within the EU.
                                              Unlimited cancellation. You are able to cancel your order at any point of time and get a full refund.
90 days size guarantee. If your size is wrong we send you a new shirt in the right size free of charge (we do not provide free return labels).
Free and easy shipping across the EU, US & Canada. Shipping costs to other parts of the world is only €15.
This campaign has been promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped over 5,000 creators make their projects a reality.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
LABFRESH is fashion, not sportswear. You might be able to run a marathon in it without smelling, but that is not what our products are intended for. 

With regards to stains we have been able to wash off any liquids and semi-liquids with water. However if you rub a substance into the fabric with force or if a very oily sauce comes in contact with the fabric, it will eventually make a slightly visible stain. You'll have to put it in the washer at 30 degrees to get the stain off. 

Production delays and unforeseen obstacles are always a risk. This is however not our first rodeo and we know our factory and mill well. We are very happy with the 35 perfect prototypes we had so far, and we are confident they will be punctual.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Reminder: Final Deadline to collect your pledge!
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
We would like to kindly remind you that this is the time to collect your pledge, if you haven't done that yet.
This morning we sent the instructions on how to choose the colour and size of your t-shirts to everyone who didn't collect their pledge yet. Please check your inbox (the same email address that you use on Kickstarter) and don't forget the spam folder!

updates.update_userinfo: Final deadline to collect your pledge!
updates.update_content:
Dear backers, 
if you haven't collected your pledge yet, now is the time :) 
This morning we sent to everyone who didn't collect their pledge, the instructions on how to choose the colour and size of your t-shirts. Please check your inbox, the same email address that you use on Kickstarter and don't forget the spam folder!

All orders will be delivered between now and end of October, depending on inventory levels.

Dear backers,

We have good news!

The supermen and women in our warehouse have bundled, packaged and sealed like crazy. The first 1000 parcels are now beautifully packed in pretty boxes with notes and care guides and are on their way to you!

Dear backers,
Your order is nearly ready to be shipped, so please double check the shipping address you gave us.
We recommend using a business address, because in holiday periods and during the week, you might not be at home. In which case the parcel will, after multiple failed deliveries, be returned to our warehouse by the shipment company.

Dear backers,
We hope all is well. :)
Via this update we want to inform you about shipping dates and the progress of the t-shirt production.
Development & Production

Time for our first post-campaign update!
Development 
Two weeks ago we visited our Swiss technology partner in the mountainous countryside of Switzerland.

updates.update_userinfo: Development & Production Update and Something Cool to Share
updates.update_content:
If you have collected your Kickstarter order, thank you! You don't need to read further. Your Kickstarter products, including any complementary products you ordered with 25% off, will be delivered by the end of July.

If you didn't collect your products via our website yet, then please do so before May 25.

How to collect? It's easy!

Hi guys!
By now everyone should have received an email from us with information on how to collect your pledge, pick your preferred style, colours and size. 
Follow the instruction in the email carefully and collect your pledge! :)
Initially some confusion arose because not everyone had received their voucher code. Our apologies for this. By now everyone should have received their together with the instructions on how to use it.

Dear backers!

We are working hard on building the backer webshop where you can customise your pledge. We are almost ready!
But here already some information that will hopefully help with choosing the right size :)

If you’re not yet sure about the size you should choose, please use the guide and explanation below to find out.

great product, absolutly great team and support! thank you

got a mail weeks ago that I am one of the first to try the shirts. But still no delivery. Can you check pls?

Order #11984
Thank you!
I NEED MORE! WHEN CAN I HAVE MOOORE?!
Black t shirt is awesome!!!! works like a charm....
I got 2 shirts. The black one is great. The white one got sweat stains I can't remove after one use.
Thanks ! No problem, I'm waiting for October so.
Please make the women's version of this. Pleeeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaase. (Why is it so hard for me to find technical clothing fitting for me, as a woman? :( )

After wash, it is still there. Pretty disappointed as I specifically picked a white shirt since you market the shirt as "stain repellent". I'm hesitant to repeat this procedure since it's only guaranteed for 50 washes.
I got my shirts, they feel a little stiff. There is also no stretch at all.
Hi, I just got an email asking how I like the shirts. The problem is that I haven't received them yet. I did receive an email saying they were shipped but never did receive tracking info.
Thanks team labfresh !
Nice work, Creator.
Thanks! Can't wait to get them!
Hello, I replied to your email about out of stock v necks and made a mistake. I would like white round necks instead of navy v necks please
Also, I only got an email stating that you are out of white v neck shirts, nothing about a tracking number...
@Lotte,why rinse the shirt after the first use and should I really get it soaked or just rinsed?
My order was incorrect, i pledge for 2 t-shirts and 2 pair of socks, i only got 1 t-shirt and 2 pair of socks.
Hi, can you confirm if my order has been shipped? Expected end of this week?
Got my T-shirts today. They feel nice. Good fit, though somewhat on the small side (is that even English?) Very happy with them!

Very small indeed. I am XL size in everything, sometimes L. I measured carefully according to the guide and the XL t-shirt I received is ridiculously small, more like a compression vest than a t-shirt, and what I would expect if I tired to wear a medium normally. This range is clearly not an option unless you're stick thin. Very disappointed.
I just got my parcels. All is good and perfect as I thought. See you next time.
My orders status has been " Ready to Ship" for about 11days. What's going on?
José
Got my t-shirts last week, they are awesome, thanks guys, also hope you can do the v-necks on grey and black and add some more colors like burgundy or forest green in the near future.

just got mine today. LOVE everything about this tee shirt: the fit (xs), the way it drapes on me, the width of the shirt collar & the curve, the length of the shirt, sleeve length, color (grey, black, white). thank you Labfresh team!! this certainly won’t be the last of Labfresh product i purchase! your shirts look promising too!

campaign.story:
INTRODUCING ZERO₂ - OUR BEST WALLET EVER!
To celebrate the 2 year anniversary of our first ever product launched right here on Kickstarter, we’re proud to introduce Zero₂ - a series of top grain leather wallets inspired by Minimalists.
We’ve made a ton of improvements from the feedback we’ve been given over the years and added extra features that we think you will love. Sharing the same vision we did years ago with you - again. Designed with pure simplicity, for the modern minimalist in you.
THE 2 YEAR DESIGN PROCESS
Since the launch of Zero, we’ve been always looking for ways to improve its function further with years of customer use and feedback from all our supporters around the world, which include:
We've also added these new features across the board which we think you'll love:
Sleeker Design for easy card/cash storage
Pull Tab ejection system to allow even quicker card access
Open Slit system that allows simple card scrolling and access seamlessly
Super strong magnet closures for that extra peace of mind
Improved stitching techniques for extra durability
ADD-ON STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED!
Click Here To Add-On!
Then we decided to expand our range, introducing our first ever Zero₂ series minimalist Bi-fold and Travel wallets.
DESIGNED FOR MINIMALISTS
Designed with minimalism in mind, we believe we created something special. We are truly proud of what we’ve achieved, and would love to share it with our supporters and the rest of the world through Kickstarter, where it all began!
RFID SECURED
New technologies with RFID scanners and increase in identity theft and fraud worldwide - All ZERO₂ wallets are lined with RFID shielding materials - helps keep your personal information shielded - always.
ZERO₂ TOP FEATURES
All of our ZERO₂ series wallets feature these qualities, to ensure that no matter where you are, what you do - you always manage to beat the bulge.
RFID lining protection for maximum on-demand protection
ULTRA SLIM design perfect for everyday carry
GENUINE leather materials in modern simplistic colour options
WOVEN Q-Band straps for extra versatility
HIGH QUALITY hand-made finish for luxury feel
IMPROVED stitching for extra durability
ANGLED slots for easy card access
VERSATILE to fit a little, or a lot
TOP GRAIN CALF LEATHER FINISHES
Premium top grain leathers are hand crafted to perfection, coupled with our signature Q-Band woven straps with subtle colours and contrasts - ZERO₂ was designed to suit anyone.
FEATURES AT A GLANCE
         ZERO₂ CARD WALLET FOR PLAY.
Designed for holding a lot more, with a lot less.
PLAY

NOTABLE FEATURES
SPECS
Holds from 7+ cards (7 slots & compartments)
Quick access slot for RFID enabled cards
Q-Band strap for quick cash, cards & receipts
Cash belly midsection with OpenSlot access
MagSnap closures for extra security
97mm x 80mm x 4mm / ~38g (empty)
Premium leather Backed by our 2 year warranty
ZERO₂ BI-FOLD WALLET FOR EVERYDAY
Designed for use with everyday, making life just that much easier. 
PLAY

NOTABLE FEATURES
SPECS
Holds from 9+ cards (10 slots & compartments)
Quick access front slot for RFID enabled cards
Q-Band strap for quick cash, cards & receipts
Cash belly midsection MagSnap closures for extra security
100mm x 77mm x 12mm / ~50g (empty)
Premium leather Backed by our 2 year warranty
ZERO₂ TRAVEL WALLET
Designed for travel, access documents quickly and securely.
PLAY

NOTABLE FEATURES
SPECS
Holds from 5+ cards, passport, phone, cables, passes (17 slots & compartments)
Quick access front slots for boarding passes & passport Q-Band strap handle for extra security
Multiple note slots for multiple currencies
Premium stainless 300° zipper closure
130mm x 235mm x 35mm / ~260g (empty)
Premium leather Backed by our 2 year warranty
MARKETING PARTNERS
Get Your Project Funded Today!
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
  LIFESTYLE GALLERY
Click here or email customercare@rival-collective.com for hi-res images & press kit.

SHARING IS CARING
REWARDS ZERO₂
STRETCH GOALS
PRODUCTION SCHEDULE

updates.update_userinfo: All NEW Improved Zero 3 is Here!
updates.update_content:
Sleekers!
It's been a long time coming - we've listened to your feedback and have improved zero 2 wallets to something even better (and slimmer for you minimalists!).
Introducing Zero 3 – Advanced Engineering Carry. We just launched and we're inviting you check it out right here on Kickstarter:

updates.update_userinfo: SLINGR | A minimalist sling for your carry essentials
updates.update_content:
Sleekers!
We've launched our brand new project, SLINGR - Carbon Fiber Aesthetic Over Body Bag and we'd love it for you to check it out and let us know what you think!

Sleekers!
With super sleek finishes and functions that cannot be resisted, we're confident that you will love Zero 3. Designed to carry everyday essentials - without the bulk, making it easier to access your cards, cash and coins. 
You can check it out here: https://bit.ly/2QSwMUW

updates.update_userinfo: Final Weeks: Onyx Mavic Pro Photoseries
updates.update_content:
Sleekers!
Welcome to another update with Onyx Does it Fit? Mavic Pro Series. Just a short collection of purpose built photos of different situations in which we utilize Onyx! Feast your eyes on these, and don't forget to SHARE! 
Click here to view the campaign - ending soon:

updates.update_userinfo: Need a BETTER Backpack? Say No More.
updates.update_content:
Sleekers!
Need a backpack doesn't look complicated and pack a punch of features internally to hold your gear? Say no more - Onyx is here!

Sleekers!
Thank you for your ongoing support with us throughout the years, we wouldn't have been here without you. We've been working on our latest addition to our Rival family - and would love for you to check it out.

updates.update_userinfo: Need To Look Smart, But Stay Connected?
updates.update_content:
Sleekers!  
Hybrid C2 is a crossbred smart watch with minimalist style, designed to enable subtle notifications directly from your mobile device - WITHOUT DISTRACTIONS.
It comes with both leather and mesh straps, in four different colour options. Featuring - Activity Tracking, Auto-Time Zones, Silent Notifications & More!

Sleekers!
Thank you all for being patient with us - but we've completed our stock checklists and have printed all labels for final packing and shipping. All is GOOD to go!
You will receive an email with your tracking details to your nominated email address via your KS account - please allow 24 hours for this to arrive in your inbox (saves us all the messages!).

Sleekers!
The (short) long wait is finally over! Our final production pieces have just been completed today are now being packed to be prepared to be shipped to our warehouse!
This means we must close the surveys for final backer's addresses soon - so if you haven't filled your survey or updated your final shipping address - final call is now!

Sleekers!
Just a quick update to let you guys know how we're going with progress and production for Zero 2. Everything is going as planned as we near closer to completion of the mass quantities.
Shipping should still start in early May as planned and we can't wait to get them to you!

Just received email from rival saying that they will only replace or give store credits in case of bad package. Either way folks will be required to send them the package back which means return shipping will be borne by the sender. International shipping isn't cheap. These people have changed a lot form last time.
Personally I am most unhappy at the £24.38 customs charge. Would have been nice if this was included in postage so I knew what I was getting into.
I still have not received my wallet and never got a shipping email. I also emailed you guys directly and never received a response.

Hi guys as you know I’ve loved my stuff but I’ve found one problem with my bi-wallet.The £20.00 notes here in the UK are too large to put into the wallet.They stick out above the wallet and they don’t feel safe, anyone could grab them if I was in a shop with my wallet open.So far this is the only note that I’ve got this problem with but I guess a £50.00 note would have the same problem.Its no use folding the notes in half as this makes the wallet bulky and also stops the magnets engaging with one another.I love my other items though, it’s just a shame about the wallet but I will still use it just not with the mentioned notes.
Same goes for me. I haven't gotten a reply form them at all. I am really disappointed in this
@Rohit, I messaged them on KS, email and comments section. there has been no reply from them so far..maybe they are vacationing
One thing though, I thought it said it was supposed to have a magnetic closure... 🤔
I just received my carbon fiber bi-fold. Very beautifully designed, I don't remember having a wallet I liked so much. I'll definitely be buying a zero 3 if there ever is one. Geart job guys!

Awful finishing!!! Didn’t expect this from Rival... very disappointed... don’t think will back them or buy anything from these people ever again! Also by the looks of It, I don’t think they are even reading the comments here... amazing way to serve their customers!

First thing I notice this morning using my new Zero wallet is it feels much lighter and smaller in size using the same cards, in my pocket. I equip my keys using the keyring holder and still feels light and easy to carry. Seems very durable too. Happy with it so far aside from the blemishes!.
